超大规模集成电路设计的计算机辅助
史蒂文·M·鲁宾
版权所有 © 1994

第三章：代表权

Chapter 3: Representation

3.1 简介

3.1 Introduction

VLSI 设计系统最基本的部分是它用来描述电路的表示法。正确的表示法至关重要；它可以成就或毁掉整个程序。良好的表示法允许方便地存储、访问和操作电路，但不良的表示法会限制系统，使其浪费资源、难以调试且速度缓慢。本章介绍 VLSI 设计数据库的表示法。

The most fundamental part of a VLSI design system is the representation that it uses to describe circuits. Proper representation is crucial; it can make or break the entire program. A good representation allows the circuit to be conveniently stored, accessed, and manipulated, but a bad representation limits the system by making it wasteful, hard to debug, and slow. This chapter is about representations for VLSI design databases.

最重要的概念是使表示与用户头脑中的心理模型相似。这确保可以通过对表示进行简单的更改来实现对系统要求的简单更改。在处理系统的较低级别时，它还可以实现更直观的交互。例如，如果用户熟悉错误的表示上下文，内部错误消息将更有意义。

The most important concept is to make the representation similar to the mental model in the user's head. This ensures that simple changes to the system requirements can be implemented with simple changes to the representation. It also results in more intuitive interaction when dealing with lower levels of the system. For example, internal error messages will make more sense if the representational context of the error is familiar to the user.

关于表示的另一点是，它必须经过量身定制才能为用户提供最佳响应。这意味着必须评估和使用空间和时间的经典权衡来规划表示。如果设计系统注定要在内存有限的非常快的计算机上运行，​​那么表示必须紧凑，存储更少，让系统计算更多。如果代码必须在具有较大物理和虚拟内存的较慢机器上运行，那么表示应该保留更多信息以加快即时数据访问需求。这种大内存配置如今更为常见，并将在整个章节中假定。

Another point about representation is that it must be tailored to produce the best response to the user. This means that the classic tradeoff of space and time must be evaluated and used to plan the representation. If the design system is destined to run on a very fast computer with limited memory, then the representation must be compact, storing less and letting the system compute more. If the code has to run on a slower machine with large physical and virtual memory, then the representation should keep more information to speed the immediate data-access needs. This large memory configuration is more common today and will be presumed throughout the chapter.

本章的第一部分概括讨论了任何系统中都应具有的表示属性。这些属性包括面向对象以实现最大可扩展性，以及改进响应的技术。此外，还介绍了对表示有要求的数据库基本功能。这些功能包括内存分配、磁盘格式、更改和撤消控制。

The first part of this chapter contains a general discussion of representation properties that should be found in any system. Such properties include object orientation for maximum extendibility, and techniques for improved response. Also covered are the basic functions of a database that make demands on the representation. These functions include memory allocation, disk formats, change, and undo control.

本章的第二部分专门讨论第 1 章中讨论的 VLSI 设计的四个方面：层次结构、视图、连接性和几何形状。层次结构通过复杂的组件来表示，这些组件实际上是层次结构中较低位置的其他单元的实例。视图通过高度灵活的数据结构来表示，这些数据结构可以保存任何类型的描述并可以链接到其他视图。连接性通过组件及其连接的网络来表示。几何形状通过形状、图形属性和变换来表示。正如本章将要展示的那样，将所有这些表示都包含在设计系统中并非易事。

The second part of this chapter addresses itself specifically to the four aspects of VLSI design discussed in Chapter 1: hierarchy, views, connectivity, and geometry. Hierarchy is represented by having complex components that are actually instances of other cells lower in the hierarchy. Views are represented with highly flexible data structures that can hold descriptions of any kind and can link to other views. Connectivity is represented with networks of components and their connections. Geometry is represented with shapes, graphic attributes, and transformations. As this chapter will show, it is not a simple task to include all these representations in a design system.

超大规模集成电路设计的计算机辅助
史蒂文·M·鲁宾
版权所有 © 1994

第三章：代表权

3.2 代表性的一般问题

3.2 General Issues of Representation

3.2.1 对象和链接

3.2.1 Objects and Links

数据库表示的一个非常重要的特征是灵活性。在 VLSI 设计中，似乎对可以使用的分析和综合工具没有限制。所有这些工具都处理必须表示的不同信息。因此，表示必须足够灵活，以便在需要时随时随地包含新信息。为了实现这种灵活性，表示必须没有任何固有的限制。例如，固定大小的数组通常不是一个好主意，因为它们无法适应不寻常的设计需求。经验表明，每个设计师都不会接受对设计活动的任何预先设定的限制。就在看起来一百万个门足以完成布局时，就会出现对一千万个门的需求。就在看起来集成电路制造只需要 50 层时，一些工艺工程师会提出 60 层。即使是简单的用户界面属性，例如单元名称中的字符数，也无法预先确定。

A very important feature of database representation is flexibility. In VLSI design, there seems to be no limit to the analysis and synthesis tools that can be used. All these tools manipulate different information, which must be represented. Therefore the representation must be flexible enough to contain new information wherever and whenever needed. To achieve this flexibility, the representation must not have any inherent limits. For example, fixed-sized arrays are generally a bad idea because they cannot adapt to unusual design needs. Experience has shown that no preconceived limits to the design activity are going to be acceptable to every designer. Just when it appears that one million gates is enough for a layout, there will be a demand for ten million. Just when it seems that only 50 layers are needed for integrated circuit fabrication, some process engineer will propose 60. Even simple user-interface attributes, such as the number of characters in a cell name, cannot be determined in advance.

实现灵活性的最佳方法是抛弃固定数组构造并使用链表[Knuth]。链表是描述变长信息的更好方法，因为它们对于小任务占用的空间较少，而对于大任务可以干净利落地扩展。列表包含对象，它们是随机散布在内存中的数据记录。对象的排序是通过让列表头指向第一个对象并让每个对象中的链接指向下一个对象来完成的。最后一个对象中的特殊“空”指针标识列表的末尾。

The best way to achieve flexibility is to throw out the fixed-array construct and use linked lists [Knuth]. Linked lists are a better way to describe varying-length information because they consume less space for small tasks and extend cleanly for the big jobs. The list contains objects, which are records of data that are scattered randomly in memory. Ordering of the objects is done by having a list head pointing to the first object and a link in each object that points to the next object. A special "null" pointer in the last object identifies the end of the list.

图 3.1 显示了链表和数组之间的区别。在该图中，每条记录表示 4 条数据记录，每条记录 3 个数据项。图 3.1(a) 中的数组表示按顺序存储记录。对象通过索引引用，因此寻址记录 N 的数据 B 值需要访问内存的位置 Base + N × 3 - 2。图 3.1(b) 中所示的链表技术通过直接内存指针引用对象，因此寻址地址 N 处的记录的数据 B 值仅需要访问位置 N + 1。为了允许无限数量的数据，可以从设计程序范围之外的可用空间分配对象，而不是从系统内部的预分配内存中获取对象。
图 3.1 记录数组与链表：（a）数组难以重新组织（b）链表更好。

链表的优点是寻址时计算量更少、可扩展性无限，并且无需移动内存即可插入或删除列表中的记录。链表的缺点是链接会占用额外的存储空间，并且需要搜索才能根据列表中的位置找到条目。额外的存储空间不应该成为问题，因为时间通常比空间更重要。在基于指针的系统中，很少遇到通过列表中的索引搜索条目的问题，因为索引值很少甚至没有。

The advantages of linked lists are their shorter computation when addressing, their unlimited expandability, and the ability to insert or delete records in the list without having to move memory. The disadvantages of linked lists are the extra storage space that the links consume and the fact that finding an entry by its position in the list requires search. Extra storage should not be a concern, since time is usually more important than space. The problem of searching for an entry by its index in a list is rarely encountered in a pointer-based system because there are few if any index values.

使用对象链接列表时必须做出的一个决定是将列表设置为双链接还是单链接。单链接列表是只有一个方向（指向“下一个”对象）的列表。双向链接列表指向两个方向（指向“下一个”和“上一个”对象）。在进行插入或删除时，双向链接列表速度更快，因为有更多信息可用于指针操作。但是，它们占用更多空间，并且并不总是能带来明显的速度提升。设计系统程序员必须确定每种情况的需求，并决定是否使用双向链接列表。

One decision that must be made when using linked lists of objects is whether to make the lists doubly or singly linked. A singly linked list is one that has pointers in only one direction (to the "next" object). A doubly linked list points in both directions (to the "next" and the "previous" objects). Doubly linked lists are faster when insertions or deletions are being made, because more information is available for pointer manipulation. However, they take up more space and do not always produce a noticeable speed improvement. The design system programmer must determine the needs of each situation and decide whether or not to use doubly linked lists.

3.2.2 属性

3.2.2 Attributes

数据库中的每个对象都是包含数据项的记录。这些项是具有名称、值以及与之关联的特定类型的属性。图 3.2 显示了晶体管对象的典型属性。实际上，必须表示一组无穷无尽的属性，这是由无穷无尽的综合和分析工具造成的。每种工具都用于操作对象的不同方面，因此每种工具都会引入新属性。鉴于表示不应对设计活动施加任何限制，因此对象属性的创建也必须具有类似的灵活性。由于在规划记录组织时无法提前确定到底需要哪些数据条目，因此程序必须能够在设计期间创建新的属性条目，而无需与数据库进行任何预先安排。

Every object in the database is a record that contains data items. These items are attributes that have names, values, and often specific types associated with them. Figure 3.2 shows typical attributes for a transistor object. In practice, there is a never-ending set of attributes that must be represented, caused by the never-ending set of synthesis and analysis tools. Each tool is used to manipulate a different aspect of the object, so each introduces new attributes. Given that a representation should place no limits on the design activity, it is necessary that the creation of object attributes be similarly flexible. Since it is impossible to determine in advance exactly which data entries are going to be needed when planning a record organization, the program must be able to create new attribute entries during design without any prearrangements with the database.

属性价值
中心(55,102)
尺寸2 × 6
方向 0°
姓名晶体管
细胞逆变器
环境  金属氧化物半导体
連接  多晶硅，差异输入，差异输出
图 3.2晶体管的属性/值对。

对象属性的可扩展存储的最通用方案是使用属性及其值的链接列表。在这种方案中，对象仅由链接其属性/值记录的列表头组成（见图 3.3）。这种方案用于基于 Lisp 的设计系统 [Batali 和 Hartheimer；Brown、Tong 和 Foyster]。它的缺点是使系统非常慢，因为需要搜索才能找到对象的属性值。为了加快属性访问速度， 可以在对象中存储哈希表。这样的表是一个数组，它给出了在属性列表中查找位置的初始猜测。虽然这种技术加快了访问速度，但当属性数量超过哈希表的大小时，访问速度会降低。此外，哈希需要某种算法来生成哈希键，这也会增加延迟。

The most general scheme for expandable storage of object attributes is to use a linked list of attributes and their values. In such a scheme, an object consists of nothing but a list head that links its attribute/value records (see Fig. 3.3). This scheme is used in Lisp-based design systems [Batali and Hartheimer; Brown, Tong, and Foyster]. It has the disadvantage of making the system very slow because search is required to find an object's attribute values. To speed up attribute access, a hashing table can be stored in the object. Such a table is an array that gives initial guesses about where to look in the attribute list. Although this technique speeds access, that speed will degrade when the number of attributes grows larger than the size of the hash table. Also, hashing requires some algorithm to produce the hash key and that, too, will add delay.

图 3.3 对象仅由属性/值对的链接列表组成。

速度和灵活性之间的良好折衷是使用固定记录条目和附加散列属性的组合（见图 3.4）。具有预分配属性槽的记录速度最快，因此它们应该用于最常访问的条目。然后，这些预分配的槽之一可以是引用不常访问的属性的哈希表。在设计系统内部，访问属性的代码通常可以定制为使用适当的方法。那些无法提前知道属性存储方法的代码片段必须先搜索哈希表，然后逐步浏览与固定属性相关联的名称。为了加速此类程序，可以为固定属性创建散列条目，以便哈希表是唯一需要查阅的地方。为了节省内存，这些额外的指针只有在第一次引用后才需要添加到哈希表中。许多这样的设施在现代基于对象的编程环境中都可用 [Weinreb 和 Moon]。

A good compromise between speed and flexibility is to use a combination of fixed record entries and additional hashed attributes (see Fig. 3.4). Records with preassigned attribute slots are the very fastest, so they should be used for the most frequently accessed entries. One of those preassigned slots can then be the hash table that references the less frequently accessed attributes. Inside the design system, the code to access attributes can usually be tailored to use the proper method. Those pieces of code that cannot know the storage method of attributes in advance will have to search the hash table first and then step through the names associated with the fixed attributes. To speed such programs, hashed entries can be created for fixed attributes so that the hash table is the only place that need be consulted. In order to save memory, these additional pointers need be added to the hashed table only after they are referenced for the first time. Many of these facilities are available in modern object-based programming environments [Weinreb and Moon].

图 3.4 固定和散列可扩展属性。

这里描述的方案适用于任何分析或综合工具，其属性大多位于固定位置。但是，随着工具数量的增加，效率可能会下降。为了防止新工具由于其属性都在散列条目中而运行非常缓慢，表示可以为每个分析和综合工具提供少量“私有”内存。此内存是专用于特定工具的固定属性。分析和综合工具可以使用该条目进行更快的访问，方法是将最重要的属性放在那里，或者将其用作指向其自己的私有属性信息的指针。通常，私有属性只需要一个字的大小即可使用。

The scheme described here works well for any analysis or synthesis tool the attributes of which are mostly in fixed positions. However, as the number of tools grows, efficiency may decline. To prevent new tools from operating very slowly because their attributes are all in hashed entries, the representation can provide a small amount of "private" memory for each analysis and synthesis tool. This memory is a fixed attribute that is dedicated to the particular tool. The analysis and synthesis tools can use that entry for faster access, either by placing the most important attribute(s) there or by using it as a pointer to their own private attribute information. In general, the private attribute needs to be only one word in size to be useful.

属性灵活性在设计表示中非常重要。但效率也很重要。因此，值得结合一系列存储技术来实现最佳效果。这使得设计系统强大而快速，即使以代码复杂性为代价。

Attribute flexibility is very important in a design representation. But so is efficiency. Therefore it is worthwhile to incorporate a collection of storage techniques to achieve the best possible results. This permits the design system to be powerful and fast, even at the expense of code complexity.

 

 

3.2.3 原型

3.2.3 Prototypes

在任何有用的设计环境中，对象上都会存储大量信息。其中一些信息特定于每个对象，但大部分信息对于给定类的所有对象都是通用的。在这种情况下，将通用信息放在一个公共位置是有利的。这个位置称为原型（见图 3.5）。
图 3.5 原型信息。

设计中的每个对象都应有原型。单个原型定义一类对象并描述该类中的每个实际对象。实际对象的属性指向其原型（见图 3.6），如果需要，原型上的属性可以位于实际对象的链接列表的头部。如果要添加到数据库的新属性是类中所有对象的共同属性，则可以将其放置在原型对象中；如果这些属性是特定于单个对象的，则可以将其放置在单个对象中。

Prototypes should exist for every object in a design. A single prototype defines a class of objects and describes every actual object in that class. Attributes on the actual objects point to their prototypes (see Fig. 3.6) and, if it is desired, attributes on the prototypes can head linked lists of the actual objects. New attributes to be added to the database can be placed in the prototype object if they are common to everything in the class, or they can be placed in the individual objects if they are specific to them.

图 3.6 实例和原型：（a）原型（b）实例对象（c）代表性设计。

 

 

3.2.4 物体标记

3.2.4 Object Marking

许多应用程序使用设计中的对象子集。示例包括选择特定区域、给定网络或特定层中的对象。为了进行此选择，将某些标准应用于数据库，并标记子集中的对象以供将来分析。此中间标记步骤是必要的，因为选择算法可能非常耗时，并且分析代码经常重复。因此，能够有效地标记选定的对象子集以便快速进行后续识别非常重要。

Many applications work with a subset of the objects in a design. Examples include selection of objects in a particular area, on a given net, or on a certain layer. To make this selection, some criterion is applied to the database and those objects in the subset are marked for future analysis. This intermediate marking step is necessary because the selection algorithm may be very time consuming and the analysis code repeated often. For this reason it is important to be able to mark efficiently a selected subset of objects for rapid subsequent identification.

明显的标记技术是在选择对象后在其上设置标志。此标志是对象的布尔属性，因此占用的空间很小。分析阶段只需检查标志即可确定对象的状态。标记标志的问题在于，它们的使用需要对设计中的每个对象进行多次传递：一次传递清除所有标志，一次传递标记所需对象，一次传递请求的每个选定对象列表。标志清除传递是唯一必须需要对设计进行完整扫描的传递，因为许多选择和检查算法都在本地工作。但是，它们都要求正确设置每个对象上的标志。如果在分析之后而不是标记之前清除标志，则可以使用最终分析传递来清理标志。这可能会节省时间，但它不是一种安全的技术，并且会导致程序的健壮性降低。因此，使用标志作为对象标记是可以接受的，但在大型设计数据库中可能会很慢。

The obvious marking technique is to set a flag on an object when it has been selected. This flag is a Boolean attribute on the object and so it consumes little space. The analysis phase needs only to examine the flags to determine the state of the object. The problem with marker flags is that their use requires multiple passes of every object in the design: one pass to clear all the flags, one pass to mark the desired objects, and one pass for every list of selected objects that is requested. The flag-clearing pass is the only one that will necessarily require a complete scan of the design, because many selection and examination algorithms work locally. However, they all require that the flags on every object be properly set. If the flag clearing is done after the analysis rather than before the marking, then the final analysis pass can be used to clean up the flags. This might save time but it is not a safe technique and results in a less robust program. Thus the use of flags as object markers is acceptable but potentially slow in large design databases.

一种更好的标记技术是使用时间戳。时间戳是一个整数属性，在选择对象时存储在该对象中。时间戳的值在每次标记之前都会更改，因此旧的时间戳值自动失效。然后，分析过程会查找等于当前标记所用时间戳值的时间戳值。此外，可以以某种方式操纵时间戳值，以便在时间戳值中编码额外信息。时间戳的优点是它们不需要清除，因此不需要额外的完整数据库扫描。缺点是它们需要占用 32 位或更多位的整个字来表示（注意：小的整数时间戳（如 16 位值）可能会溢出），而标志只需要一位。

A better marking technique is the use of time stamps. A time stamp is an integer attribute that is stored in an object when that object is selected. The value of the stamp is changed before every marking pass so that old stamp values become automatically invalid. The analysis pass then looks for time-stamp values equal to the current one that was used in marking. In addition, time-stamp values can be manipulated in such a way that extra information is encoded in the stamp value. The advantage of time stamps is that they do not have to be cleared and so they do not require that extra complete database scan. The disadvantage is that they consume an entire word of 32 or more bits to represent (be warned: small integer time stamps such as 16-bit values can overflow), whereas flags require only one bit.

当分析阶段发现自己要对设计进行全面检查以找到一小组标记对象时，就该开始在数据库之外积累标记信息了。与其将标记属性存储在对象上，不如将指向标记对象的指针存储在外部列表中。这些列表的长度和短短都取决于设计的大小。分析不必搜索整个电路：它将其选定的集合放在一个简明的列表中。虽然这种方法会为标记列表消耗额外的内存，但它实际上可以节省内存，因为它不需要数据库中的标记属性。该技术将花费更多时间，因为这些列表的分配、构建和释放比简单设置标志或时间戳要耗费更多时间，但对于许多应用程序来说，这是值得的。关于使用哪种标记方法的最终决定在很大程度上取决于选择和分析算法的性质。

When the analysis phase finds itself making complete passes of the design to find a small set of marked objects, then it is time to start accumulating the marking information outside of the database. Rather than storing marking attributes on the objects, pointers to the marked objects should be stored in external lists. These lists are as long or short as they need to be and are not dependent on the size of the design. Analysis does not have to search the entire circuit: It has its selected set in a concise list. Although this method consumes extra memory for the marking list, it actually may save memory because it does not require marker attributes in the database. The technique will take more time because the allocation, construction, and freeing of these lists is much more time consuming than is the simple setting of a flag or a time stamp, but for many applications this is worthwhile. The final decision about which marking method to use depends heavily on the nature of the selection and analysis algorithms.

 

 

3.2.5 内存分配

3.2.5 Memory Allocation

内存分配是设计过程中所有阶段都需要进行的。它通常仅包含两个操作：分配指定数量的未使用内存和释放已分配的内存块。有些系统将其简化为单个操作，即按需分配内存，并在对象不再使用时自动释放内存。特殊的垃圾收集操作通过计算对每个内存块的引用次数来查找未使用的内存 [Deutsch 和 Bobrow]。

Memory allocation is required in all phases of design. It typically consists of only two operations: the allocation of a specified amount of unused memory and the freeing of an allocated block. Some systems reduce this to a single operation that allocates on demand and frees automatically when the object is no longer used. Special garbage-collection operations find the unused memory by counting the number of references to each block [Deutsch and Bobrow].

不仅要分配对象及其属性，还要从空闲内存中创建临时搜索列表和许多其他可变长度字段。妥善处理内存对于系统高效运行至关重要。然而，许多设计系统愚蠢地忽略了这个问题，并相信操作系统或语言环境能够正确提供这项服务。

Not only are objects and their attributes allocated, but temporary search lists and many other variable-length fields are carved out of free memory. It is important to deal with the memory properly to make the system run efficiently. Nevertheless, many design systems foolishly ignore the problem and trust the operating system or language environment to provide this service correctly.

关于内存分配的一个基本事实是它需要时间。大多数编程环境通过调用操作系统来执行内存分配，有些甚至最终通过磁盘 I/O 来完成请求。这意味着连续的分配和释放流将大大降低设计系统的速度。例如，如果分配内存来存储指向标记对象的指针，然后在不再需要标记列表时释放内存，那么每个选择步骤都将大量使用通用内存分配系统。这种方法效率不高。更好的方法是将这些分配的块保留在内部列表中，而不是在分析完成后释放它们。对新对象的请求将在诉诸实际内存分配之前查阅此内部空闲列表。最初，内部空闲列表是空的，但随着时间的推移，列表的大小将增长到与曾经使用过的这些对象的最大数量一样大。

One basic fact about memory allocation is that it takes time to do. Most programming environments perform memory allocation by invoking the operating system and some even end up doing disk I/O to complete the request. This means that a continuous stream of allocations and frees will slow the design system considerably. If, for example, memory is allocated to store a pointer to a marked object and then freed when the marker list is no longer needed, then every selection step will make heavy use of a general-purpose memory-allocation system. This approach is not very efficient. A better technique is to retain these allocated blocks in an internal list rather than freeing them when the analysis is done. Requests for new objects will consult this internal free list before resorting to actual memory allocation. Initially, the internal free list is empty, but over time the size of the list will grow to be as large as the largest number of these objects that is ever used.

不释放对象的原因是，它们可以从内部空闲列表中更快地重新分配。操作系统中的内存分配器无法根据对象性质组织已释放的内存块，因为它对设计程序一无所知。因此，它会混合所有已释放的内存块，在重新分配时搜索所有内存块，并将相邻的内存块合并为更大的内存块（无论是否合适）。所有这些都浪费时间。设计系统自己的空闲列表在将给定类的对象保持在一起方面更加智能，并且可以做出适当的响应。因此，程序的速度得到了提高。

The reason for not freeing objects is that they can be reallocated much more quickly from an internal free list. The memory allocator in the operating system cannot organize freed blocks of memory by their object nature because it knows nothing about the design program. Therefore it will mix all freed blocks, search all of them when reallocation is done, and coalesce adjacent ones into larger blocks whether or not that is appropriate. All this wastes time. The design system's own free list is much more intelligent about keeping objects of a given class together and can respond appropriately. Thus the speed of the program is improved.

另一种节省时间的方法是一次分配多个对象，分配较大的内存块。例如，当空闲标记对象的内部列表为空时，下一个新对象请求应获取一个可容纳 50 个此类对象的内存块。然后，该内存被分解为内部列表中的 49 个空闲对象和一个用于当前请求的对象。这样可以减少对操作系统内存分配器的调用，尤其是对于使用频繁的对象。此外，由于操作系统通常使用每个分配的内存块中的几个字进行簿记，因此可以节省一些空间。这种块分配技术的缺点是程序通常会分配未使用的内存，这可能会造成浪费。

Another time-saving technique is to allocate multiple objects at a time, in larger blocks of memory. For example, when the internal list of free marker objects is empty, the next request for a new object should grab a block of memory that can hold 50 such objects. This memory is then broken down into 49 free objects on the internal list and one that is to be used for the current request. This results in fewer calls to the operating system's memory allocator, especially for objects that are used heavily. In addition, some space will be saved since the operating system typically uses a few words per allocated block of memory as bookkeeping. The drawback of this block-allocation technique is that the program will typically have allocated memory that is unused, and this can be wasteful.

内存分配的最大问题是程序会耗尽内存。当它在虚拟内存计算机上耗尽内存时，操作系统将开始将设计数据分页到磁盘上。如果内存使用过于随意，对象的内容将在整个虚拟地址空间中分散。然后操作系统将崩溃，因为它会不必要地交换大量内存以获取少量数据。为了解决这个问题，建议在虚拟机上运行的设计系统特别注意分页方案。例如，与特定单元相关的所有对象都应在内存中彼此靠近。实现这一点的一种方法是同时分配对象。不幸的是，随着更改的进行，设计仍然会分散。更好的解决方案是用它们包含的单元来标记内存页面。用于不同单元的内存将从不同的内存页面分配，所有单元内容将保持在一起。通过将虚拟内存实现为可交换页面的“集群”，设计活动将始终保持在少量专用页面中 [Stamos]。

The biggest problem with memory allocation is that the program will run out of memory. When it does on a virtual-memory computer, the operating system will begin to page the design data onto disk. If the use of memory is too haphazard, the contents of an object will be fragmented throughout the virtual address space. Then the operating system will thrash as it needlessly swaps large amounts of memory to get small numbers of data. To solve this, it is advisable for design systems that run on virtual machines to pay special attention to the paging scheme. For example, all objects related to a particular cell should be kept near each other in memory. One way to achieve this is to allocate the objects at the same time. Unfortunately, as changes are made the design will still fragment. A better solution is to tag pages of memory with the cells that they contain. Memory used for a different cell will be allocated from a different memory page and all cell contents will stay together. By implementing virtual memory as "clusters" of swappable pages, the design activity will remain within a small number of dedicated pages at all times [Stamos].

除了按单元聚合设计之外，虚拟内存集群还可用于其他特殊用途信息，例如特定设计环境、分析或综合工具的属性。由此产生的组织将提供小型工作内存页面集，这些页面在需要时进行交换，从而使设计系统运行得更快。例如，如果所有与时序相关的属性都放在一起，那么这些内存页面将保持交换状态，直到需要时再干净地交换，而不会影响其他数据。

In addition to aggregating a design by cells, clusters of virtual memory can be used for other special-purpose information such as the attributes of a particular design environment, analysis, or synthesis tool. The resulting organization will provide small working sets of memory pages that swap in when needed, causing the design system to run faster. For example, if all timing-related attributes are placed together, then those memory pages will remain swapped out until needed and then will swap in cleanly without affecting other data.

当计算机不支持虚拟地址空间时，设计系统必须自行进行交换。这种内部分页通常通过一次只在内存中放置一个单元来完成。代码变得更加复杂，因为对其他单元的所有引用都必须明确请求上下文更改以确保引用的数据在内存中。在虚拟内存系统中，所有数据都假定在内存中，并且隐式地这样做。在内部分页系统中，必须明确加载数据。许多设计操作一次跨越整个层次结构，如果一次分页一个单元，则运行速度会更慢。例如，将更难支持分层显示、网络跟踪和不同单元上的多个窗口。虽然设计系统可以实现自己的虚拟内存形式，但这会给每个数据库引用增加额外的开销。最好有一台使用专用硬件实现此功能的虚拟计算机。此外，让操作系统执行磁盘 I/O 总是比在应用程序中执行更快，因为前者系统开销较少。因此，表示设计的最佳方式是从大型、统一的内存区域智能地分配它。

When the computer does not support a virtual address space, the design system must do its own swapping. This internal paging is typically done by having only one cell in memory at a time. The code becomes more complex because all references to other cells must explicitly request a context change to ensure that the referenced data are in memory. In virtual-memory systems, all data are assumed to be in memory and are implicitly made so. In an internally paged system, the data must be loaded explicitly. Many design operations span an entire hierarchy at once and will run more slowly if paged one cell at a time. For example, it will be harder to support hierarchical display, network tracing, and multiple windows onto different cells. Although the design system could implement its own form of virtual memory, that would add extra overhead to every database reference. It is better to have a virtual computer that implements this with special-purpose hardware. Also, letting the operating system do the disk I/O is always faster than doing it in the application program, because with the former there is less system overhead. Thus the best way to represent a design is to allocate it intelligently from a large, uniform memory arena.

 

 

3.2.6 磁盘表示

3.2.6 Disk Representation

如果要将设计放在虚拟内存中来表示，那么非常大的设计将占用大量虚拟内存。要修改这样的设计，系统必须将数据从磁盘读取到内存中，对内存进行更改，然后将设计写回磁盘。当设计文件很大并且虚拟内存实际上在磁盘上时，这将非常耗时。即使是非虚拟内存系统也会浪费大量时间来处理大型设计文件。为了提高速度，需要一种智能的磁盘表示格式。

If a design is going to be represented by placing it in virtual memory, then a very large design will consume much virtual memory. To modify such a design, the system will have to read the data from disk to memory, make changes to the memory, and then write the design back to disk. This is very time consuming when the design files are large and the virtual memory is actually on disk. Even nonvirtual-memory systems will waste much time manipulating large design files. What is needed for better speed is an intelligent format for disk representation.

通过在设计文件的开头放置“目录”，系统可以避免读取整个文件。可以直接访问各个部分，因此可以只在需要时读取设计。这对于高效浏览设计来说很好，但是当进行更改时仍然必须完全重写文件。如果每个单元都存储在单独的磁盘文件中，则操作系统的文件管理器将执行目录功能。这允许快速更改单个单元，但会带来磁盘文件不一致的问题，因为它们可以在设计系统之外进行操作。

By placing a "table of contents" at the beginning of the design file, the system can avoid the need to read the entire file. Individual parts can be directly accessed so the design can be read only as it is needed. This is fine for efficient perusal of a design but there will still have to be a total rewrite of the file when a change is made. If each cell is stored in a separate disk file, then the operating system's file manager will perform the table-of-contents function. This allows rapid change to single cells but opens up the problem of inconsistent disk files since they can be manipulated outside of the design system.

理想的磁盘格式将精确复制内存中的内容。当在具有灵活分页功能的虚拟内存机器上完成此操作时，无需一次读取或写入整个设计文件。相反，通过将文件的磁盘块指定为设计程序的分页空间，将文件“附加”到虚拟内存。最初，这些内存页面全部“交换出去”，但是，当设计活动引用新数据时，相应的磁盘块将被分页。对设计的更改只会在与修改后的内存相对应的位置操纵磁盘文件。为更大的设计分配更多内存会自动扩展磁盘文件的大小。当然，编写设计仅涉及更新更改的页面。此方案需要最少的磁盘 I/O，因为它只访问所需的内容，并且不需要磁盘上的单独分页区域。

An ideal disk format would replicate exactly what is in memory. When this is done on a virtual-memory machine with flexible paging facilities, it is not necessary to read or write the entire design file at once. Instead, the file is "attached" to virtual memory by designating the disk blocks of the file to be the paging space for the design program. Initially these memory pages are all "swapped out" but, as design activity references new data, the appropriate disk blocks are paged in. Changes to the design manipulate the disk file in only those places corresponding to the modified memory. Allocation of more memory for a larger design automatically extends the size of the disk file. Of course, writing the design simply involves updating the changed pages. This scheme requires the smallest amount of disk I/O since it accesses only what it needs and does not require a separate paging area on disk.

将内存的精确内容存储在磁盘上的唯一问题是，对象指针在写入磁盘并读回到计算机中的不同地址时不会进行调整。如果重定位信息与文件一起存储，则必须在读取之后和写入之前扫描每个页面以调整指针。这需要额外的时间和空间，此外还会产生必须识别内存中每个指针字段的问题。重定位可以通过专用硬件来完成，该硬件可以重定位并维护内存和磁盘上的指针信息。不幸的是，没有这样的硬件。避免这些问题并仍然获得磁盘和内存的单一表示的唯一方法是停止使用指针并使用数组和索引 [Leinwand]。这使得 I/O 更快，但在设计过程中会减慢内存访问速度。

The only problem with storing the precise contents of memory on disk is that object pointers do not adjust when written to disk and then read back into a different address in the computer. If relocation information is stored with the file, then each page must be scanned after reading and before writing to adjust the pointers. This requires extra time and space in addition to creating the problem of having to identify every pointer field in memory. Relocation could be done with special-purpose hardware that relocates and maintains pointer information in memory and on disk. Unfortunately, no such hardware exists. The only way to avoid these problems and still obtain a single representation for disk and memory is to stop using pointers and to use arrays and indices [Leinwand]. This makes I/O faster but slows down memory access during design.

 

 

3.2.7 数据库修改

3.2.7 Database Modification

这里要讨论的最后一个表示一般问题是更改的控制。这些更改来自综合工具、分析工具以及最先进的工具（既能进行综合又能进行分析）——用户界面。一旦请求更改，它可能会通过数据库中的副作用进一步转换，从而产生更多修改。这些副作用是将数据库的不同部分联系在一起的约束，因此对一个部分的更改会导致对其他部分的更改。此类约束属于数据库，是更改的一个组成部分，因此数据库可以保证它们的统一和一致应用。原始更改与约束的影响相结合，形成一组受约束的更改，应保留这些更改以备可能的撤销。撤消控制也属于数据库，因为设计系统中可能存在许多更改源，所有这些更改源都希望保证可以撤消。因此，数据库修改实际上涉及更改界面、约束满足和撤消控制。

The last general issue in representation to be discussed here is the control of changes. These changes come from the synthesis tools, from the analysis tools, and from that most advanced tool of all, which does both synthesis and analysis, the user interface. Once a change is requested, it might be further transformed by side effects within the database that produce more modification. These side effects are constraints that tie together different pieces of the database so that a change to one results in a change to the others. Such constraints belong in the database as an integral component of change so that the database can guarantee their uniform and consistent application. The original change, combined with the effects of constraints, forms a constrained set of changes that should be retained for possible reversal. Undo control also belongs in the database because there may be many sources of change in the design system, all of which wish to guarantee that undo will be possible. Thus database modification actually involves a change interface, constraint satisfaction, and undo control.

数据库修改的接口应该是一组简单的例程。当表示由具有属性的对象组成时，有创建和删除对象以及创建、删除和修改属性的例程就足够了。然而，在实践中，有不同类型的对象具有不同的属性，因此将存在特殊的接口来操作每个对象。此外，一些属性是成组的，应该一起修改。例如，一个改变对象大小的例程将影响许多坐标属性，如边界区域、角位置和纵横比。虽然这些副作用可以通过约束来实现，但效率考虑决定了存在单独的例程来实现经常使用的功能。

The interface to database modification should be a simple set of routines. When the representation consists of objects with attributes, it is sufficient to have routines to create and delete objects and to create, delete, and modify attributes. In practice, however, there are different types of objects with differing attributes, so special interfaces will exist to manipulate each object. Also, some attributes come in sets and should be modified together. For example, a single routine to change the size of an object will affect many coordinate attributes, such as the bounding area, the corner positions, and the aspect ratio. Although these side effects can be implemented with constraints, efficiency considerations dictate that separate routines exist to implement the frequently used functions.

在 VLSI 设计系统中，应该为电路元件的基本方面提供操作例程。这意味着应该有用于操作层次结构、视图、连接性和几何图形的接口。层次结构操作需要例程来创建和删除单元定义及其实例。视图操作需要例程来处理整个数据库中的对应指针。连接性操作意味着有例程来创建和删除组件和电线。最后，几何操作需要例程来改变对象的物理外观。

In a VLSI design system, manipulation routines should be provided for the basic aspects of circuit elements. This means that there should be interfaces for manipulating hierarchy, views, connectivity, and geometry. Hierarchy manipulation requires routines to create and delete cell definitions and their instances. View manipulation requires routines to deal with correspondence pointers throughout the database. Connectivity manipulation means having routines to create and delete components and wires. Finally, geometry manipulation needs routines to alter the physical appearance of an object.

 

 

3.2.8 约束

3.2.8 Constraint

约束可以以多种不同的形式出现。通常，通过在对象上放置守护进程来约束对象，守护进程会检测对象的更改并在数据库的其他位置生成更改。当两个对象受到约束以至于彼此影响时，可以使用单个守护进程，该守护进程被反转以对两个对象产生约束。例如，如果两个对象被约束为相邻，则移动其中一个对象都会调用约束来移动另一个对象。更复杂的约束可能涉及三个或更多属性。一个例子是简单的加法，其中一个属性被约束为另外两个属性的总和。如果任何属性发生变化，则其中一个或两个其他属性都必须调整。

Constraint can appear in a number of different forms. Typically, an object is constrained by placing a daemon on it, which detects changes to the object and generates changes elsewhere in the database. When two objects are constrained such that each one affects the other, then a single daemon can be used that is inverted to produce a constraint for both objects. For example, if two objects are constrained to be adjacent, then moving either one will invoke a constraint to move the other. A more complex constraint can involve three or more attributes. An example of this is simple addition, in which one attribute is constrained to be the sum of two others. If any attribute changes, one or both of the others must adjust.

通过要求某些限制，可以简化约束规范。当约束多个对象时，一种方法是要求每个对象使用单独的约束规则，以便始终有一个规则等待任何更改 [Batali and Hartheimer；Steele]。例如，当三个属性受到约束时，必须为每个属性出现一条规则，指定当发生变化时其他两个属性会发生什么（参见图 3.7）。如果不这样做，数据库将不得不弄清楚如何通过反转一个规则来获得另一个规则，以满足约束。简化约束规范的另一种方法是将允许的约束限制为一个简单且可解的集合。Juno设计系统仅允许两个约束：平行度和等距 [Nelson]。Electric设计系统具有轴正交性和刚性的有限约束（参见第 11 章）。这些约束足够简单，不需要复杂的规则反转，因为所有规则及其逆都是先验已知的。

Constraint specification can be made simple by demanding certain restrictions. One way to do this, when constraining more than one object, is to require a separate constraint rule on each object so that there is always a rule waiting for any change [Batali and Hartheimer; Steele]. For example, when three attributes are constrained, a rule must appear for each one specifying what will happen to the other two when a change occurs (see Fig. 3.7). If this is not done, the database will have to figure out how to satisfy the constraints by inverting one rule to get the other. Another way to simplify constraint specification is to restrict the allowable constraints to a simple and solvable set. The Juno design system allows only two constraints: parallelism and equidistance [Nelson]. The Electric design system has the limited constraints of axis orthogonality and rigidity (see Chapter 11). These constraints are simple enough that no complex rule inversion is needed because all rules and their inverse are known a priori.

目的  改变  约束
一个：一个碳原子数=碳原子数+原子数
乙：乙C=C+ B
回答：碳A=A+ C/2
B = B + C / 2
图 3.7 “A + B = C”的约束规则。

更复杂的约束系统的优点是允许用户构建强大的设计工具。在Sketchpad [Sutherland] 和 ThingLab [Borning] 中可以找到完全的约束灵活性。这些约束是通用的编程语言表达式，通过预编译以提高效率并使用错误项来指示满意度的质量来解决。此类约束的求解并不能保证，而且可能非常耗时（有关约束求解的讨论， 请参阅第 8 章“可编程性”）。

More complex constraint systems have the advantage of allowing the user to build powerful design facilities. Total constraint flexibility can be found in Sketchpad [Sutherland] and ThingLab [Borning]. These constraints are generalized programming-language expressions that are solved by precompiling them for efficiency and by using error terms to indicate the quality of satisfaction. Solution of such constraints is not guaranteed and can be very time consuming (see Chapter 8, Programmability, for a discussion of constraint solving).

约束的表示可以采用多种形式。在 Juno 和 Electric 等有限约束系统中，约束只是约束对象上的一组标志。在更复杂的系统中，约束是执行以产生解决方案的子程序。这些数据库守护进程检测对约束对象的更改并追求约束效果。除了用于存储和检测约束的方法外，还必须有特殊的结构来帮助应用约束。例如，应该有属性来防止约束循环无限地应用同一组操作。对象上的时间戳可用于快速检测约束何时已执行并正在第二次运行。当检测到这样的循环时，表明数据库可能受到过度约束，需要采取特殊措施。

Representation of constraint can take many forms. In limited-constraint systems such as Juno and Electric, the constraints are simply sets of flags on the constrained objects. In more complex systems, the constraints are subroutines that are executed in order to yield a solution. These database daemons detect changes to constrained objects and pursue the constrained effects. In addition to methods for storing and detecting constraints, there must be special structures to aid in constraint application. For example, there should be attributes to prevent constraint loops from infinitely applying the same set of actions. A time stamp on an object can be used to detect quickly when a constraint has already executed and is being run for the second time. When such a loop is detected, it indicates that the database may be overconstrained and that special action is necessary.

 

 

3.2.9 撤消

3.2.9 Undo

当确定了所请求的更改及其所有结果约束后，系统将剩下一组对数据库的约束更改。其中一些是明确给出的，另一些是约束的隐式结果。隐式结果应返回到调用更改的子系统。但是，这些结果可能与显式更改混在一起，如果顺序混乱，可能毫无意义。因此，必须按正确的顺序收集更改，无论更改是直接来自应用程序还是来自内部约束。然后应将完整的更改集呈现给应用程序子系统，然后应用程序子系统可以看到总体效果。可以建立一个统一的子程序接口来广播更改，并且它应该模仿用于请求更改的接口。

When a requested change and all its resulting constraints have been determined, the system is left with a set of constrained changes to the database. Some of these were explicitly given and others were the implicit results of constraints. The implicit results should be returned to the subsystem that invoked the change. However, these results may be intermingled with the explicit changes and may make no sense when out of order. For this reason, changes must be collected in the proper sequence, regardless of whether the change came directly from the application program or from internal constraints. The complete set of changes should then be presented to the application subsystem, which can then see the total effect. A uniform subroutine interface can be established for broadcasting changes, and it should mimic the one that was used to request the changes.

数据库还应保留收集到的更改集，以便可能撤消。为了实现这一点，必须保留更改的完整性质，以便可以恢复原始更改。最好的方法是将“更改”对象与每个数据库修改相关联，显示更改的内容和更改方式。更改对象可能包含修改之前的旧值，也可能以易于撤消的方式描述更改的性质。一个复杂之处在于，删除更改必须存储已删除对象的全部内容，以便在撤消删除时进行正确的重建。这不是很有效，因此删除通常只描述操作，指向已删除的对象，并在仍有可能撤消删除时延迟其实际销毁。

The collected set of changes should also be retained by the database for possible undoing. In order to enable this, the complete nature of the change must be held so that the original can be restored. This is best accomplished by having a "change" object associated with every database modification, showing what was changed and how. The change object may contain old values from before the modification or it may describe the nature of the change in such a way that it can easily be reversed. One complication is that deletion changes will have to store the entire contents of the deleted object to allow for proper reconstruction when the deletion is undone. This is not very efficient, so deletions usually just describe the operation, point to the deleted object, and delay its actual destruction while there still is a chance that the deletion will be undone.

应用程序子系统请求的每项更改都会产生一批受约束的更改对象，这些更改对象按顺序组织在列表中。数据库应该能够通过向后追溯来撤消这批更改。真正强大的设计系统将允许撤消上一次更改以外的更改，并保留更改批次的有序历史记录，以便可以撤消任意远的更改。可以通过从历史记录列表中删除更改对象并将其替换为撤消集来实现撤消。这组撤消的更改可能更紧凑，因为它可以将多个更改合并为一个更改。在这种方案中，用户必须了解每次撤消更改的范围。此外，由于此方案允许通过撤消撤消来重做，因此必须小心防止不加区分地使用可能产生不一致数据库的功能。

Every change requested by an application subsystem results in a batch of constrained change objects, organized in an ordered list. The database should be able to undo such a batch of changes by tracing it backwards. A truly powerful design system will allow undoing of more than the last change and will retain an ordered history of change batches so that it can undo arbitrarily far back. Implementation of undo can be done by removing the change objects from the history list and replacing them with the undone set. This undone set of changes may be more compact because it may combine multiple changes into a single one. In such a scheme, users must understand the extent of each undo change. Also, because this scheme allows redo by undoing an undo, care must be taken to prevent indiscriminate use of the facilities that may produce an inconsistent database.

撤销控制的更好实现是备份历史列表而不创建新条目。重做只是简单地向前移动列表，进一步的撤销则向后移动。当引入新的更改时，历史列表将在当前点被截断并扩展，从而失去重做的能力。此方案为用户和实现者提供了一种更清晰的更改机制。

A better implementation of undo control is to back up through the history list without creating new entries. Redo is then a simple matter of moving forward through the list, and further undo moves farther backward. When a new change is introduced, the history list is truncated and extended at the current point, thus losing the ability to redo. This scheme provides a cleaner change mechanism for both the user and the implementor.

变更控制耗费时间和空间。解决约束并生成一致的数据库可能需要任意长的时间。此外，表示数据库变更也需要任意长的空间，尤其是当这些变更乘以约束效果并保存以备可能的撤消时。然而，这种变更机制所消耗的资源是值得的，因为它们使设计系统具有响应性和宽容性。

Change control is time and space consuming. It can take arbitrary amounts of time to solve constraints and produce a consistent database. Also it can take arbitrary amounts of space to represent database changes, especially when these changes are multiplied by constrained effects and saved for possible undo. However, the resources consumed by such a change mechanism are well worth the effort because they make the design system responsive and forgiving.

 

 

3.2.10 基础知识总结

3.2.10 Summary of Basics

到目前为止，本章已说明设计由具有属性的对象组成。为了获得最大的灵活性和效率，应使用固定记录条目、链接列表和属性哈希表来实现这些对象。对象从未使用的虚拟内存中分配，并以各种方式表示在磁盘上，以最适合计算机系统的性质。可以使用特殊技术来扫描和标记数据库。此外，更改、约束和撤消控制的表示是设计数据库的基本方面。

This chapter has shown so far that a design consists of objects with attributes. For maximum flexibility and efficiency, these should be implemented with fixed record entries, linked lists, and attribute hash tables. The objects are allocated from unused virtual memory and are represented on disk in a variety of ways to best suit the nature of the computer system. Special techniques can be used to scan and mark the database. Also, the representation of change, constraint, and undo control is a fundamental aspect of a design database.

本章的其余部分将讨论处理 VLSI 设计的四个方面的技术：层次结构、视图、连接性和几何。

The rest of this chapter will discuss techniques for dealing with the four aspects of VLSI design: hierarchy, views, connectivity, and geometry.

超大规模集成电路设计的计算机辅助
史蒂文·M·鲁宾
版权所有 © 1994

第三章：代表权

3.3 层次结构表示

3.3 Hierarchy Representation

必须表示的 VLSI 设计的第一个方面是层次结构。层次化布局将整个电路对象集合封装在单元定义中。这些单元的实例随后出现在其他单元中，这意味着它们的全部内容在每次出现时都存在。

The first aspect of VLSI design that must be represented is hierarchy. Hierarchical layouts have entire collections of circuit objects encapsulated in a cell definition. Instances of these cells then appear in other cells, which means that their entire contents exists at each appearance.

单元实例的表示可以用实例对象来完成。这些指向其单元定义的对象实际上是 复杂组件，与 NAND 门等原始组件不同 。复杂组件可以使用与原始组件相同的对象结构，但它们的原型对象具有不同的属性。例如，原始原型可能具有以图形方式描述它的属性，而复杂原型将包含一个列表头，用于标识单元内的子对象。虽然创建新的对象类型以便使用组件和实例进行设计很诱人，但如果仅使用组件，表示会更清晰，因为这样数据库对象更少，并且可以统一处理它们。

The representation of cell instances can be done with instance objects. These objects, which point to their cell definitions, are actually complex components, as opposed to primitive components such as the NAND gate. Complex components can use the same object structure as primitive components use, but their prototype objects have different attributes. For example, a primitive prototype may have attributes that describe it graphically, whereas a complex prototype will contain a list head that identifies the subobjects inside the cell. Although it is tempting to create a new object type so that design can be done with components and instances, the representation is much cleaner if only components are used because then there are fewer database objects and they can be treated uniformly.

图 3.8 层次 结构：（a）“Bignothing”的复杂原型（b）原始原型（c）“Something”的复杂原型（d）表示布局。

鉴于这种层次结构的统一表示，每个单元都是一个组件原型。在图 3.8 中，图 3.6的设计以其正确的视角显示为一个名为“Bignothing”的复杂原型。请注意，“Bignothing”中最右侧逆变器组件上的“Out”连接被导出并称为“Final”。其他单元可能包含“Bignothing”单元的实例，因此包括其内容。图 3.8(c) 中的“Something”单元有两个组件：一个是原始组件，另一个具有复杂原型。完整的布局显示在图的底部。

Given this uniform representation of hierarchy, every cell is a component prototype. In Fig. 3.8, the design of Fig. 3.6 is shown in its proper perspective as a complex prototype called "Bignothing." Note that the "Out" connection on the rightmost inverter component in "Bignothing" is exported and called "Final." Other cells may contain instances of the "Bignothing" cell, thus including its contents. The "Something" cell in Fig. 3.8(c) has two components: one that is a primitive component and one that has a complex prototype. The complete layout is shown at the bottom of the figure.

因为复杂组件原型是对象，所以在哪里存储它们的子对象列表头的问题就解决了。这些指针只是复杂组件原型对象中的属性。然而，一个新的问题又出现了：如何表示组件原型列表。要做到这一点，必须存在两种新的对象类型：环境和 库。环境是原始组件原型的集合，组织起来形成设计环境，如 第 2 章中讨论的那样。库是复杂组件原型或单元的集合，大概形成一致的设计。好的设计系统允许存在许多不同的环境，并允许操作多个库。图 3.9 显示了此类设计系统中对象的整体视图。环境提供构建块，这些构建块被组合成单元。然后，单元按层次结构放置在其他单元中，所有这些单元都以库的形式表示。因此，库对象集合包含特定设计中的所有有价值的东西。
图 3.9 环境和库：（a）环境（b）库。

尽管库提供了聚合单元集合的便捷方式，但可以使用更高级别的抽象来按设计者聚合库。在多人设计中，项目可以定义为许多人的作品的集合 [Clark and Zippel]。子项目确定个人的工作，并最终到达库和单元以描述实际设计。因此，层次结构可用于描述电路组织和人类组织。

Although libraries provide convenient ways to aggregate collections of cells, a further level of abstraction may be used to aggregate libraries by designer. In multiperson designs, a project can be defined to be a collection of works from many people [Clark and Zippel]. Subprojects identify the work of individuals and eventually arrive at libraries and cells to describe the actual design. Thus hierarchy can be used to describe both circuit organizations and human organizations.

超大规模集成电路设计的计算机辅助
史蒂文·M·鲁宾
版权所有 © 1994

第三章：代表权

3.4 视图表示

3.4 View Representation

必须表示的 VLSI 设计中的下一个方面是视图及其关系。视图的表示对每个视图使用不同的方法。布局视图需要几何表示，而示意图需要拓扑表示，这两者都将在以下章节中讨论。时间视图使用相对事件时间和信号值 [Arnold；Borriello]。所有这些视图都应该能够链接在一起以创建单个对象 [Zippel；Clark and Zippel]。良好的视图对应系统允许在数据库中统一、彻底地建立这些视图链接。

The next aspect of VLSI design that must be represented is views and their relationships. Representation of views makes use of different methods for each view. Layout views require geometric representations and schematic views require topological representations, both of which are discussed in the following sections. Temporal views make use of relative event times and signal values [Arnold; Borriello]. All of these views should be able to link together to create a single object [Zippel; Clark and Zippel]. A good view-correspondence system allows these view links to be established uniformly and thoroughly in the database.

目前还没有真正好的视图对应系统，因此它们的表示需求定义不明确。众所周知，必须提供任意信息才能进行正确的对应维护。结合本章中描述的其他表示功能，一些额外的属性类型应该可以满足这一需求。特别是，数据库必须能够链接在不同视图中完成的两个设计并充分描述它们的关系。

There are no truly good view-correspondence systems today, so their representational needs are ill-defined. What is known is that arbitrary information must be available to do proper correspondence maintenance. Combined with the other representational facilities described in this chapter, a few additional attribute types should fill the need. In particular, the database must be able to link two designs done in different views and to describe their relationship fully.

单元的链接是通过可以关联数据库中各种对象的指针属性来完成的。例如，两个在不同视图中表示相同电路的单元将各自具有标识另一视图中的单元的属性。单元内的组件和电线将具有将它们链接到另一视图中的对应项的属性。此指针信息跨层次结构链接数据库，以不同的布局样式显示相同的设计。如果视图差异太大以致无法关联公共单元，则必须表示进一步的指针信息。例如，算法和布局之间的链接必须识别文本方程及其等效组件。因此，视图所要求的功能是属性包含指向数据库中任何其他对象的指针的能力。

Linking of cells is done with pointer attributes that can relate the various objects in the database. For example, two cells that represent the same circuit in different views will each have attributes that identify the cell in the other view. Components and wires inside the cells will have attributes that link them to their counterparts in the other view. This pointer information links the database across hierarchies, showing the same design in different layout styles. If the views are so different as to be unable to associate common cells, then further pointer information must be represented. For example, the link between an algorithm and a layout will have to identify textual equations and their equivalent components. Thus the capability demanded by views is the ability for attributes to contain pointers to any other object in the database.

除了存储指针之外，拥有有意义的指针类也很有用。一个 CAD 数据库系统有三种不同的指针类型，可以描述一组丰富的关系 [Atwood]。a -part-of指针用于组合（“接触 7 是 Inverter 单元的一部分”）。an -instance-of指针用于类型限定（“组件 12 是 Inverter 单元的一个实例”）。最后，a-kind-of指针描述类别之间的关系（“Superbuffer 是一种 Inverter”）。通过允许多个 a-kind-of 链接并在链接对象中选择共同属性，数据库可以存储复杂而紧凑的描述。例如，Superbuffer 是一种 MOS 单元，但它也是一种 Inverter 和一种 Driver。主要的 a-kind-of 链接指向 MOS 单元，与 Inverter 和 Driver 的链接较弱，仅选择相关的属性。

Besides storing pointers, it is useful to have classes of pointers that carry meaning. One database system for CAD has three different pointer types that can describe a rich set of relationships [Atwood]. The a-part-of pointer is for composition ("contact 7 is a-part-of the Inverter cell"). The an-instance-of pointer is for type qualification ("component 12 is an-instance-of an Inverter cell"). Finally, the a-kind-of pointer describes relationships between categories ("Superbuffer is a-kind-of Inverter"). By allowing multiple a-kind-of links and selecting common attributes among the linked objects, the database can store a complex yet compact description. For example, Superbuffer is a-kind-of MOS cell, but it is also a-kind-of Inverter and a-kind-of Driver. The primary a-kind-of link is to MOS cell, with weaker links to Inverter and Driver, selecting only those properties that are relevant.

视图对应最重要的特征是其组件的多对一映射。单个对象可能具有指向多个其他对象的指针（见图 3.10）。简单的指针属性不足以实现这一点，因此需要构造一个数组来为一个属性提供多个指针。数组应该具有固定长度（长度存储在属性中）或可变长度（由空终止指针分隔，类似于链表中的指针）的能力。一维属性数组就足够了，因为更复杂的数据结构都可以存储为向量。
图 3.10 视图对应链接：（a）原理图（b）CMOS。

设计中使视图对应关系难以维持的方面是设计师不断重新排列视图之间链接的对象。这样做时，某些链接会暂时断开。属性必须能够跟踪此信息，以便可以检查和重建设计。因此，每个视图链接都需要额外的状态信息（指针有效/无效、设计师是否知道更改、更改的数据是 --- 等等），甚至还需要一个文本字段来记录关于视图的注释和评论。解决此问题的正确软件方法是使用结构化记录作为属性，以便将各种信息保存在一个地方。即使没有这种属性结构，也需要所有这些数据类型。文本消息属性对于设计文档很有用，整数数组可以保存任意信息，例如设计参数和状态表。所有这些在视图表示中都很有用。

The aspect of design that makes view correspondence hard to maintain is the fact that designers are constantly rearranging the objects that are linked between views. When this is done, some of the links are temporarily broken. The attributes must be able to track this information so that the design can be checked and reconstructed. Therefore every view link needs additional information for state (the pointer is valid/invalid, the designer is aware/unaware of the change, the data of the change is ---, and so on), and even a textual field in which notes and comments are made about the view. A proper software approach to this problem would use structured records as attributes so that the varying kinds of information could be kept in one place. Even without this structuring of attributes, it is necessary to have all these data types. A text-message attribute is useful for design documentation, and integer arrays can hold arbitrary information such as design parameter and status tables. All of this is useful in the representation of views.

超大规模集成电路设计的计算机辅助
史蒂文·M·鲁宾
版权所有 © 1994

第三章：代表权

3.5 连接表示

3.5 Connectivity Representation

3.5.1 节点、弧和端口

3.5.1 Nodes, Arcs, and Ports

网络为连通性提供了合适的表示。最常见的是，网络的 节点是电子元件，弧是连接线。有些系统将这种情况反转，将线表示为节点，将元件表示为弧 [Karplus]。在不失一般性的前提下，这里的讨论将采用前一种假设来展示网络如何表示连通性。

Networks provide a suitable representation for connectivity. Most commonly, nodes of a network are electronic components and arcs are connecting wires. Some systems reverse this to represent wires as nodes and components as arcs [Karplus]. Without significant loss of generality, the discussion here will adopt the former assumption to show how networks can represent connectivity.

在网络表示中，有两种类型的对象：节点和弧。每个弧对象恰好连接两个节点，因此它具有标识这两个对象的属性。但是，列出连接到节点的每条弧并不容易，因为节点可以拥有的连接数没有限制。除了需要无限的弧指针之外，可能还有其他属性信息与这些节点弧连接有关。因此，连接对象用于链接节点和弧，称为端口。端口是节点上弧连接的站点。通过在链接列表中拥有显式的端口对象，可以在节点上表示无限数量的连接弧并存储有关连接的任何信息。

In network representations, there are two types of objects: nodes and arcs. Each arc object connects exactly two nodes and so it has attributes that identify these two objects. However, it is not as easy to list every arc that connects to a node because there is no limit to the number of connections that a node can have. In addition to this need for unlimited arc pointers, there may be other attribute information associated with these node-arc connections. For this reason, a connection object is used to link nodes and arcs, called a port. A port is the site of an arc connection on a node. By having explicit port objects in a linked list, it is possible to represent an unlimited number of connecting arcs on a node and to store any information about the connection.

图 3.11 节点、弧和端口对象构成网络。

最基本的连接表示具有节点、弧和端口对象（见图 3.11）。图中的节点和弧对象都有名称，因此具有“name”属性，用于标识它们。这些对象还具有“link”属性，用于将它们收集到两个列表中，形成电路。这些列表的外部列表头是标识整个集合所需的全部内容。要将弧与节点链接起来，每个弧对象都有一个指向节点对象的“from”和“to”属性。此外，每个节点对象都有一个“first port”属性，该属性是端口对象列表的头部。如果没有连接到节点的弧（如图中的节点 E），则此字段为空，因为没有端口。对于每个连接的弧，都有一个包含指向该弧的指针的端口对象。端口对象还有一个“next port”属性，指向节点上链接列表中的下一个端口对象。当没有更多弧连接，因此也没有更多端口时，“next port”属性包含一个空值以终止列表。图 3.12 以更自然的方式显示了电路。
图 3.12 图 3.11 的网络。

当用几何和网络形式表示 VLSI 电路时，存在一个问题，即元件和导线的几何形状如何关联。由于导线连接到元件上，其几何形状将与元件的几何形状重叠。此外，当两条导线相交时，它们的几何形状在交点处必须正确。三种常用方法是将导线弄圆、导线延伸到端点之外一半的宽度以及导线在端点处干净地终止（见图 3.13）。如果没有延伸，导线相交处必须出现一些额外的几何形状才能建立正确的连接。如果这些额外的材料是圆形的，导线可以在所有角度相交。如果延伸一半的宽度，导线在正交方向上将正确相交。但是，在非正交角度相交的延伸导线必须延伸到导线宽度的零到一半之间的某个位置 [Mead and Conway]。半宽延伸方案的另一个问题是两条导线可能具有不同的宽度。在这种情况下，导线延伸长度应为最窄导线宽度的一半。
图 3.13 可能的电线几何形状：（a）末端为圆形的电线 (b) 延伸至其宽度一半的电线 (c) 终止于端点的电线。

连通网络的表示有些复杂。这种复杂性部分是为了满足任意电路大小容量的需求，部分是与其他表示需求配合的结果。

The representation of connected networks is somewhat complex. Part of this complexity is a response to the need for arbitrary circuit-size capacity and part is a result of cooperation with other representational needs.

超大规模集成电路设计的计算机辅助
史蒂文·M·鲁宾
版权所有 © 1994

第三章：代表权

3.6 几何表示

3.6 Geometry Representation

VLSI 设计需要表示的最后一个方面是其空间维度。必须有方便的方法来描述聚集在平行平面上的平面多边形对象。此外，必须组织这些对象以便高效操作和搜索。

The last aspect of VLSI design to be represented is its spatial dimensionality. There must be convenient ways to describe flat polygonal objects that are aggregated in parallel planes. In addition, the objects must be organized for efficient manipulation and search.

3.6.1 形状、变换和图形

3.6.1 Shape, Transformation, and Graphics

几何图形的实际表示由形状、变换和图形属性组成。形状属性包含有关对象的实际绘制的信息，可以用多种方式描述（见图 3.14）。给定一个形状类型属性和一个形状数据参数数组，就可以描述任何图形。这些形状参数应该用整数表示，因为整数运算在许多计算机上速度更快，并且不会受到不确定精度的影响。但是，程序员必须小心整数溢出，这在大多数计算机上都不会被注意到。此外，在使用整数时，应选择间距单位以允许最大精度，无论是现在还是将来。例如，如果数据库中的 1×1 正方形代表 1 平方微米，那么亚微米 IC 布局就不能用整数完成。最小可表示单位应与制造设备的最小单位尺寸相匹配。大多数 IC 掩模制造设备以厘米微米的精度工作，因此一个单位应该代表百分之一微米。在 PC 设计中，一个单位应该代表一微米。请注意，非常小的表示单位将导致非常大的值，这甚至可能溢出当今计算机上常见的 32 位整数。

Actual representation of geometry consists of shape, transformation, and graphical attributes. The shape attribute contains information about the actual drawing of the object and can be described in many ways (see Fig. 3.14). Given a shape-type attribute and an array of shape data parameters, any figure can be described. These shape parameters should be represented with integers because integer arithmetic is faster on many computers and does not suffer from uncertain precision. However, the programmer must beware of integer overflow, which goes unnoticed on most computers. Also, when using integers, the unit of spacing should be chosen to allow maximum accuracy, both now and in the future. For example, if a 1 × 1 square in the database represents 1 square micron, then submicron IC layout cannot be done with integers. The smallest representable unit should match the smallest unit size of the manufacturing device. Most IC mask-making equipment works at centimicron detail, so one unit should represent one-hundredth of a micron. In PC design, one unit should represent one micron. Be warned that very small units of representation will result in very large values, which can overflow even 32-bit integers, common on today's computers.

形状类型 形状参数
长方形中心，尺寸
多边形点数、点坐标
线开始、结束、厚度
圆圈中心、半径
弧中心、开始、结束
文本位置、消息、字体
图 3.14形状描述。

设计系统中常见的抽象是使用独立于实际间距的可扩展布局单元。Mead 和 Conway 创造了术语lambda ( ) 来描述设计中的单个距离单位。随着 的值变化，整个电路也会缩放。间距通常以 的整数倍表示，尽管也可以使用半个或四分之一单位。除了网格之外，对于某些任务来说，使用更粗的间距也很方便。几位研究人员独立发现，8网格适合放置单元 [Schediwy；Sproull 和 Sutherland]。

A common abstraction in design systems is to use a scalable layout unit that is independent of actual spacing. Mead and Conway coined the term lambda () to describe a single unit of distance in the design. As the value of varies, the entire circuit scales. Spacing is usually expressed in integer multiples of , although half and quarter units may be used. Besides a grid, it is also convenient to have coarser spacings for certain tasks. Several researchers have independently found that an 8 grid is appropriate for the placement of cells [Schediwy; Sproull and Sutherland].

在描述多边形形状时，一个问题是如何处理复杂的多边形，比如那些自相交的多边形。虽然这个问题有很多解决方案，但有一种解决方案是最合理的，尤其是对于 VLSI 设计 [Newell 和 Sequin]。如果一个点的 绕数为​​正（非零），则该点被定义为位于多边形内部。绕数是另一个点沿多边形周长行进并绕过该点的次数。除了这个正式定义之外，Newell 和 Sequin 还展示了如何绘制复杂的多边形并将其分解为更简单的多边形。

One issue that arises in the description of polygon shape is how to handle complex polygons such as those that intersect themselves. Although there are many solutions to this problem, one stands out as the most reasonable, especially for VLSI design [Newell and Sequin]. A point is defined to be inside a polygon if it has a positive (nonzero) winding number. The winding number is the number of times that another point, traveling around the perimeter of the polygon, wraps around the point in question. Besides this formal definition, Newell and Sequin show how complex polygons can be drawn and decomposed into simpler polygons.

变换属性表示对形状数据的修改。变换通常是线性的，这意味着形状可以旋转、平移或缩放。在二维域中，此信息可以用 3 × 3 浮点值矩阵表示。由于电路设计中不使用齐次坐标变换，因此只有该矩阵的左六个元素有效 [Newman and Sproull]。但是，方阵更易于操作，因此它们仍在使用。

Transformation attributes indicate modifications to the shape data. Transformations are typically linear, which means that the shape can be rotated, translated, or scaled. In a two-dimensional domain, this information can be represented with a 3 × 3 matrix of floating-point values. Since homogeneous coordinate transformations are not used in circuit design, only the left six elements of this matrix are valid [Newman and Sproull]. However, square matrices are easier to manipulate, so they continue to be used.

另一种很少用于 VLSI 设计中的变换是缩放。这是因为对象缩放主要是通过修改形状坐标而不是变换来完成的，并且屏幕缩放与对象表示是分开的。如果消除缩放，则数组元素将全部落入零到一的范围内，并且可以存储为定点整数。这使得大多数计算机上的变换操作更快。因此，包含平移和旋转的变换矩阵可以用六个整数表示。 第 9 章“图形”更全面地讨论了这些变换。

Another transformation that is rarely used in VLSI design is scaling. This is because object scaling is mostly done by modifying the shape coordinates rather than the transformations, and screen scaling is separate from the object representation. If scaling is eliminated, then the array elements will all fall into the range of zero to one and can be stored as fixed-point integers. This makes transformation operations faster on most computers. Thus a transformation matrix containing translation and rotation can be represented with six integers. Chapter 9, Graphics, discusses these transformations more fully.

几何表示的最后一个方面是描述对象视觉品质的图形属性。示例如图 3.15 所示。请注意，这与形状不同，因为这些图形属性与坐标值无关，可以应用于任何几何对象。图形属性描述一个对象，以便将其与重叠的其他对象区分开来。使用形状、变换和图形这三个几何属性可以描述任何几何对象。

The final aspect of geometric representation is graphical attributes that describe the visual qualities of an object. Examples are shown in Fig. 3.15. Note that this is different from shape because these graphical attributes are independent of coordinate values and can apply to any geometric object. Graphics attributes describe an object so that it can be distinguished from others that it overlaps. With the three geometric attributes of shape, transformation, and graphics any geometric object can be described.

属性参数
颜色红、绿、蓝
质地图案
已填写布尔值
遮罩层  层数
图 3.15图形属性。

 

 

3.6.2 方向限制

3.6.2 Orientation Restriction

在 VLSI 设计中经常发现的一个限制是对对象可能具有的方向的限制。由于任意旋转需要先验数学，因此允许它们的系统通常比仅允许一组固定方向的系统更复杂。对可能的方向的限制将使表示更紧凑和更快。但是，只有当设计环境适合此类限制时才应使用限制。

One limitation that is often found in VLSI design is a restriction on the possible orientations that an object may have. Since arbitrary rotation requires transcendental mathematics, systems that allow them are usually more complex than those that allow only a fixed set of orientations. A limit to the possible orientations will make the representation more compact and faster. However a limit should be used only if the design environment lends itself to such restrictions.

在某些 VLSI 布局中，所有几何形状都必须是曼哈顿形，这意味着边缘与x轴和y轴平行。每个多边形都是一个矩形，只能以八种方式中的一种定向（见图 3.16）。如果矩形的内容是均匀的，则无需进行变换，因为所有方向都只是形状的变化。只有在变换详细组件或单元实例时才会使用这八个方向。
图 3.16 曼哈顿方向。

在其他 VLSI 设计环境中，必须提供 45 度角。这是曼哈顿几何中方向数量的两倍，基本上是此类布局的极限。尽管一些综合工具可以生成任意角度的几何图形（有时称为波士顿 几何 [Bryant]），但设计师很少使用这种工具。原因是许多 IC 工艺不存在任意角度的设计规则，即使存在，也很难检查，只有计算机才能生成无错误的布局。

In other VLSI design environments it is necessary to provide 45-degree angles. This is double the number of orientations in Manhattan geometry and is essentially the limit at which such layout is done. Although some synthesis tools generate geometry at arbitrary angles, sometimes called Boston geometry [Bryant], designers rarely use such a facility. The reason is that arbitrary-angle design rules do not exist for many IC processes and, if they did, would be so difficult to check that only a computer could produce error-free layout.

在原理图设计等非 IC 环境中，几何图形可以以任意角度出现。但是，甚至可以使用曼哈顿规则，而且通常更受欢迎，因为它们使布局看起来更清晰（见图 3.17）。如果需要完全的方向灵活性，曼哈顿旋转仍然可以编码为特殊情况。然后可以用 3 × 3 矩阵表示完整变换，但矩阵中未使用的条目之一表示曼哈顿方向的特殊情况。

In non-IC environments such as schematic design, the geometry can appear at arbitrary angles. However, even Manhattan rules can be used and are often preferred because they make the layout look cleaner (see Fig. 3.17). If total flexibility of orientation is desired, the Manhattan rotations can still be coded as special cases. Full transformations can then be represented with 3 × 3 matrices, but one of the unused entries in the matrix indicates the special cases of Manhattan orientation.

图 3.17 几何限制决定了布局的外观：(a) 任意角度 (b) 曼哈顿。

 

 

3.6.3 几何代数

3.6.3 Geometry Algebra

要超越几何表示的基本属性，就必须考虑对这些对象执行的操作类型。几何代数就是这样一种操作。这组操作对对象形状执行并集、交集、扩展和收缩。并集操作通常用于将两个相邻的形状合并为一个。交集用于查找两个形状的公共区域，通常用于消除冗余。扩展和收缩操作将形状的边缘推离或推向中心。

To go beyond the basic attributes of geometric representation, it is necessary to consider the kinds of operations that will be performed on these objects. One such operation is geometry algebra. This set of operation performs union, intersection, expansion, and contraction on object shapes. Union operations are typically used to merge two adjoining shapes into one. Intersection is used to find the common area of two shapes, often for the purpose of eliminating redundancy. Expansion and contraction operations push the edges of a shape away from or toward the center.

这些操作的组合非常强大。例如，设计规则检查通常是通过将对象扩展其最小间距，然后查找与其他对象的相交区域来完成的。这些区域是设计规则违规。扩展和收缩用于补偿：制造的预处理步骤，可解决制造中的不准确性。甚至有 VLSI 数据库需要这些代数函数。例如，Caesar [Ousterhout 81] 在其数据库中表示矩形，并使用相交测试来确保在进行更改时矩形不冗余。 有时需要非冗余数据库，而且通常是首选。这是因为它们存储的信息较少，并且分析所需的时间较短。

Combinations of these operations can be very powerful. For example, design-rule checking is often done by expanding an object by its minimum spacing distance and then looking for areas of intersection with other objects. These areas are the design-rule violations. Expansion and contraction are used in compensation: a preprocessing step to fabrication that accounts for inaccuracies in manufacturing. There are even VLSI databases that require these algebra functions. For example, Caesar [Ousterhout 81] represents rectangles in its database and uses intersection tests to keep the rectangles nonredundant whenever changes are made. Nonredundant databases are occasionally required and often preferred. This is because they store less information and their analysis takes less time.

形状表示形式有很多种，每种形式都有自己的代数操作方法。曼哈顿矩形易于修改。边角为 45 度的多边形更复杂 [Lanfri]。任意角度的多边形最复杂，但通常用阶梯式曼哈顿矩形来近似 [Batali and Hartheimer]。圆、弧和圆锥曲线需要一组单独的几何算法，与多边形表示混合时会变得更加复杂。同样，许多曲线形状都是用多边形近似的 [Whitney]。应允许用户控制曲线近似的粒度，以便产生必要的平滑度。

There are many forms of shape representation and each has its own methods of being algebraically manipulated. Manhattan rectangles are simple to modify. Polygons with 45-degree sides are more complex [Lanfri]. Arbitrary-angle polygons are the most complex but are often approximated with stair-stepped Manhattan rectangles [Batali and Hartheimer]. Circles, arcs, and conics demand a separate set of geometric algorithms, and become even more complex when mixed with polygonal representations. Here again, many curved shapes are approximated polygonally [Whitney]. The user should be allowed to have control over the grain of curve approximation so that the necessary smoothness can be produced.

多边形包 [ Barton 和 Buchanan] 可执行所有几何代数函数，此外，还允许使用直线和曲线描述多边形边界。 这些线的多个集合即表 (sheet)，可以聚合起来定义有孔的多边形。这个系统最有趣的表示方面是将相邻线对、两对线集、四对线集等组织成二叉树 ( binary tree)。每棵树的顶部包含整个多边形，树的每个下层都有一个包含其线的边界框。这允许通过搜索快速找到多边形相交处所涉及的特定线。

The Polygon Package [Barton and Buchanan] performs all the geometric algebra functions and, in addition, allows both straight and curved lines to be used in the description of polygon boundaries. Sheets, which are multiple collections of these lines, can be aggregated to define polygons with holes. The most interesting representational aspect of this system is the organization of pairs of adjacent lines, sets of two pairs, sets of four pairs, and so on into a binary tree. The top of each tree encloses an entire polygon and each lower level of the tree has a bounding box that encloses its lines. This allows a search to rapidly find the specific lines involved in polygon intersections.

另一种用于存储多边形信息的有用技术是 翼边表示法 [Baumgart]。这种表示法通过共享公共边和顶点来捕获多边形之间的相互关系。因此，两个多边形边界上的一条线将指向彼此，并且还将链接到两个多边形上的前一条和后一条边。这种丰富的信息在三维多边形表示中特别有用，在二维 CAD 世界中可以稍微简化。

Another useful technique for storing polygonal information is winged-edge representation [Baumgart]. This representation captures the interrelation of polygons by sharing common edges and vertices. Thus a line on the border of two polygons will point to each one and will also be linked to the previous and subsequent edges on both polygons. This abundance of information is particularly useful in three-dimensional polygonal representations and can be simplified somewhat in the two-dimensional CAD world.

 

 

3.6.4 搜索

3.6.4 Search

搜索是对几何表示要求最高的操作。两个重要的操作是搜索对象的邻居和搜索给定点或区域的所有对象。提高效率的方法是将排序的邻接关系存储在表示中，这样在搜索过程中就不必确定这些信息。这种邻接关系在进行更改时需要花费时间进行计算，但以后会节省大量时间。

Search is the operation that places the greatest demands on the geometric representation. Two operations that are important are the search for the neighbors of an object and the search for all objects at a given point or area. The way to make this efficient is to store sorted adjacency in the representation so that this information does not have to be determined during the search. Such adjacency will take time to compute when changes are made but will save much time later.

问题在于确定要表示什么形式的邻接关系。如果几何对象按其中心排序，则没有关于其范围的信息，并且关系信息将无法正确传达对象位置。例如，图 3.18 显示了两个多边形，其中心坐标不表示x轴上的空间顺序。要表示的正确信息是边界。通过存储排序的边，遍历边列表将精确识别给定邻域中的对象。
图 3.18 基于中心的对象排序对于搜索来说是无用的。

排序边的最简单表示是按照边顺序排列的对象链接列表。一个列表只能沿一个轴对边进行排序。因此需要两个列表：一个用于覆盖水平边，另一个用于覆盖垂直边。在某些情况下，列表可能需要区分对象的两侧。这意味着水平边列表实际上是两个列表：一个包含顶部边，一个包含底部边。对于非矩形对象，使用最小边界矩形。这些列表可用于界定邻域，因为当对象的近边超出搜索范围时，该方向列表上的其余对象也超出范围。例如，在搜索 5 x 10 范围内的所有对象时，程序搜索左侧列表，直到所有对象边界都小于 5，然后搜索右侧列表，直到所有对象边界都大于 10。这种技术的问题在于每个对象都被表示多次，因此在搜索过程中会反复检查。因此，当搜索某个区域内的所有物体时，左、右列表不会提供有关物体垂直位置的信息，因此对这些列表的扫描不会局限于上下方向。只有巧妙地使用这些列表才能避免浪费。例如，如果搜索区域的高度大于宽度，则应使用左、右边缘列表，因为它们的选择效果更好。

The simplest representation of sorted edges is a linked list of objects according to edge order. One list can order the edges along only one axis. Therefore two lists are needed: one to cover horizontal edges and a second list to cover vertical edges. In some circumstances, the lists may need to distinguish between the two sides of an object. This means that the horizontal-edge list is actually two lists: one with the top edges and one with the bottom edges. For nonrectangular objects, a minimum bounding rectangle is used. These lists can be used to delimit a neighborhood because, when the near edge of an object extends beyond the bounds of the search, then the remaining objects on that direction's list are also out of range. For example, when searching for all objects in the range of 5 x 10, the program searches the left list until all objects bounds are less than 5 and then searches the right list until all objects bounds are greater than 10. The problem with this technique is that every object is represented multiple times and so it will be examined repeatedly during the search. Thus when a search for all objects in an area is conducted, the left and right lists will give no information about the vertical position of an object, so a scan of these lists will not limit itself in the up and down directions. Only by clever use of these lists can waste be prevented. For example, if the area of search is taller than it is wide, then the left- and right-edge lists should be used since they will do a better job of selection.

树是一种显而易见且常用的表示方法。二叉树将表示的对象分成两半，然后将每一半再分成子半，直到每个单独的对象都位于树的叶子上。对于二维表示，四叉树将空间分成四个部分（沿每个轴分成两半），然后将每个象限进一步分成子象限，直到每个对象都正确放置在树中。通常，要存储在四叉树中的矩形将放置在完全包含其面积的最低级别。这意味着沿任一轴居中的矩形不会完全位于任何象限中，并且将存储在树的顶部。由于无法适应数据的需求，这种效率损失在整个四叉树中都会发生。一种四叉树实现在每个象限内使用x 和y二叉树来增强空间组织，以便在选择象限后加快对对象的搜索速度 [Kedem]。四叉树的唯一显着优势是能够使用坐标值的二进制属性有效地寻址 [Reddy and Rubin; McCreight]。x和y坐标的高位被连接成一个两位数，该数字索引四个顶层象限之一；下一位用于选择下一个子象限。给定适当的四叉树组织，寻址可以仅通过位操作来完成。

The tree is an obvious and well-used representation. Binary trees divide the represented objects in half and then divide each half into subhalves until each individual object is at a leaf of the tree. For two-dimensional representation, the quad-tree divides space into four parts (in half along each axis) and then each quadrant is further divided into subquadrants until each object is placed properly in the tree. In general, a rectangle to be stored in a quad-tree will be placed at the lowest level that completely contains its area. This means that a rectangle that is centered along either axis will not be wholly in any quadrant and will be stored at the top of the tree. This loss of efficiency occurs throughout the quad-tree because of its inability to adapt to the needs of the data. One quad-tree implementation augments the spatial organization with x and y binary trees inside each quadrant to speed the search of objects once the quadrant is selected [Kedem]. The only significant advantage of quad-trees is their ability to be addressed efficiently using the binary properties of coordinate values [Reddy and Rubin; McCreight]. The high bit of the x and y coordinate are concatenated into a two-bit number that indexes one of the four top-level quadrants; the next bit down is used to select the next subquadrant. Given proper quad-tree organization, addressing can be done exclusively with bit manipulation.

空间组织的另一种表示法称为 角拼接[Ousterhout 84]。在其中，布局中的所有空间都存储为不重叠矩形的完美平铺区域。即使是空白区域也有矩形划定界限。然后，这些区域矩形具有将其角连接到相邻区域矩形的指针：左下角指向下方和左侧的矩形；右上角指向上方和右侧的矩形（见图 3.19）。使用这种表示法，找到对象的邻域并遍历指针以在选定坐标处搜索对象相当简单。但是，为了表示在不同层上重叠的布局，必须使用这些矩形的多个“平面”。此外，该表示法主要用于曼哈顿几何，在以其他方式使用时会变得复杂。
图 3.19 角缝。

存储和搜索空间对象的最佳表示可能是使用R 树[Guttman]。此结构是高度平衡的树，其中所有叶节点都处于相同的深度并包含空间对象。树中较高的节点还存储紧密包围下方叶对象的边界信息。所有节点都包含M到 2 M个条目，其中M通常为 25。两个节点的边界框可能会重叠，这允许存储任意结构（见图 3.20）。搜索点或区域是一个简单的递归遍历树以收集适当的叶节点。
图 3.20 R 树组织：（a）空间排序（b）树表示。

对于 R 树来说，插入和删除可能是复杂的操作。要插入新对象，需要从树的顶部开始搜索；在每一层，选择添加后扩展最少的节点。到达底部后，如果对象合适，则将其添加到列表中。当没有更多空间时，必须将底部节点一分为二，这会将新元素添加到下一个更高的节点。这可能会递归到顶部，在这种情况下，树会变得更深。拆分节点是通过找到沿任何维度相距最远的两个对象，然后根据最小边界扩展规则对剩余对象进行聚类来完成的。

Insertion and deletion can be complex operations for R-trees. To insert a new object, the tree is searched from the top; at each level, the node that would expand least by the addition is chosen. When the bottom is reached, the object is added to the list if it fits. When there is no more room, the bottom node must be split in two, which adds a new element to the next higher node. This may recurse to the top, in which case the tree becomes deeper. Splitting a node is done by finding the two objects farthest apart along any dimension, and then clustering the remaining objects according to the rule of minimal boundary expansion.

R 树删除操作只需移除条目即可完成。但是，如果移除操作导致节点中的对象太少（小于M），则删除整个节点，并使用上一段中描述的算法重新插入剩余的有效对象。删除节点可能会导致下一个更高节点也包含太少的对象，在这种情况下，删除操作会重复进行，并可能导致树变短。对象大小更新需要删除并重新插入。

R-tree deletion is done simply by removing the entry. If, however, the removal causes the node to have too few objects (less than M), then the entire node is deleted and the remaining valid objects are reinserted with the algorithm described in the previous paragraph. Deletion of a node may cause the next higher node also to contain too few objects, in which case the deletion recurses and may result in a shortened tree. Object-size updates require deletion and reinsertion.

无论空间表示如何，都可以通过提供对搜索区域中哪些对象的初始猜测来辅助搜索。当搜索涉及查找特定对象的邻居时，该对象可用作初始猜测。当寻找指定坐标处的对象时，最近选择的对象可用作搜索的初始猜测；设计师通常在一个很小的区域内工作，因此可以安全地假设下一个选择的对象将接近上一个选择的对象。这是局部性原理，它适用于许多任务。

Regardless of the spatial representation, search can be aided by providing an initial guess as to which objects are in the search area. When the search involves finding the neighbors of a particular object, that object is useful as the initial guess. When the object at a specified coordinate is sought, the most recently selected object can be used as the initial guess for the search; designers often work within a small area, so it is safe to assume that the next object selected will be close to the last object selected. This is the principle of locality and it applies to many tasks.

快速搜索要求有大量信息可用且可快速访问。这些信息必须组织良好，并且搜索的初始条件必须有利，才能实现这种速度。设计的许多方面都需要高效的搜索，这对良好的设计系统至关重要。

Speedy search requires that large amounts of information be available and rapidly accessible. This information must be organized well and the initial conditions for search must be favorable in order to achieve that speed. Efficient search is needed by many aspects of design and is crucial to a good design system.

超大规模集成电路设计的计算机辅助
史蒂文·M·鲁宾
版权所有 © 1994

第三章：代表权

3.7 总结

3.7 Summary

本章讨论了 VLSI 设计的表示。本章的前半部分介绍了任何设计任务的基本表示需求。本章的其余部分集中讨论了电路的具体表示：层次结构、视图、连接性和几何形状。完整的 VLSI 设计数据库的实现很复杂，但为本书其余部分描述的算法提供了必要的基础。

This chapter has discussed the representation of VLSI design. The first half of the chapter covered basic representational needs for any design task. The remainder of the chapter concentrated on the specific representations for circuitry: hierarchy, views, connectivity, and geometry. Implementation of a complete VLSI design database is complex but provides the necessary basis for the algorithms described in the rest of this book.

问题

Questions

  1. 什么时候数组是一个有用的结构？
  2. When is the array a useful structure?
  3. 除了缓解内存碎片化问题之外，将内存分配集中到单独的区域中还有什么好处？
  4. Besides relieving the problem of fragmented memory, what is another advantage of clustering memory allocation into separate arenas?
  5. 基于指针的表示如何能在磁盘和内存中保持相同？
  6. How could a pointer-based representation remain identical on disk and in memory?
  7. 让数据库管理变更控制有什么缺点？
  8. What is the disadvantage of having the database manage change control?
  9. 为了实现导线末端不超出其连接点的情形，某些系统会将连接点拉向中心，然后计算出一条法线，使其末端延伸其宽度的一半。这种方法可能会导致什么问题？
  10. To implement wires the ends of which do not extend beyond their connection point, some systems pull the connection points toward the center and then compute a normal wire that extends its ends by one-half of its width. What problems might this approach cause?
  11. 稀疏矩阵表示是否适用于 VLSI 几何？为什么或为什么不适用？
  12. Would sparse matrix representations work for VLSI geometry? Why or why not?
  13. 如何扩展角缝合来处理任意角度？
  14. How would you extend corner stitching to handle arbitrary angles?

  • Schediwy, Richard R.，《CMOS单元架构和库》，硕士论文，卡尔加里大学计算机科学系，1987年。
  • Schediwy, Richard R., A CMOS Cell Architecture and Library, Masters thesis, University of Calgary Department of Computer Science, 1987.
  • Sproull, Robert F. 和 Sutherland, Ivan E.，《异步系统 II：逻辑努力和异步模块》，即将出版。
  • Sproull, Robert F. and Sutherland, Ivan E., Asynchronous Systems II: Logical Effort and Asynchronous Modules, to be published.
  • Stamos, James W.，“大型面向对象虚拟内存：分组策略、测量和性能”，Xerox PARC SCG-82-2，1982 年 5 月。
  • Stamos, James W., "A Large Object-Oriented Virtual Memory: Grouping Strategies, Measurements, and Performance," Xerox PARC SCG-82-2, May 1982.
  • Steele, GL Jr.，《基于约束的计算机编程语言的定义和实现》，博士论文，麻省理工学院，1980 年 8 月。
  • Steele, G. L. Jr., The Definition and Implementation of a Computer Programming Language Based on Constraints, PhD dissertation, Massachusetts Institute of Technology, August 1980.
  • Sussman, Gerald Jay 和 Steele, Guy Lewis，《约束 - 一种用于表达近乎层次化描述的语言》，《人工智能》，14:1，1-39，1980 年 8 月。
  • Sussman, Gerald Jay and Steele, Guy Lewis, "CONSTRAINTS-A Language for Expressing Almost-Hierarchical Descriptions," Artificial Intelligence, 14:1, 1-39, August 1980.
  • Sutherland, Ivan E.，Sketchpad：人机图形通信系统，博士论文，麻省理工学院，1963 年 1 月。
  • Sutherland, Ivan E., Sketchpad: A Man-Machine Graphical Communication System, PhD dissertation, Massachusetts Institute of Technology, January 1963.
  • Weinreb, Daniel 和 Moon, David，《风格：Lisp 机器中的消息传递》，麻省理工学院人工智能实验室备忘录 #602，1980 年 11 月。
  • Weinreb, Daniel and Moon, David, "Flavors: Message Passing in the Lisp Machine," MIT Artificial Intelligence Lab Memo #602, November 1980.
  • Whitney，Telle，《VLSI 电路的层次组成》，博士论文，加州理工学院计算机科学系，报告 5189:TR:85，1985 年。
  • Whitney, Telle, Hierarchical Composition of VLSI Circuits, PhD dissertation, California Institute of Technology Computer Science, report 5189:TR:85, 1985.
  • Zippel, Richard，《VLSI 设计专家系统》，IEEE 国际电路与系统研讨会论文集，191-193，1983 年 5 月。
  • Zippel, Richard, "An Expert System for VLSI Design," Proceedings IEEE International Symposium on Circuits and Systems, 191-193, May 1983.

超大规模集成电路设计的计算机辅助
史蒂文·M·鲁宾
版权所有 © 1994

第 4 章：综合工具

Chapter 4: Synthesis Tools

4.1 简介

4.1 Introduction

VLSI 设计已经达到了大多数电路过于复杂而无法完全手工指定的地步。虽然可以使用计算机来记录布局，从而使设计更容易，但也可以对它们进行编程，使其通过进行综合或分析发挥积极作用。综合 工具会自动生成电路，而 分析工具 则会尝试验证手工设计的现有电路。本章介绍综合工具，接下来的两章专门介绍分析工具。

VLSI design has reached the point at which most circuits are too complex to be specified completely by hand. Although computers can be used to record layout, thus making design easier, they can also be programmed to take an active role by doing synthesis or analysis. Synthesis tools generate circuitry automatically and analysis tools attempt to verify existing circuitry that has been designed by hand. This chapter covers synthesis tools and the next two chapters are devoted to analysis tools.

综合工具并没有什么神奇之处；事实上，其中许多工具只是机器迭代的简单应用。当手动进行设计时，很容易发现重复性和规律性较高的领域，这些领域适合自动化。正是这些技术的结合，才开始让计算机在电路设计中显得更加智能。最终，如果有一个单一的综合工具可以根据电路的高级描述生成完整的布局，那将是很有价值的。这是当今硅编译器的目标，硅编译器是一些更简单工具的集合。但是，由于硅编译器尚未发展到可以取代所有其他工具的阶段，因此设计系统提供单独的综合工具以便可以有选择地使用它们非常重要。

There is nothing magical about synthesis tools; in fact many of them are simple applications of machine iteration. When design is done manually, it is easy to see areas of high repetition and regularity that lend themselves to automation. It is the combination of many of these techniques that begins to make computers appear intelligent in circuit design. Ultimately, it would be valuable to have a single synthesis tool that produces a complete layout from a high-level description of a circuit. This is the goal of today's silicon compilers, which are collections of simpler tools. However, since silicon compilers have not yet advanced to the stage at which they can replace all other tools, it is important for a design system to provide the individual synthesis tools so that they can be used selectively.
