  • Borriello, Gaetano; Katz, Randy H.; Bell, Alan G.; and Conway, Lynn, "VLSI System Design by the Numbers," IEEE Spectrum, 22:2, 44-50, February 1985.
  • Calma 公司，GDS II 流格式，1984 年 7 月。
  • Calma Corporation, GDS II Stream Format, July 1984.
  • CMC，《加拿大微电子公司集成电路实施服务指南》，版本 2:0，安大略省金斯顿，1986 年 1 月。
  • CMC, Guide to the Integrated Circuit Implementation Services of the Canadian Microelectronics Corporation, version 2:0, Kingston Ontario, January 1986.
  • Conway, Lynn；Bell, Alan；Newell, Martin E.，《MPC79：原型远程输入快速周转 VLSI 实现系统的演示操作》，麻省理工学院集成电路高级研究会议论文集，1980 年 1 月（亦转载于Lambda，1:2，10-19，1980 年第 2 季度）。
  • Conway, Lynn; Bell, Alan; and Newell, Martin E., "MPC79: The Demonstration-Operation of a Prototype Remote-Entry Fast-Turnaround VLSI Implementation System," Proceedings MIT Conference on Advanced Research in Integrated Circuits, January 1980 (also reprinted in Lambda, 1:2, 10-19, 2nd Quarter 1980).
  • 电子设计接口格式指导委员会， EDIF - 电子设计交换格式版本 100，德州仪器，德克萨斯州达拉斯，1985 年。
  • Electronic Design Interface Format Steering Committee, EDIF-Electronic Design Interchange Format Version 1 0 0, Texas Instruments, Dallas, Texas, 1985.
  • Factron，“CADDIF 2.0 版工程规范”，Schlumberger Factron，1985 年 10 月。
  • Factron, "CADDIF Version 2.0 Engineering Specifications," Schlumberger Factron, October 1985.
  • Gerber 公司，“Gerber 格式”，Gerber 科学仪器公司文件编号 40101-S00-066A，1983 年 7 月。
  • Gerber Corporation, "Gerber Format," Gerber Scientific Instrument Company document number 40101-S00-066A, July 1983.
  • Gross, AG；Raamot, J.；以及 Watkins, SB，《用于模式发生器控制的计算机系统》，《贝尔系统技术期刊》，49:9，2011-2029，1970 年 11 月。
  • Gross, A. G.; Raamot, J.; and Watkins, S. B., "Computer Systems for Pattern Generator Control," Bell Systems Technical Journal, 49:9, 2011-2029, November 1970.
  • Hellestrand, GR；Tan, CH；Yong, FN；以及 Forster, RL，《1982-1986 年澳大利亚多项目芯片活动》，新南威尔士大学联合微电子研究中心，1986 年 10 月。
  • Hellestrand, G. R.; Tan, C. H.; Yong, F. N.; and Forster, R. L., "Australian Multi-Project Chip Activities, 1982-1986", Joint Microelectronics Research Centre, University of New South Wales, October 1986.
  • Hon, Robert W. 和 Sequin, Carlo H.，《LSI 实施指南》，第 2 版，施乐帕洛阿尔托研究中心技术备忘录 SSL-79-7，1980 年 1 月。
  • Hon, Robert W. and Sequin, Carlo H., "A Guide to LSI Implementation," 2nd Edition, Xerox Palo Alto Research Center technical memo SSL-79-7, January 1980.
  • Johnson, Dean P. 和 Lipman, Jim，《IC 封装：VLSI 设计师入门》，《VLSI 系统设计》，VII:6，108-116，1986 年 6 月。
  • Johnson, Dean P. and Lipman, Jim, "IC Packaging: An Introduction For the VLSI Designer," VLSI Systems Design, VII:6, 108-116, June 1986.
  • Liblong, Breen M., SHIFT-VLSI 设计工具的结构化分层中间形式，硕士论文，卡尔加里大学计算机科学系，1984 年 9 月。
  • Liblong, Breen M., SHIFT-A Structured Hierarchical Intermediate Form for VLSI Design Tools, Masters Thesis, University of Calgary Department of Computer Science, September 1984.
  • 麦卡锡，约翰；亚伯拉罕斯，保罗 W.；爱德华兹，丹尼尔 J.；哈特，蒂莫西 P.；以及莱文，迈克尔 I.，《LISP 1.5 程序员手册》，麻省理工学院出版社，马萨诸塞州剑桥，1962 年。
  • McCarthy, John; Abrahams, Paul W.; Edwards, Daniel J.; Hart, Timothy P.; and Levin, Michael I., LISP 1.5 Programmer's Manual, MIT Press, Cambridge, Massachusetts, 1962.
  • MOSIS，MOSIS 用户手册，南加州大学信息科学研究所，1986 年。
  • MOSIS, MOSIS User's Manual, University of Southern California Information Sciences Institute, 1986.
  • Pieper, Chris，《刺激数据交换格式》，《VLSI 系统设计》，第一部分：VII:7，76-81，1986 年 7 月；第二部分：VII:8，56-60，1986 年 8 月。
  • Pieper, Chris, "Stimulus Data Interchange Format," VLSI Systems Design, Part I: VII:7, 76-81, July 1986; Part II: VII:8, 56-60, August 1986.
  • VLSI 设计人员，《CAE 工作站透视》，《VLSI 设计》，IV:4，52-74，1985 年 4 月。
  • VLSI Design Staff, "A Perspective On CAE Workstations," VLSI Design, IV:4, 52-74, April 1985.

超大规模集成电路设计的计算机辅助
史蒂文·M·鲁宾
版权所有 © 1994

第 8 章：可编程性

Chapter 8: Programmability

8.1 简介

8.1 Introduction

有许多因素决定了可设计的电路的大小和复杂性。其中一个主要因素是设计工具的质量和功能。生成器可以生成大型阵列，路由器和压缩器可以以特殊用途的方式处理大型布局，而硅编译器可以根据小型高级规范生成大量布局。生产大型电路的另一个因素是使用良好的设计技术，例如层次结构和模块化。然而，在许多大型设计工作中，总有一点需要更多的东西来帮助完成特殊用途的任务。

There are a number of factors that determine the size and complexity of circuits that can be designed. One major factor is the quality and power of the design tools. Generators can produce large arrays, routers and compacters can manipulate large layouts in special-purpose ways, and silicon compilers can produce great amounts of layout from small, high-level specifications. Another factor in the production of large circuits is the use of good design techniques such as hierarchy and modularity. However, there comes a point in many large design efforts where something more is needed to help with special-purpose tasks.

为了突破标准电路生产设施的限制，必须开发定制工具和技术。有时，这可以通过组合现有设施来实现，例如通过使用数组构造来帮助完成重复任务。更常见的是，它可以通过命令宏来实现，这些命令宏允许从更简单的命令构建复杂的操作。这仍然留下了一些未解决的问题。例如，如何使用一组普通的编辑命令来正确设计具有适当上拉和下拉比率的单元？当低级单元改变大小时，如何使用它们来调整整个层次结构的间距？这些问题和许多其他问题只有当可用命令提供编程语言的表达能力和功能时才能解决——当它们能够检查电路并做出适当的反应时。由于 VLSI 设计和计算机编程之间的相似性很强，因此编程实际上是一种设计技术也就不足为奇了。

To go beyond the limitations of standard circuit production facilities, it is necessary to develop custom tools and techniques. Occasionally, this can be done by combining existing facilities, for example by using array constructs to aid in repetitive tasks. More often it can be accomplished through command macros that allow complex operations to be built from simpler commands. This still leaves several unresolved issues. For example, how can an ordinary set of editing commands be used to design correctly a cell with proper pullup and pulldown ratios? How can they be used to adjust the spacing of an entire hierarchy when a low-level cell changes size? These issues and many others can be resolved only when the available commands provide the expressiveness and power of a programming language--when they are able to examine circuits and to react appropriately. Since the parallels between VLSI design and computer programming are strong, it should come as no surprise that programming is actually a design technique.

8.1.1 可编程性的二分法

8.1.1 Dichotomy of Programmability

在设计系统中，可编程性可以以两种形式出现：命令式或声明式。 命令式编程是常见的形式：一组显式命令，由设计人员调用时按顺序执行。 声明式编程是隐式执行命令，这些命令是其他设计活动的副作用。数据流编程是声明式的，因为执行由数据而不是代码顺序决定。设计环境中的声明式编程通常被视为约束或守护进程 ，因为命令驻留在电路的各个部分。图 8.1 说明了表达两个值之间关系的命令式和声明式方式。

Programmability can be found in two forms in a design system: imperative or declarative. Imperative programming is the usual form: an explicit set of commands that are sequentially executed when invoked by the designer. Declarative programming is the implicit execution of commands that result as a side effect of other design activity. Dataflow programming is declarative, because execution is determined by the data and not by the code order. Declarative programming in a design environment is often viewed as constraints or daemons because the commands reside on pieces of the circuit. Figure 8.1 illustrates the imperative and declarative ways of expressing a relationship between two values. 

至关重要的：
   如果 上拉比率 × 4下拉比率 那么
      上拉比率 = 下拉比率 / 4

声明式：
      上拉比率下拉比率 / 4
      下拉比率 上拉比率 × 4
Imperative:
   if pullup-ratio × 4  pulldown-ratio then
      pullup-ratio = pulldown-ratio / 4

Declarative:
      pullup-ratio  pulldown-ratio / 4
      pulldown-ratio  pullup-ratio × 4
图 8.1命令式代码与声明式代码。

除了设计系统中有两种编程形式外，这些程序还有两种表达方式。有些语言是纯文本的，因此一页代码定义一个电路。其他语言本质上是图形的，使用交互式显示来构建电路。文本设计语言在排序上往往主要是命令式的，带有一些声明性选项，而图形语言则相反，主要是声明式的，偶尔会有命令式部分。图 8.2 显示了表达图 8.1 中关系的图形方式。

In addition to there being two forms of programming in a design system, there are two ways that these programs can be expressed. Some languages are purely textual, such that a page of code defines a circuit. Others are graphic in nature, using an interactive display to build the circuit. Textual design languages tend to be primarily imperative in their sequencing, with a few declarative options, whereas graphic languages reverse this tendency, being mostly declarative with occasional imperative sections. Figure 8.2 shows graphic ways of expressing the relationships in Fig. 8.1.

图 8.2 命令式和声明式代码的图形化：（a）命令式（b）声明式。

 

 

8.1.2 添加可编程性

8.1.2 Adding Programmability

计算机编程的不幸之处在于它通常非常复杂，以至于设计师不会去学习它。这在图形设计系统中尤其如此，它允许设计师构建整个电路而无需编写任何代码。解决这个问题的方法是以一种受限的方式呈现编程，这种编程适合于设计任务，因此更容易学习。例如，如果命令界面允许宏、变量、代数表达式、条件和其他语言功能，那么它就足以表达任何算法。虽然使用这些功能构成了文本命令式编程，但它只是设计师已经熟悉的命令的扩展。这使得设计编程更容易学习，因为它只在需要时才进行。

The unfortunate aspect of computer programming is that it is often so complicated that designers do not learn to do it. This is especially true in graphic design systems, which allow the designer to build an entire circuit without needing to write any code. The solution to this problem is to present programming in a restricted sense that is tailored to the design task and thus is easier to learn. For example, if the command interface allows macros, variables, algebraic expressions, conditionals, and other language features, then it is powerful enough to express any algorithm. Although the use of these features constitutes textual imperative programming, it is merely an extension of commands that are already familiar to the designer. This makes design programming easier to learn because it can be done only when it is needed.

增加可编程性的另一种方法是提供约束结构作为布局的一部分。一个简单的例子是约束，即导线必须保持与其组件的连接，并且长度不能改变。约束通过调用其他更改来对电路中的变化做出反应。在此示例中，对一个组件的更改会触发更改导线的约束，然后触发影响另一个组件的反向约束。这种声明式编程比传统语言更直观，因为命令适合正在设计的电路并且是布局的自然延伸。

Another way to add programmability is to provide constraining structures as part of the layout. A simple example is the constraint that a wire must remain connected to its components, and not change length. Constraints react to changes in the circuit by invoking other changes. In this example, a change to one component fires a constraint that changes the wire, which then fires a reverse constraint that affects the other component. This declarative programming is more intuitive than are conventional languages because the commands fit into the circuit being designed and are a natural extension of the layout.

增加可编程性的最明显方法是提供完整的编程语言。许多系统从已知语言开始，然后添加宏或子程序以使其处理电路 [Batali 和 Hartheimer；Weste]。由此产生的编程语言被称为嵌入式语言， 因为它们添加了设计结构。还有一些设计语言是专门为设计任务创建的，但仍类似于完整的编程语言 [Sastry 和 Klein]。嵌入式语言的优势在于，已经存在关于新结构嵌入的语言的知识和经验体系。虽然原始语言通常是命令式的，但添加的设计结构可以是声明式的，具有影响电路结构的约束语句。

The most obvious method of adding programmability is to provide a full programming language. Many systems begin with known languages and add macros or subroutines to make them handle circuitry [Batali and Hartheimer; Weste]. The resulting programming languages are called embedded languages because they have added design constructs. There are also design languages that have been created exclusively for the design task but still resemble full programming languages [Sastry and Klein]. Embedded languages have the advantage that there is already a body of knowledge and experience about the language in which the new constructs are embedded. Although the original language is usually imperative, the added design constructs can be declarative, with constraint statements that affect the circuit structure.

 

 

8.1.3 层次结构

8.1.3 Hierarchy

可编程性中必须解决的另一个问题是层次结构的使用。文本编程语言可能会造成混淆，因为它们的代码层次结构可能与设计层次结构不同。干净的设计语言会将子例程等同于单元，以便每个代码例程都生成一个布局例程。当然，对于没有相应单元的辅助代码例程，必须做出例外。

Another issue that must be addressed in programmability is the use of hierarchy. Textual programming languages can be confusing because they may have a code hierarchy that is different from the design hierarchy. A clean design language will equate subroutines with cells so that each code routine generates exactly one layout routine. Of course, exceptions must be made for auxiliary code routines that have no corresponding cells.

信息在设计层次中流动的性质是提供可编程性时必须解决的一个主要问题。如果每个单元的编程都依赖于其周围的电路（在层次结构的较高位置处实例化），则编程将以标准子程序方式工作：调用时传递的参数（单元实例）影响子程序的特定版本（单元定义）。正如每个不同的子程序调用都会产生不同的执行顺序一样，每个不同的单元实例也会在电路的该点产生不同的布局。这种称为参数化单元的功能可实现 自上而下的可编程性，因为信息沿着设计层次结构传递以影响所有较低级别。它通常存在于文本设计系统中。

The nature of information flow through the design hierarchy is a major issue that must be addressed when providing programmability. If the programming of each cell is dependent on its surrounding circuitry where it is instantiated higher in the hierarchy, then the programming works in a standard subroutine fashion: Parameters passed at the call (the cell instance) affect that particular version of the subroutine (the cell definition). Just as each different call to a subroutine results in a different execution sequence, so each different instance of a cell will yield a different layout at that point in the circuit. This facility, called parameterized cells, results in top-down programmability because information is passed down the design hierarchy to affect all lower levels. It is commonly found in textual design systems.

设计可编程性的相反类型是自下而上，其中对单元定义的更改会影响所有实例，从而导致规范信息沿层次结构向上传递。在这种语言中，单元不可参数化，并且单元的所有实例都是相同的。这种层次结构管理存在于图形系统和那些没有可编程性的系统中，在这些系统中，对单元定义的更改只会导致每个实例的等效更改。通过使单元定义更改正确响应并对层次结构较高级别的实例周围的电路进行正确的更改，可以使自下而上的方案可编程。

The opposite type of design programmability is bottom-up, in which a change to a cell definition affects all the instances and thus causes specification information to be passed up the hierarchy. In such a language, cells are not parameterizable and all instances of a cell are identical. This kind of hierarchy management is found in graphic systems and in those systems without programmability in which changes to a cell definition merely result in equivalent changes to every instance. Bottom-up schemes can be made programmable by having cell-definition changes react properly and make correct alterations to the circuitry surrounding their instances at higher levels of the hierarchy.

本章的其余部分讨论了这里介绍的三个可编程性问题：命令式编程、声明式编程和层次结构。尽管许多 VLSI 设计师都是作为程序员接受培训的，但总会有人不喜欢编程并且不想明确地处理它。尽管如此，编程任务在所有设计系统中都存在一定程度，大多数人发现这种编程非常有用。编程的增强为生产力提供了强大的可能性。

The rest of this chapter discusses the three issues of programmability introduced here: imperative programming, declarative programming, and hierarchy. Although many VLSI designers have been trained first as programmers, there will always be those who dislike programming and do not want to deal with it explicitly. Nevertheless, programming tasks exist to a certain degree in all design systems and most people find this programming very useful. The enhancement of programming provides powerful possibilities for productivity.

超大规模集成电路设计的计算机辅助
史蒂文·M·鲁宾
版权所有 © 1994

第 8 章：可编程性

8.2 命令式编程

8.2 Imperative Programming

命令式程序是大多数程序员最熟悉的一种程序：按顺序执行从一个语句到下一个语句的算法。命令式语言用于三类活动：数据库创建、数据库重新格式化和设计系统控制。第一类活动通常被认为是程序化设计：发出诸如new-transistor(10, 50)放置和连接组件之类的语句。除了创建布局之外，这些硬件描述语言 还可用于通过切换原始库来生成电路的不同视图 [Holt 和 Sapiro]。命令式语言执行的第二项活动是检查和重新格式化数据库。这些格式化语言是必需的，因为工具接口和制造有如此多的不同电路描述格式。设计系统中的第三个可编程活动是执行和操作设计系统命令。这些命令语言的功能范围从最简单的控制到最完整的可编程性。

Imperative programs are the kind that most programmers know best: algorithms that execute sequentially from one statement to the next. Imperative languages are used for three classes of activity: database creation, database reformatting, and design-system control. The first activity is what is commonly thought of as programmed design: issuing statements such as new-transistor(10, 50) to place and connect components. Besides creating layout, these hardware-description languages can be used to produce different views of a circuit simply by switching primitive libraries [Holt and Sapiro]. The second activity done by imperative languages is the examination and reformatting of a database. These formatting languages are necessary because there are so many different circuit-description formats for tool interfacing and manufacturing. The third programmable activity in a design system is the execution and manipulation of design-system commands. These command languages can range in power from the simplest of control to the most complete of programmability.

为了提供命令式编程能力，设计系统必须支持一种可以与电路交互的语言。首选语言通常是设计系统自己的命令解释器，该解释器已经可以与电路交互。然而，这种语言很少足够强大。另一种方法是从一种已知的语言开始，然后将其扩展用于设计工作。最后一种选择是创建一种专门为电路设计的新编程语言，它不依赖于命令解释器的兼容性，可以根据特定的设计需求进行定制。

To provide an imperative-programming capability the design system must support a language that can interact with the circuit. The first choice of a language is often the design system's own command interpreter that can already interact with the circuit. However, such a language is rarely powerful enough. An alternative is to start with a known language and extend it for design work. The final option is to create a new programming language, devised specifically for circuitry, that does not depend on the command interpreter for compatibility and can be tailored for the particular design needs.

8.2.1 增强命令接口

8.2.1 Enhancing the Command Interface

实现所有必要设计活动完全可编程性的一个常见方法是增强设计系统的命令语言。事实证明，编程语言能够表达任何算法的两个必要特征是大量内存和条件表达式 [Turing]。因此，将命令接口转换为编程语言所需的只是添加变量和有条件地改变控制。然而，要使这种语言易于使用，还需要做更多的事情。

One common way to get full programmability for all the necessary design activities is to enhance the command language of the design system. It has been shown that the two characteristics necessary for a programming language to be able to express any algorithm are a vast amount of memory and a conditional expression [Turing]. Thus all that is needed to convert a command interface into a programming language is the addition of variables and a conditional change of control. However, much more is needed to make such a language convenient to use.

图灵程序的问题在于它们会变得难以管理，并且会占用过多的存储空间。造成这种情况的原因是缺乏结构。为了开发一个复杂的程序，重要的是要以层次结构来看待该程序（因此 VLSI 设计的课程又回到了原点，并教授了编程知识！）。层次结构只是构造编程活动的一种方式。它存在于共享公共代码的子程序或宏结构以及共享相关数据的记录或单元结构中。图 8.3 列出了其他构造方法，并展示了它们如何应用于编程和电路设计。更高级的结构化编程技术需要专门的结构来鼓励更易读的代码并允许更轻松地调试。显然，一整套语言结构为编写程序提供了最佳环境。

The problem with Turing's programs is that they grow to unmanageable size and consume excessive storage. The reason for this is the lack of structure. In order to develop a complex program it is important to view that program hierarchically (so the lesson of VLSI design comes full circle and teaches about programming!). Hierarchy is just one way of structuring programming activity. It is found in subroutine or macro structures that share common code, and record or cell structures that share related data. Figure 8.3 lists other structuring methods and shows how they apply to programming and circuit design. More advanced structured-programming techniques demand specialized constructs to encourage more readable code and permit easier debugging. Clearly, a full set of language constructs provides the best environment for writing programs.

  结构化  
  程序  
  程序  
  电路  
方法
代码
数据
设计
等级制度
子程序
记录
单元格
迭代
循环
数组
数组
模块化
参数
本地人
端口
抽象
宏
定义
多个视图
图 8.3结构化方法。

不幸的是，许多 CAD 系统事后才添加可编程性。这意味着用户界面包含两组不一致的命令：用于创建数据结构的设计命令和用于操作设计命令的编程命令。例如，一些早期系统具有与设计数据库完全分开的变量。这些“命令解释器”变量无法与实际设计结构交互，只能用于控制用于操作设计的其他交互式命令。在一个系统中，只能通过使用重复的“select”语句来搜索数据库，使用虚拟光标探测不同的物理位置。

Unfortunately, many CAD systems add programmability as an afterthought. This means that the user interface contains two distinct sets of commands that do not fit consistently: design commands to create the data structures and programming commands to manipulate the design commands. For example, some early systems had variables that were totally separate from the design database. These "command-interpreter" variables were unable to interact with the actual design structure and could be used only to control other interactive commands for manipulating the design. In one system, searching the database could be done only by the use of repeated "select" statements, probing different physical locations with an imaginary cursor.

为了改进这种临时编程接口，通常会编写宏包 来提供第三级命令接口，该接口位于原始命令之上并取代原始命令。结果是只有研究过所有细节的“巫师”才能理解正在发生的事情并维护这些包。这是因为 CAD 系统定义了一种只有少数人可以使用的新的、不一致的编程语言。

To improve this ad hoc programming interface, macro packages are often written to provide a third level of command interface that sits on top of, and replaces, the original commands. The result is that only "wizards," who have studied all of the details, can understand what is happening and maintain these packages. This is because the CAD system has defined a new and inconsistent programming language that only a few people can use.

扩展已知的命令接口通常不是一个好主意，因为兼容性要求太多。如果需要编程功能，则应以语言为中心，以编辑命令为外围进行规划。

Extending a known command interface is generally a bad idea because there are too many compatibility requirements. If a programming facility is desired, it should be planned with the language at the center and editing commands at the periphery.

 

 

8.2.2 扩展常规语言

8.2.2 Extending Conventional Languages

如果从一开始就将可编程性融入设计界面，结果几乎总是相同的：一种已知语言发展成为一种硬件描述语言。当将扩展添加到现有编程语言时，通用语法广为人知，扩展也更易于学习。通常，扩展将适合语言的风格，因此从语法上讲是有意义的。

When programmability is built into the design interface from the start, the result is almost always the same: A known language grows into a hardware-description language. When extensions are added to existing programming languages, the general syntax is widely known and the extensions are easier to learn. Typically, the extensions will fit the style of the language so that they make sense syntactically.

当然，如果语言不能很好地集成到设计系统中，即使是使用已知的编程语言，也会受到数据库分离的影响。无法访问数据库的语言的两个例子是 ICPL [Computervision] （BASIC扩展）和IAGL [Applicon] （PL/I扩展）。虽然GPL [Calma] 可以访问数据库，但是它的APL风格和特定的数据库接口让编程变得困难。Silicon Design Labs 提供了以C为模型的L语言，它可以访问数据库来创建布局 [Buric and Matheson]。CAE Systems 提供了三种语言，均以Ada为模型，每种语言都针对不同的功能进行定制 [CAE]。一种是命令语言，与数据库分离；另一种是硬件描述语言，与数据库集成以创建电路；第三种是格式化语言，用于与其他工具交互。

Of course, even the use of known programming languages can suffer from database detachment if the languages are not well integrated into the design system. Two examples of languages that cannot access the database are ICPL [Computervision], a BASIC extension, and IAGL [Applicon], a PL/I extension. Although GPL [Calma] can access the database, its APL flavor and the particular database interface make programming difficult. Silicon Design Labs provides the L language, modeled after C, which can access the database to create layout [Buric and Matheson]. CAE Systems provides three languages, all modeled after Ada, each tailored for a different function [CAE]. One, the command language, is detached from the database; another, the hardware-description language, is integrated with the database for circuit creation; the third, the formatting language, is used to interface other tools.

如果设计语言由 CAD 系统解释而不是编译，它们可以更好地交互。从解释器比编译器更具交互性这一事实可以看出这一点。在LISP系统中可以找到解释性编程环境，例如DPL [Batali 和 Hartheimer] 和NS [Cherry等]。这些系统还很方便，因为统一的语言界面控制着编辑过程、数据库访问、工具内部甚至操作系统。

Design languages can interact better if they are interpreted by the CAD system, rather than being compiled. This is obvious from the fact that interpreters are more interactive than compilers are. Interpretive programming environments can be found in LISP systems such as DPL [Batali and Hartheimer] and NS [Cherry et al.]. These systems are additionally convenient because a uniform language interface controls the editing process, database access, tool internals, and even the operating system.

当设计语言无法正常解释时，它会给用户带来困难。每次进行更改并必须重新编译代码时都会产生时间成本，并且由于强制使用结构化子程序的能力下降而产生质量成本。通过使用允许新对象模块与正在运行的程序动态链接的语言系统可以减少时间成本[Wilcox、Dageforde 和 Jirak]。这使得硬件描述模块可以合并到设计系统中并立即执行。如果没有这种能力，设计语言代码将不得不独立执行，通过通用磁盘文件与设计系统通信。

When the design language is not normally interpreted, it can present difficulties to the user. There is a time cost that is incurred whenever changes are made and the code must be recompiled, and there is a quality cost that arises from the decreased ability to enforce structured subroutine use. The time cost can be lessened through the use of language systems that allow new object modules to be dynamically linked with the running program [Wilcox, Dageforde, and Jirak]. This enables hardware-description modules to be merged into the design system for immediate execution. Without this ability, the design language code will have to execute independently, communicating with the design system via common disk files.

 

 

8.2.3 创建新语言

8.2.3 Creating New Languages

选择设计语言的最后一个选项是从头开始发明一种语言。在大多数旨在创建图形对象的文本语言中，大量使用声明性结构来链接对象（见图1.4）。但是，图形对象可以用其他更适合命令式编程风格的方式链接。

The final option in selecting a design language is to invent one from scratch. In most textual languages that are designed to create graphic objects, there is a heavy use of declarative constructs to link the objects (see Fig. 1.4). However, the graphic objects can be linked in other ways that are more appropriate to imperative programming styles.

有一种文本命令式语言能够以函数方式表达图形关系 [Henderson]。其基本对象是一幅图片，可以通过创建其他图片的函数对其进行操作。组合函数（例如beside和above）可以构建和拆分图片，从而表达图形关系。其他函数可以翻转和旋转图片，或者使用显式数据创建图片。这种语言功能强大，足以以优雅的风格描述任何几何图形。

One textual imperative language that is able to express graphical relations does so functionally [Henderson]. The basic object is a picture that is manipulated with functions that create other pictures. Composition functions such as beside and above build up and pick apart the pictures, thus expressing graphical relationships. Other functions flip and rotate pictures, or create them with explicit data. This language is powerful enough to describe any geometry in an elegant style.

 

 

8.2.4 命令式代码和图形

8.2.4 Imperative Code and Graphics

在图形设计系统中，命令式编程可用于控制布局序列，从而使设计人员从重复任务中解脱出来。但是，这种代码很少与电路集成，而是单独存在，因此对其中任何一个的更改都不会影响另一个。例如，在大多数系统中，必须重新执行修改后的硬件描述代码才能重新创建图形布局，并且对布局的后续更改不会反映在代码中 [Rosenberg and Weste；Batali and Hartheimer]。Tpack 系统通过允许以图形方式完成某些规范，部分集成了代码和图形 [Mayo]。

In a graphic design system, imperative programming can be used to control layout sequences so that the designer is freed from repetitious tasks. However, such code is rarely integrated with the circuit, but instead exists separately such that a change to either one will not affect the other. In most systems, for example, modified hardware-description code must be reexecuted to re-create the graphic layout, and a subsequent change to the layout will not be reflected in the code [Rosenberg and Weste; Batali and Hartheimer]. The Tpack system partially integrates code and graphics by allowing some specification to be done graphically [Mayo].

SAM 系统的独特之处在于它能够将代码和图形关联起来，因此对其中之一的更改会导致两者的更改 [Trimberger]。SAM 解决的两个问题是参数化组件和循环。当屏幕上的组件以算法方式描述时，如果用户修改了算法，则很容易重新计算图形。但是，如果用户更改了图形，则调整算法可能并不容易。Trimberger 确定了三种在这种情况下保持代码一致性的可能方法：(1) 用常量替换算法，(2) 在算法中附加一个适当的常量，或 (3) 完全重写算法（见图 8.4）。第一种选择对代码的破坏性太大，而最后一种选择太难实现，因此 SAM 使用了第二种方法，事实证明，这种方法在许多情况下都是必需的。
图 8.4 关联文本和图形。

将代码与图形链接的另一个问题是处理产生许多组件的代码循环。当一个这样的组件以图形方式改变时，SAM 会选择改变循环产生的每个组件，以保留代码结构。这不一定是正确的做法，并且表明文本到图形的链接必然是临时的。SAM 语言也无法完全表达，并且不可否认它只是一个仅用于实验的玩具系统。它的作者试图完成一项非常困难的任务，结果表明在解决问题之前还需要做大量工作。

Another issue in linking code with graphics is the handling of code loops that produce many components. When one such component is altered graphically, SAM chooses to alter every one that was produced by the loop, to preserve the code structure. This is not necessarily the right thing to do and shows that the text-to-graphics linkage is necessarily ad hoc. The SAM language is also not fully expressible and is admittedly a toy system for experimentation only. Its author tried to perform a very difficult task and the results show that much work is needed before the problem can be solved.

在Escher系统 中 [Clarke and Feng] 发现了一种处理图形代码循环的优雅方法 。Escher 允许以图形方式声明循环，而不是使用文本循环声明的图形组件数组。单独的“规范”单元有三个组件，其中放置了循环的起始索引、增量和结束索引（见图 8.5）。然后将此单元转换为实际数组。如果结构需要在数组的两端有所不同，则显式放置第一个和最后一个循环元素可以表达边界条件。Escher 还允许通过递归进行循环，其中规范单元包含其自身的一个实例，并对其调用值进行算法修改。虽然在实际的图形设计中绝不允许使用递归，但它可以出现在图形规范中，执行时会生成标准的无递归电路。
图 8.5 Escher 中的图形循环规范：(a) 声明为 Adder(N) (b) 实例化为 Adder(4)。

当然，将文本和图形结合起来最明显的方法是将命令式代码片段绑定到交互式设计的各个部分。然而，当发生这种情况时，代码仅仅是实现约束的命令式程序，因此是更大的声明式程序的一部分。此类程序是下一节的主题。

Of course, the most obvious way to combine text and graphics is to tie pieces of imperative code to parts of an interactive design. When this happens, however the code is merely an imperative procedure for implementing a constraint and is therefore part of a larger declarative program. Such programs are the subject of the next section.

超大规模集成电路设计的计算机辅助
史蒂文·M·鲁宾
版权所有 © 1994

第 8 章：可编程性

8.3 声明式编程

8.3 Declarative Programming

声明式编程是使用无序列语句来响应外部刺激而执行的。在电路设计中，这种编程风格通常表现为附加到设计的约束。没有线性控制流，因为这些约束的排序取决于电路的结构。尽管如此，这种代码功能强大，足以执行任何功能。许多声明式语言都是文本式的 [Kingsley；Johnson；Lipton等人；Davis 和 Clark]，但这些语言将其约束放在空间定位的对象上，因此其功能类似于图形语言。

Declarative programming is the use of unsequenced statements that are performed in response to external stimuli. In circuit design, this style of programming usually appears as constraints that are attached to a design. There is no linear flow of control because the sequencing of these constraints is dependent on the structure of the circuit. Nevertheless, such code is powerful enough to perform any function. Many declarative languages are textual [Kingsley; Johnson; Lipton et al.; Davis and Clark], but these languages place their constraints on spatially located objects, thus functioning in a similar way to graphical languages.

约束可用于多种目的。在布局系统中，它们通常将电路的各个部分组合在一起，以确保几何形状正确。文本约束语言通常以批处理模式进行评估，一次考虑所有约束并生成完整的物理布局。图形约束语言更具交互性，允许对约束和几何形状进行连续更改。此类系统要求增量评估声明性代码，以便在进行更改时，约束会调整适当的组件和线路。电气设计系统中的情况就是如此，它具有使所有组件保持连接的约束线路（参见第 11 章）。

Constraints can be used for a number of purposes. In layout systems, they commonly hold together pieces of the circuit so that the geometry will be correct. Textual constraint languages, which typically are evaluated in a batch mode, consider all constraints at once and produce a completed physical layout. Graphical constraint languages are more interactive, allowing continuous changes to the constraints and the geometry. Such systems demand incremental evaluation of declarative code so that, as changes are made, the constraints adjust appropriate components and wires. This is the situation in the Electric design system which has constraining wires that keep all components connected (see Chapter 11).

虽然约束通常应用于几何图形，但它们也可以用于其他目的。在 VLSI 设计中，许多相关的电路信息可以编码为约束。Palladio 系统[Brown、Tong 和 Foyster] 对受限互连有约束，以便组件能够根据电源、接地、输入、输出、时钟、恢复信号等正确放置。其他系统利用时序约束 [Arnold；Borriello] 或可以响应任何需求的任意代码约束 [Zippel]。

Although constraints are typically applied to geometry, they can also be used for other purposes. In VLSI design, many relevant pieces of circuit information can be coded as constraints. The Palladio system [Brown, Tong, and Foyster] has constraints for restricted interconnect so that components will be properly placed with respect to power, ground, input, output, clocks, restored signals, and so on. Other systems make use of timing constraints [Arnold; Borriello] or arbitrary code constraints that can respond to any need [Zippel].

在完全不受限制的约束系统中，用户可以编写自己的代码来操纵电路。这些系统允许对数据库中的任何值进行约束，以便可以在必要时执行代码。这是通过让每个属性包含一个可选的代码槽来实现的，该代码槽在属性发生变化时执行。这样的系统可以执行任意功能，例如分层模拟 [Saito、Uehara 和 Kawato]。

In totally unrestricted constraint systems, users can write their own code to manipulate the circuit. These systems allow constraints on any value in the database so that code can be executed whenever necessary. This is implemented by having each attribute contain an optional code slot that executes when the attribute changes. Such systems can do arbitrary functions, such as hierarchical simulation [Saito, Uehara, and Kawato].

8.3.1 约束排序

8.3.1 Constraint Sequencing

声明式和命令式程序之间的一个区别是，声明式约束系统中没有明确的执行顺序。这意味着约束求解方法对于正确执行至关重要，不同的求解方法会产生不同的结果。考虑图 8.6 中的四个约束。如果约束求解器从对象 A 开始，则可以选择满足两个约束。选择上面的约束将使对象 B 位于对象 A 下方。现在可以选择完成对 A 的另一个约束并继续对 B 的约束。如果求解器选择继续进行 B，它将把对象 C 放置在 B 右侧三个单位处。但是，如果它继续按此顺序进行，并根据对 C 的约束放置对象 D，它将无法满足对对象 A 的第二个约束，因为 D 太近了。
图 8.6 约束排序的示例。

此示例说明了约束满足中的许多问题。示例中的基本问题是存在约束循环。尽管可以通过多种方式轻松解决此特定循环，但并非所有循环都可以解决。事实上，过度约束的情况会发生，在这种情况下，由于约束相互矛盾，循环无法解决。检测这些循环需要某种形式的约束标记，以防止无限重新评估。一旦检测到这些循环，系统必须准备好以适当的方式处理它们。对于 VLSI 设计，其中每个连接都是一条信号路径，因此最好更改约束而不是更改拓扑。

This example illustrates many issues in constraint satisfaction. The basic problem in the example is that there is a constraint loop. Although this particular loop is easily solved in a number of ways, not all loops can be solved. In fact, overconstrained situations occur in which loops cannot be resolved because the constraints contradict each other. Detection of these loops requires some form of constraint marking to prevent infinite reevaluation. Once it detects these loops, the system must be prepared to deal with them in an appropriate manner. For VLSI design, in which each connection is a signal path, it is better to change the constraints than to change the topology.

解决约束循环的基本方法称为回溯，它要求逆转约束执行，直到达到替代选择可行的点。必须保留一个包含每个约束决策的所有前提的堆栈，以便知道要回溯多远 [Steele；Stallman 和 Sussman]。可能需要回溯许多步骤才能找到正确的解决方案，如果不可预见的约束继续影响搜索，甚至简单的回溯也可能无法实现（见图 8.7）。此外，回溯非常耗时。
图 8.7 简单回溯法无法解决复杂约束问题。解决步骤：（1）解决 A 上的约束：将 B 左侧的 A 设置为 1；（2）解决 B 上的约束：将 C 左侧的 B 设置为 1；（3）解决 C 上的约束：不能，必须更改 A；（4）回溯：删除 B 上的约束；（5）回溯：删除 A 上的约束；（6）重新解决 A 上的约束并考虑 C：将 B 左侧的 A 设置为 5；（7）重新解决 B 上的约束：将 C 左侧的 B 设置为 5；（8）重新解决 C 上的约束：仍然不能。

在某些情况下，可以通过预先计算循环的特征并将其简化为更简单的约束来消除循环 [Gosling]。这种循环转换涉及创建一个新的约束，该约束的作用类似于旧约束，但解决了循环冲突。这是通过代数操作组成原始约束的表达式来实现的，以消除对内部循环状态的引用并生成一组完全描述其特征的方程式。

In some situations it is possible to remove loops by precomputing their characteristics and reducing them to simpler constraints [Gosling]. Such loop transformation involves the creation of a new constraint that acts like the old one but has the loop conflict resolved. This is done by algebraically manipulating the expressions that compose the original constraints to eliminate references to internal loop state and produce a set of equations that fully describe their characteristics.

作为计算成本高昂的解决方法的替代方法，有一些简单的技术可以使约束更容易解决。例如，可以根据约束对其他约束的影响对约束进行优先排序，并利用这一点获得改进的排序。在图 8.6 的示例中，5 留下的约束 比下面的约束更严格，应首先解决以确保一致性。另一个可能有助于解决约束的功能是能够将它们从任何已知点处理到另一个未知点。这允许求解器在任何一点执行所有约束，而不必绕着循环工作。在涉及两个以上对象的约束中，应该能够根据其他对象得出任何值。如果这不可能，应该鼓励用户添加与现有集合等效但提供新解决方案机会的新约束 [Borning; Steele]。添加新约束的替代方法是拥有电路的多个视图，这些视图具有完全不同的评估约束系统的方式 [Sussman]。

As an alternative to computationally expensive solution methods, there are some simple techniques that can make constraints easier to solve. For example, it may be possible to prioritize the constraints according to their effects on other constraints, and to use this to obtain improved sequencing. In the example of Fig. 8.6, the constraint left by 5 is more restrictive than is below and should be solved first to ensure consistency. Another feature that may help solve constraints is the ability to work them from any known point to the other, unknown points. This allows the solver to execute all constraints at any point, without having to work around a loop. In constraints that involve more than two objects, it should be possible to derive any value, given the others. If this is not possible, the user should be encouraged to add new constraints that are equivalent to the existing set but provide new opportunities for solution [Borning; Steele]. An alternative to adding new constraints is to have multiple views of a circuit with totally different ways of evaluating constraint systems [Sussman].

约束排序的另一个问题是广度优先和深度优先搜索 之间的区别 。图 8.6 中的示例在完成对对象 A 的约束之前评估对对象 B 的约束时选择了深度优先排序。因此，它在完成当前级别的约束之前深入约束树。当必须完全了解任何一个约束的后果才能评估其他约束时，使用深度优先排序。当特定对象的环境比其他对象的环境更重要时，使用广度优先，必须首先评估该对象上的所有约束。根据找到的约束的性质在两种搜索类型之间切换并非不合理，对重要的约束使用深度，然后按广度完成不太重要的约束。必须小心确保所有约束都轮到。

Another issue in sequencing constraints is the distinction between breadth-first and depth-first search. The example of Fig. 8.6 chose depth-first sequencing when it evaluated the constraint on object B before finishing the constraints on object A. Thus it went deeper into the constraint tree before finishing the constraints at the current level. Depth-first sequencing is used when the consequences of any one constraint must be fully known before other constraints can be evaluated. Breadth-first is used when the environment of a particular object is more important than that of others, and all constraints on that object must be evaluated first. It is not unreasonable to switch between the two types of search depending on the nature of the constraints found, using depth for important constraints and then finishing the less important ones by breadth. Care must be taken to ensure that all constraints get their turn.

 

 

8.3.2 简单几何约束的求解

8.3.2 Solution to Simple Geometric Constraints

作为实现约束系统的示例，将描述一个简单的几何约束求解器。这种基于线性不等式的特殊技术非常流行，可以在文本设计语言 Plates [Sastry and Klein]、 EARL [Kingsley]、 ALI [Lipton et al. ]、 LAVA [Mathews、Newkirk, and Eichenberger]、 SILT [Davis and Clark]、 I [Johnson] 等中找到。约束求解器在所有这些系统中基本相同，因为它只允许曼哈顿约束，并且独立于y中的约束求解x中的约束，从而将问题简化为一维。此外，这些系统始终将其约束限制为仅两个分量坐标之间的简单不等式。因此，可以表达左边 3 或更多和右边 5 以上的约束，但无法处理 右侧与 A 到 B 的距离相同的复杂表达式。

As an example of implementing a constraint system, a simple geometric-constraint solver will be described. This particular technique, based on linear inequalities, is very popular and can be found in the textual design languages Plates [Sastry and Klein], EARL [Kingsley], ALI [Lipton et al.], LAVA [Mathews, Newkirk, and Eichenberger], SILT [Davis and Clark], I [Johnson], and many more. The constraint solver is essentially the same in all these systems because it allows only Manhattan constraints and solves those in x independently from those in y, thereby reducing the problem to one dimension. Also, these systems always restrict their constraints to simple inequalities between only two component coordinates. Thus the constraints left by 3 or more and above by 5 can be expressed, but complex expressions such as right by the same distance as that from A to B cannot be handled.

有了所有这些限制，解决方案就变得简单了：给定轴的约束按依赖性排序，并按顺序替换值。如果给出了约束A 在 B 左侧 5 或更多，B 在 C 左侧 6，则 C 的约束最少，并且最先被赋值。后续值设置为尽可能小，这样，一旦为 C 确定了位置，B 将在其左侧 6，A 将在其左侧 11。可以根据 C 重写所有约束（如 EARL 所做的那样），或者简单地通过从 C 到 B 然后到 A 来解决系统。当同一变量出现两个约束时，将使用较大的值来保持所有约束有效。因此，例如，如果给出了额外的约束A 在 C 左侧 12，那么它将覆盖与其他两个约束的间距 11。当然，约束可能会发生冲突，从而导致未知结果。 EARL 可以检测到这种情况，因为它会在解决约束之前重写约束，然后得出一个无意义的约束，形式为A left of A by X。其他系统只会错误地放置对象。

With all of these restrictions, solution is simple: The constraints for a given axis are sorted by dependency, and values are substituted in order. If the constraints A left of B by 5 or more and B left of C by 6 are given, then C is the least constrained and the first to be given a value. Subsequent values are set to be as small as possible, so that, once a position is established for C, B will be to it's left by 6 and A will be to it's left by 11. It is possible to rewrite all constraints in terms of C (as EARL does) or simply to solve the system by working from C to B and then to A. When two constraints appear for the same variable, the larger value is used to keep all constraints valid. So, for example, if the additional constraint A left of C by 12 is given, then it will override the spacing of 11 from the other two constraints. Of course, constraints may conflict, which will cause unknown results. EARL can detect this situation because it rewrites the constraints before solving them, and then arrives at a nonsensical constraint of the form A left of A by X. Other systems will merely place objects incorrectly.

尽管这些约束看似简单，但它们确实为复杂的操作奠定了坚实的基础。例如，ALI 具有原始关系包含、 最小尺寸、分离和附着，它们都建立在更简单的不等式之上[Lipton et al. ]。还可以使用这种约束系统将设计压缩到最小设计规则间距[Mathews、Newkirk 和 Eichenberger；Hsueh 和 Pederson；Williams；Mosteller；Sastry 和 Klein]。所需要做的就是将设计规则作为隐式约束纳入对象边缘之间。许多此类系统还允许用户添加其他约束。

Although these constraints appear to be simple, they do form a powerful basis for complex operations. ALI, for example, has the primitive relationships inclusion, minimum size, separation, and attachment, which are all built on simpler inequalities [Lipton et al.]. It is also possible to use this kind of constraint system to compact a design to minimal design-rule spacing [Mathews, Newkirk, and Eichenberger; Hsueh and Pederson; Williams; Mosteller; Sastry and Klein]. All that is needed is to incorporate the design rules as implicit constraints between the edges of objects. Many of these systems also allow additional user constraints.

 

 

8.3.3 并行排序

8.3.3 Parallel Sequencing

前面的讨论假设约束必须按顺序执行 才能得到解决。顺序执行技术称为传播。然而，有许多满足技术可以并行工作。Juno系统有一组足够简单的约束，每个约束都可以用代数表示，整个集合可以放入一个联立方程组中，用牛顿-拉夫森迭代法 [Nelson] 求解。

The preceding discussion presumes that constraints must be sequentially executed in order to be solved. Sequential execution techniques are called propagation. There are, however, a number of satisfaction techniques that work in parallel. The Juno system has a simple enough set of constraints that each one can be expressed algebraically and the entire collection can be placed into a system of simultaneous equations that is solved with Newton-Raphson iteration [Nelson].

可以使用一种称为松弛的 方法并行求解更复杂的约束系统。在这种方法中，每个约束都有一个误差函数，用于指示约束的满足程度。对每个对象进行更改以试图使总约束误差最小。但是，由于可能无法完全满足所有约束，误差函数可能仍然不为零。因此，松弛在评估误差函数和调整约束对象之间进行迭代。当所有误差函数都为零或值停止改善时，终止。作为一个例子，图 8.7 的约束系统可以用图 8.8 中的误差和调整函数来解决。第一个图形约束系统Sketchpad使用松弛来解决其约束 [Sutherland]。

More complex systems of constraints can be solved in parallel by using a method called relaxation. In this method, each constraint has an error function that indicates the degree to which the constraint is satisfied. Changes are made to every object in an attempt to achieve a minimum total constraint error. However, since it may not be possible to satisfy all constraints completely, the error functions may still be nonzero. Thus relaxation iterates between evaluating the error function and adjusting the constrained objects. Termination occurs when all error functions are zero or when the values cease to improve. As an example of this, the constraint system of Fig. 8.7 can be solved with the error and adjusting functions in Fig. 8.8. The very first graphical constraint system, Sketchpad, used relaxation to solve its constraints [Sutherland].

图 8.8 松弛法解决复杂约束问题。求解步骤：（1）初始化：A 到 B = 1 [错误 = 0]，B 到 C = 1 [错误 = 0]，C 到 A = 2 [错误 = 3]。（2）调整约束 C：将 A 左移 3。现在：A 到 B = 4 [错误 = 1]，B 到 C = 1 [错误 = 3]，C 到 A = 5 [错误 = 0]。（3）调整约束 A 和 B：将 B 左移 1；将 C 右移 1。现在：A 到 B = 3 [错误 = 0]，B 到 C = 3 [错误 = 0]，C 到 A = 6 [错误 = 0]。

松弛 法的问题是它很慢。这是因为它需要迭代，而且系统中的每个对象都必须检查，无论它是否受到约束变化的影响。ThingLab 系统试图通过动态编译约束来缩短响应时间 [Borning]。然而，松弛法和所有其他并行约束满足方法都存在需要检查每个对象的缺点。传播方法工作效率更高，因为如果约束应用的性质局限于设计的一小块区域，它们就不需要传播到每个对象。这在 VLSI 设计系统中很重要，因为 VLSI 设计系统通常有大量需要约束的对象。

The problem with relaxation is that it is slow. This is because of its iteration and the fact that every object in the system must be checked, regardless of whether it is affected by constraint change. The ThingLab system attempts to improve response time by dynamically compiling the constraints [Borning]. Nevertheless, relaxation and all other parallel constraint-satisfaction methods suffer from the need to examine every object. Propagation methods work more efficiently because they do not need to spread to every object if the nature of the constraint application is localized to a small area of the design. This is important in VLSI design systems, which often have very large collections of objects to be constrained.

超大规模集成电路设计的计算机辅助
史蒂文·M·鲁宾
版权所有 © 1994

第 8 章：可编程性

8.4 层次结构

8.4 Hierarchy

层次结构的存在为可编程性增加了一个新的维度。代码不再能够简单地从一个对象扫描到另一个对象；现在它必须考虑层次结构中的子对象和超对象。两个主要问题是将代码层次结构等同于设计层次结构，以及信息流的方向。将层次代码等同于电路结构的问题只是一个良好的设计实践问题：如果布局生成程序的代码结构与预期的电路结构相似，则布局生成程序将更容易开发。这两种结构都定义了一个层次结构，但两者可能不一定对应，这使得调试变得困难。命令式程序尤其容易出现这种差异，因为它们具有顺序结构而不是空间感。

The presence of hierarchy adds a new dimension to programmability. No longer can code simply scan from object to object; it must now consider subobjects and superobjects in the hierarchy. Two major issues are the equating of code hierarchies with design hierarchies, and the direction of information flow. The problem of equating hierarchical code with circuit structures is simply one of good design practice: Layout-generating programs will be easier to develop if their code structure is similar to the intended circuit structure. Both structures define a hierarchy, but the two may not necessarily correspond, which makes debugging difficult. Imperative programs are especially prone to this disparity since they have a sequential structure rather than a spatial feel.

结构匹配不佳的一个典型例子是使用子程序调用来生成布局的嵌入式语言。大多数子程序库不区分创建新单元的调用和在单元中创建新组件的调用。这意味着单个代码子程序可以创建任意数量的单元。应鼓励此类语言的用户编写与生成的设计一一对应的更结构化的代码。每个代码子程序都应以单元创建调用开始，然后在该单元中放置组件。

A classic example of poor structure matching occurs in embedded languages that use subroutine calls to generate layout. Most subroutine libraries do not distinguish between the call that creates a new cell and the call that creates a new component in a cell. This means that a single code subroutine can create an arbitrary number of cells. Users of such a language should be encouraged to write more structured code that has a one-to-one correspondence with the generated design. Each code subroutine should begin with a cell-creation call followed by the placement of components in that cell.

促进命令式设计语言结构化使用的最佳方法是限制可以编写的代码的性质。提供新语句的设计语言更有可能以这种方式指导设计人员。例如，DPL必须defun定义代码子程序并 deflayout定义分层电路级别 [Batali 和 Hartheimer]。只有deflayout子程序才能生成单元，并且只能创建一个单元。因此，从代码中的等效层次结构可以立即看出电路的层次结构。

The best way to foster structured use of imperative design languages is to restrict the nature of the code that can be written. Design languages that provide new statements have a better chance of guiding the designer in this way. For example, DPL has defun to define a code subroutine and deflayout to define a hierarchical circuit level [Batali and Hartheimer]. Only the deflayout subroutine can produce a cell, and it can create only one. Thus the hierarchical structure of the circuit is immediately obvious from the equivalent hierarchy in the code.

在图形环境中关联代码和电路的问题要小得多，因为只有一个层次结构，由电路结构定义。但是，仍然可以创建一个单独的图形规范层次结构来操作该电路，这带来了维护两者之间关系的困难。CAD 系统必须能够显示规范和电路，并能够识别两者的相关部分。

Relating code and circuitry in a graphic environment is a much less severe problem because there is only one hierarchy, defined by the circuit structure. However, it is still possible to create a separate hierarchy of graphic specifications for manipulating that circuit, and this opens up the difficulty of maintaining relations between the two. The CAD system must be able to display both specification and circuitry, and be able to identify related parts of each.

8.4.1 分层信息传递

8.4.1 Hierarchical Information Passing

分层可编程性的主要问题是如何在各层之间传递信息。计算机程序具有子程序参数，用于将信息向下传递到层次结构中，并具有返回值，用于将信息向上传递。还有全局变量可以任意通信。文本设计语言使用相同的功能，但图形语言通常不能。对于图形系统，可能需要使用文本描述来传达某些信息。

The main issue in hierarchical programmability is how to pass information among levels. Computer programs have subroutine parameters to pass information down the hierarchy and returned values to pass information back up. There are also global variables to communicate arbitrarily. Textual design languages make use of the same facilities, but graphic languages generally cannot. For graphic systems, it may be necessary to use textual descriptions to enable certain information to be communicated.

实际上，在层次结构之间传递的大部分常用信息都可以用图形来描述。在层次结构之间传递的典型值是连接点的位置。单元内的端口位置定义了单元实例上连接线的位置。相反，实例上线的位置会影响单元定义中的端口位置。系统通常在这两种选择之间进行选择，从而定义层次结构中信息流的方向。但是，有些系统会在层次结构之间双向传递此端口对齐信息，以使位置对齐 [North; Kingsley]。这些系统首先从底部构建单元，在层次结构中向上声明端口位置，然后从顶部开始匹配单元，并相应地改变端口位置。

In practice, much of the commonly used information that is passed among hierarchical levels can be described graphically. A typical value that is passed across hierarchical levels is the location of connection points. The port location inside the cell defines the location of connecting wires on instances of the cell. Conversely, the location of wires on an instance can affect the port location in the cell definition. Systems typically choose between these two alternatives and thus define a direction of information flow in the hierarchy. Some systems, however, pass this port-alignment information in both directions across hierarchical levels in order to get the positions to line up [North; Kingsley]. These systems begin by building the cells from the bottom, declaring port positions up the hierarchy, and then pitch matching cells from the top, altering the port positions accordingly.

设计语言中的一个重要问题是执行的层次顺序。层次结构的顶层是先求值还是最后求值？在自下而上的可编程性中，信息沿层次结构向上传递。每个单元定义都经过完整求值，并使用生成的电路来指导使用该单元实例的更高级别。每个实例都是相同的，静态单元定义称为数据库单元。数据库单元也出现在非可编程环境中，此时必须先知道完整内容才能生成更高级别的平面图。非可编程性和自下而上的可编程性之间的区别在于，对非可编程结构所做的更改不会被层次结构的更高级别注意到，因此可能导致电路不一致。图形系统往往是自下而上或非可编程的，因为每个单元都是明确设计的，不能自动更改。

An important issue in design languages is the hierarchical order of execution. Do the top levels of hierarchy get evaluated first or last? In bottom-up programmability, information is passed up the hierarchy. Each cell definition is evaluated completely and the resulting circuit is used to guide higher levels that use instances of the cell. Every instance is identical and the static cell definitions are referred to as database cells. Database cells also occur in nonprogrammable environments, when the complete contents must be known before a higher-level floor-plan can be produced. The difference between nonprogrammability and bottom-up programmability is that changes made to nonprogrammable structures will not be noticed by the higher levels of the hierarchy and may therefore make the circuit inconsistent. Graphical systems tend to be bottom-up or nonprogrammable because each cell is designed explicitly and cannot automatically change.

在自上而下的可编程性中，首先评估较高级别，然后根据结果信息指导以实例形式出现的较低级别单元。自上而下的可编程性更像标准程序执行，因为电路创建从最外层块开始，然后沿着层次结构向下进行。单元可以参数化，并且可以根据周围环境区分各个实例。这种环境中的单元定义称为程序单元。文本设计语言往往是自上而下的，因为执行顺序与文本一致，因此在将代码转换为电路时，每个实例都可以以不同的方式创建。

In top-down programmability, the higher levels are evaluated first and the resulting information guides the lower-level cells that appear as instances. Top-down programmability is more like standard program execution because circuit creation begins at the outermost block and proceeds down the hierarchical organization. Cells can be parameterized, and individual instances can be differentiated according to their surroundings. The cell definitions in such an environment are called procedural cells. Textual design languages tend to be top-down because the order of execution runs with the text, so each instance can be created differently as the code is converted into a circuit.

实现具有自上而下可编程性的图形语言很困难，因为交互式使用可能会使系统因单元变化而无法承受。非交互式语言在生成完成的电路时可能需要花费大量时间并使用大量内存，但交互式系统必须快速响应参数变化。如果存在许多具有不同参数值的不同实例，则可能需要以多种不同形式保留单元定义，这可能会消耗过多的存储空间。另一种方法是每当引用实例时评估参数化单元的定义，这会消耗过多的时间。无论哪种情况，分层表示的时间和空间优势都会受到损害。虽然实际电路中的参数化单元通常只有两种或三种不同的形式，但如何实现它们的问题仍然存在。在图形和自上而下的Juno系统中，每个单元实例在绘制时都会重新计算 [Nelson]。但是，该系统不用于电路设计，因此屏幕上的内容很少。NS 系统[Cherry et al. ] 通过保留实例可能采用的所有不同结构形式，提供自上而下的可编程性。

It is difficult to implement a graphic language with top-down programmability because interactive use may overwhelm the system with cell variations. Noninteractive languages can take any amount of time and use much memory while generating a finished circuit, but interactive systems must respond quickly to parameter changes. If there are many different instances with diverse parameter values, it may be necessary to retain the cell definition in many different forms, which can potentially consume excessive amounts of storage. The alternative is to evaluate the definition of a parameterized cell whenever a reference is made to an instance, and this consumes excessive time. In either case, the time and space advantage of hierarchical representation is compromised. Although the parameterized cells in real circuits typically have only two or three different forms, the question of how they should be implemented still remains. In the Juno system, which is graphic and top-down, each cell instance is recomputed as it is drawn [Nelson]. However, this system is not used for circuit design so there is never very much on the screen. The NS system [Cherry et al.] provides top-down programmability by retaining all the different structural forms that instances may take.

分层可编程性要求 CAD 系统高效且易于使用。这意味着应避免使用不同的层次结构，以便代码结构与电路结构相似。它还要求有一种有效的方法在层次之间传递信息，以便正确构建大型电路。

Hierarchical programmability demands that the CAD system be efficient and convenient to use. This means that the use of differing hierarchies should be avoided so that the code structure can resemble the circuit structure. It also demands that there be an effective way of passing information across hierarchical levels so that large circuits can be correctly built.

超大规模集成电路设计的计算机辅助
史蒂文·M·鲁宾
版权所有 © 1994

第 8 章：可编程性

8.5 总结

8.5 Summary

可编程性是对设计过程的额外控制，允许生产任何电路。它扩展了所有工具的功能并定义了新的专用工具。鉴于硬件通常以算法来描述，能够在设计中使用这些算法的 CAD 系统可以考虑所有规格。

Programmability is that extra control over the design process that allows any circuit to be produced. It extends the power of all tools and defines new, special-purpose ones. Given that hardware is often described algorithmically, a CAD system that has the ability to use those algorithms in design can consider all specifications.

设计程序可以以多种形式存在，从传统的命令式文本到纯图形和声明式。图形编程在本质上是空间的环境中特别有吸引力。此外，声明式编程之所以受到青睐，是因为它对通常从事设计的非程序员很有吸引力。它简化了层次结构问题，并与整体设计工作很好地融合在一起。

Programs for design can exist in many forms, from traditional imperative text to purely graphical and declarative. Graphic programming is particularly attractive in an environment that is inherently spatial. Also, declarative programming is preferred because of its appeal to the nonprogrammers who typically do design. It simplifies issues of hierarchy and merges well with the overall design effort.

问题

Questions

  1. 使用嵌入式语言进行硬件描述有什么危险？
  2. What is the danger of using an embedded language for hardware description?
  3. 为什么设计师不喜欢编程？
  4. Why do designers dislike programming?
  5. 如何维持条件表达式与其生成的图形之间的关联？
  6. How would you maintain an association between a conditional expression and its resulting graphics?
  7. 为什么线性不等式集合是描述布局的糟糕方式？
  8. Why is a collection of linear inequalities a poor way to describe layout?
  9. 使用并行方法解决约束时，如何消除不必要的处理？
  10. How would you eliminate unnecessary processing when solving constraints with parallel methods?
  11. 实现参数化单元最困难的方面是什么？
  12. What is the most difficult aspect of implementing parameterized cells?
  13. 为什么需要将电路的文本和图形描述链接起来？
  14. Why is there a need to link textual and graphical descriptions of a circuit?

  • Arnold, John E., "The Knowledge-Based Test Assistant's Wave/Signal Editor: An Interface for the Management of Timing Constraints," Proceedings 2nd Conference on Artificial Intelligence Applications, 130-136, December 1985.

  • Borriello，Gaetano，“WAVES：用于设计、文档和规范接口的数字波形编辑器”，未发表的文档。
  • Borriello, Gaetano, "WAVES: A Digital Waveform Editor for the Design, Documentation, and Specification of Interfaces," unpublished document.
  • Brown, Harold；Tong, Christofer；以及 Foyster, Gordon，《Palladio：电路设计的探索环境》，IEEE 计算机，16:12，41-56，1983 年 12 月。
  • Brown, Harold; Tong, Christofer; and Foyster, Gordon, "Palladio: An Exploratory Environment for Circuit Design," IEEE Computer, 16:12, 41-56, December 1983.
  • Buric, Misha R. 和 Matheson, Thomas G.，《硅编译环境》，定制集成电路会议论文集，208-212，1985 年 5 月。
  • Buric, Misha R. and Matheson, Thomas G., "Silicon Compilation Environments," Proceedings Custom Integrated Circuits Conference, 208-212, May 1985.
  • CAE 公司，CAE 2000 命令语言用户手册，1984 年 8 月。
  • CAE Corporation, CAE 2000 Command Language User's Manual, August 1984.
  • Calma，GPL II 程序员参考手册，GE Calma 公司，1981 年 2 月。
  • Calma, GPL II Programmers Reference Manual, GE Calma Company, February 1981.
  • Cherry, James; Shrobe, Howard; Mayle, Neil; Baker, Clark; Minsky, Henry; Reti, Kalman; 以及 Weste, Neil，《NS：一种集成的符号设计系统》， VLSI '85，（Horbst 编辑），325-334，1985 年 8 月。
  • Cherry, James; Shrobe, Howard; Mayle, Neil; Baker, Clark; Minsky, Henry; Reti, Kalman; and Weste, Neil, "NS: An Integrated Symbolic Design System," VLSI '85, (Horbst, ed), 325-334, August 1985.
  • Clarke, Edmund 和 Feng, Yulin，《Escher—递归定义电路的几何布局系统》，第 23 届设计自动化会议论文集，650-653，1986 年 6 月。
  • Clarke, Edmund and Feng, Yulin, "Escher-A Geometrical Layout System for Recursively Defined Circuits," Proceedings 23rd Design Automation Conference, 650-653, June 1986.
  • Computervision，CADDS II/VLSI 集成电路编程语言用户指南，Computervision Corporation 文档 001-00045，马萨诸塞州贝德福德，1986 年 4 月。
  • Computervision, CADDS II/VLSI Integrated Circuit Programming Language User's Guide, Computervision Corporation Document 001-00045, Bedford, Massachusetts, April 1986.
  • Davis, Tom 和 Clark, Jim，《SILT：一种 VLSI 设计语言》，斯坦福大学计算机系统实验室技术报告 226，1982 年 10 月。
  • Davis, Tom, and Clark, Jim, "SILT: A VLSI Design Language," Stanford University Computer Systems Laboratory Technical Report 226, October 1982.
  • Gosling, James，《代数约束》，博士论文，卡内基梅隆大学，CMU-CS-83-132，1983 年 5 月。
  • Gosling, James, Algebraic Constraints, PhD dissertation, Carnegie-Mellon University, CMU-CS-83-132, May 1983.
  • 亨德森，彼得，《函数几何》，ACM LISP 和函数式编程研讨会论文集，179-187，1982 年 8 月。
  • Henderson, Peter, "Functional Geometry," Proceedings ACM Symposium on LISP and Functional Programming, 179-187, August 1982.
  • Holt, Dan 和 Sapiro, Steve，《BOLT-A 面向块的设计规范语言》，第 18 届设计自动化会议论文集，276-279，1981 年 6 月。
  • Holt, Dan and Sapiro, Steve, "BOLT-A Block Oriented Design Specification Language," Proceedings 18th Design Automation Conference, 276-279, June 1981.
  • Hsueh, Min-Yu 和 Pederson, Donald O.，《LSI 电路构件的计算机辅助布局》，《电路与系统国际研讨会论文集》，474-477，1979 年 7 月。
  • Hsueh, Min-Yu and Pederson, Donald O., "Computer-Aided Layout of LSI Circuit Building-Blocks," Proceedings International Symposium on Circuits and Systems, 474-477, July 1979.
  • Johnson, Stephen C.，《基于矩形的层次化设计验证》，麻省理工学院 VLSI 高级研究会议论文集（Penfield 编辑），97-100，1982 年 1 月。
  • Johnson, Stephen C., "Hierarchical Design Validation Based on Rectangles," Proceedings MIT Conference on Advanced Research in VLSI (Penfield, ed), 97-100, January 1982.
  • Kingsley，C.，Earl：一种集成电路设计语言，硕士论文，加州理工学院，1982 年 6 月。
  • Kingsley, C., Earl: An Integrated Circuit Design Language, Masters Thesis, California Institute of Technology, June 1982.
  • Lipton, Richard J.；North, Stephen C.；Sedgewick, Robert；Valdes, Jacobo；以及 Vijayan, Gopalakrishnan，《ALI：一种描述 VLSI 布局的程序语言》，第 19 届设计自动化会议论文集，467-473，1982 年 6 月。
  • Lipton, Richard J.; North, Stephen C.; Sedgewick, Robert; Valdes, Jacobo; and Vijayan, Gopalakrishnan, "ALI: a Procedural Language to Describe VLSI Layouts," Proceedings 19th Design Automation Conference, 467-473, June 1982.
  • Mathews, Robert；Newkirk, John；以及 Eichenberger, Peter，《硅编译器的目标语言》，第 24 届 IEEE 计算机学会国际会议论文集，349-353，1982 年 2 月。
  • Mathews, Robert; Newkirk, John; and Eichenberger, Peter, "A Target Language for Silicon Compilers," Proceedings 24th IEEE Computer Society International Conference, 349-353, February 1982.
  • Mayo, Robert N.，《在 VLSI 布局工具中结合图形和程序：Tpack 系统》，加州大学伯克利分校计算机科学部技术报告，1984 年 1 月。
  • Mayo, Robert N., "Combining Graphics and Procedures in a VLSI Layout Tool: The Tpack System," University of California at Berkeley Computer Science Division technical report, January 1984.
  • Mosteller，RC，《REST-A 叶单元设计系统》，VLSI '81（Gray 编辑），Academic Press，伦敦，163-172，1981 年 8 月。
  • Mosteller, R. C., "REST-A Leaf Cell Design System," VLSI '81 (Gray, ed), Academic Press, London, 163-172, August 1981.
  • Nelson, Greg,“Juno，一个基于约束的图形系统，” 计算机图形学，19:3，235-243，1985 年 7 月。
  • Nelson, Greg, "Juno, a constraint-based graphics system," Computer Graphics, 19:3, 235-243, July 1985.
  • North，Stephen C.，《Molding Clay：Clay 布局语言手册》，普林斯顿大学电气工程与计算机科学系，VLSI 备忘录 #3，1893 年 7 月。
  • North, Stephen C., "Molding Clay: A Manual for the Clay Layout Language," Princeton University Department of Electrical Engineering and Computer Science, VLSI Memo #3, July 1893.
  • Rosenberg, Jonathan B. 和 Weste, Neil HE，《ABCD-更好的电路描述》，北卡罗来纳微电子中心技术报告 4983-01，1983 年 2 月。
  • Rosenberg, Jonathan B. and Weste, Neil H. E., "ABCD-A Better Circuit Description," Microelectronics Center of North Carolina Technical Report 4983-01, February 1983.
  • Saito, Takao；Uehara, Takao；和 Kawato, Nobuaki，《基于框架和恶魔的逻辑设计 CAD 系统》，第 18 届设计自动化会议论文集，451-456，1981 年 6 月。
  • Saito, Takao; Uehara, Takao; and Kawato, Nobuaki, "A CAD System For Logic Design Based on Frames and Demons," Proceedings 18th Design Automation Conference, 451-456, June 1981.
  • Sastry, S. 和 Klein, S.，“PLATES：一种无度量 VLSI 布局语言”，麻省理工学院 VLSI 高级研究会议论文集（Penfield 编辑），165-169，1982 年 1 月。
  • Sastry, S. and Klein, S., "PLATES: A Metric Free VLSI Layout Language," Proceedings MIT Conference on Advanced Research in VLSI (Penfield, ed), 165-169, January 1982.
  • Stallman, RM 和 Sussman, GJ，《计算机辅助电路分析系统中的前向推理和依赖导向回溯》，《 人工智能》，9:2，135-196，1977 年 10 月。

  • Steele, GL Jr.，《基于约束的计算机编程语言的定义和实现》，博士论文，麻省理工学院，1980 年 8 月。

  • Trimberger, Stephen, "Combining Graphics and A Layout Language in a Single Interactive System," Proceedings 18th Design Automation Conference, 234-239, June 1981.
