超大规模集成电路设计的计算机辅助
史蒂文·M·鲁宾
版权所有 © 1994

第 11 章：电动

Chapter 11: Electric

11.1 简介

11.1 Introduction

在抽象地讲解完许多关于 CAD 的章节之后，是时候讨论一个具体而真实的设计系统“Electric”了。这个系统很有启发性，因为它的源代码可供大学使用，以便学生可以研究它的工作原理。Electric 也很有价值，因为它体现了本书中描述的许多概念。然而，讨论这个系统最令人信服的理由仅仅是因为它是由本书的作者 [Rubin] 编写的。

After many chapters of CAD in the abstract it is time to discuss a specific and real design system called "Electric". This system is instructive because its source code is available to universities so that students may study its workings. Electric is also worthy because it embodies many of the notions described in this book. However, the most compelling reason for discussing this system is simply that it was programmed by the author of this book [Rubin].

Electric 是作为传统 VLSI 设计系统的替代品而建立的，后者没有结合图形、连接性和精确几何形状。VLSI 设计中存在许多文本系统 [Lipton等人；Johnson；Kingsley]，也存在没有连接概念的图形系统 [Ousterhout；Batali 和 Hartheimer]。一些系统试图将图形和连接性融合在一起，但它们总是将图形抽象化 [Weste；Williams]。Electric 的目标是将它们组合成一个高度灵活的系统。

Electric was built as an alternative to traditional VLSI design systems that did not combine graphics, connectivity, and accurate geometry. Many textual systems existed for VLSI design [Lipton et al.; Johnson; Kingsley] and there were also graphics systems with no notion of connectivity [Ousterhout; Batali and Hartheimer]. Some systems attempted to merge graphics and connectivity, but they always abstracted the graphics somewhat [Weste; Williams]. The goal of Electric was to combine these into one highly flexible system.

为了实现连接，电气设计系统有一个基于网络结构的可扩展数据库。网络的节点对应于电路中的元件，网络的弧线是连接线。除了这些网络信息之外，还有与每个元件和线路相关的几何数据，以便可以表示正确的布局。由于数据库是可扩展的，因此可以存储其他结构来描述行为、功耗、设计规则等。

To implement connectivity, the Electric design system has an extendible database, built on a network structure. Nodes of the network correspond to components in the circuit, and arcs of the network are connecting wires. In addition to this network information, there are geometric data associated with every component and wire so that correct layout can be represented. Since the database is extendible, additional structures can be stored to describe behavior, power consumption, design rules, and so on.

Electric 最有趣的方面是它的可编程性：用户可以指定在设计过程中将持续执行的布局关系。这是通过一个约束系统实现的，该系统在设计中分层传播布局关系。约束系统增强了进行分层设计的能力，因为无论布局如何变化，电路的不同层始终保持连接。虽然这些约束本质上都是空间约束，但也有许多可用的解释性编程系统（LISP、TCL和Mathematica）允许更灵活的可编程性。它们还允许用这些语言对设计系统的某些部分进行编码。

The most interesting aspect of Electric is its programmability: Users can specify layout relationships that will be continuously enforced during design. This is achieved with a constraint system that hierarchically propagates layout relationships through the design. The constraint system strengthens the ability to do hierarchical design because different levels of the circuit always remain connected regardless of changes to the layout. Although these constraints are all spatial in nature, there are also many interpretive programming systems available (LISP, TCL, and Mathematica) that allow more flexible programmability. They also allow some parts of the design system to be coded in these languages.

Electric 承认设计环境的数量是无限的，并且系统以统一的方式集成了这些环境。设计环境是一个单一模块，用于描述可以组成电路的原始组件和电线。模块中包含所有环境信息，例如图形属性和模拟行为。要创建模块，只需以网络形式表达环境，以便可以将其作为节点和弧的集合进行操作。

Electric accepts the fact that there is an unlimited number of environments for doing design, and the system integrates them in a uniform manner. A design environment is a single module describing primitive components and wires that can be composed into circuits. Included in the module is all the environmental information such as graphic attributes and simulation behavior. To create a module, one simply expresses the environment in network form so that it can be manipulated as a collection of nodes and arcs.

除了提供任何设计环境外，Electric 还允许无限数量的综合和分析工具。数据库以操作系统的方式监督它们的执行，以便每个工具可以依次运行并跟上其他工具的活动。这种灵活性允许工具以增量或批处理方式运行，同时保持所有活动的一致性。变更控制由数据库管理，以便可以撤消任何不正确的工具活动。在工具作为流程的这种背景下，甚至用户界面也是一个工具，与数据库分开。

In addition to providing for any design environment, Electric also allows an unlimited number of synthesis and analysis tools. The database oversees their execution in the fashion of an operating system so that each tool can operate in turn and keep up with the activities of the others. This flexibility allows tools to operate incrementally or in a batch style, and also keeps all activity consistent. Change control is managed by the database so that any incorrect tool activity can be undone. In this context of tools as processes, even the user interface is a tool, separate from the database.

本章详细介绍了此处描述的 Electric 的四个主要方面：表示、可编程性、设计环境和工具。如需更多信息，请联系 该系统的商业分销商Static Free Software。Electric是用C [Kernighan and Ritchie] 编写的，其源代码可通过本书的作者提供给大学。代码附带内部手册，其中解释了命令结构、数据结构、数据库子例程以及新设计环境的构建。

This chapter provides detail on the four main aspects of Electric described here: the representation, programmability, design environments, and tools. Additional information can be obtained by contacting Static Free Software, the commercial distributor of the system. Electric is written in C [Kernighan and Ritchie] and its source code is available to universities through the author of this book. The code comes with internals manuals that explain the command structure, data structures, database subroutines, and the construction of new design environments.

超大规模集成电路设计的计算机辅助
史蒂文·M·鲁宾
版权所有 © 1994

第 11 章：电动

11.2 表示

11.2 Representation

在 Electric 中，电路由表示元件和连接线的节点和弧 组成 。例如，连接到接触元件的晶体管元件将由两个节点和一个弧表示（见图 11.1）。此外，节点上还有端口，这些端口是弧连接的站点。此图中有两个端口，每个节点上都有一个，位于弧的连接站点。节点、弧和端口是 Electric 中动态分配的对象，使用指针将它们链接在一起形成网络。每个对象都有一组基本属性，其中包含重要信息，例如物理位置和网络邻居。该集合是可扩展的，可以接受任何具有任何值的属性。例如，可以在弧上创建一个名为“延迟时间”的新属性，该属性包含浮点数。此外，可以在晶体管上创建一个名为“栅极接触”的新属性，以保存指向接触节点的直接指针。
图 11.1 电气的节点和弧表示：（a）对象（b）表示（c）实际布局。

为了表示布局的几何形状，Electric 存储了每个节点和弧的实际坐标，以半毫米为单位表示。这些信息的组织是通过R 树（参见 第 3 章）完成的，该树将每个节点和弧定位在平衡的几何空间中 [Guttman]。因此，有两种方法可以访问数据库中的对象：按拓扑和按几何。

To represent the geometry of a layout, Electric stores actual coordinates on each node and arc, expressed in half-millimicrons. Organization of this information is done with an R-tree (see Chapter 3) that locates every node and arc in a balanced geometric space [Guttman]. Thus there are two ways to access objects in the database: by topology and by geometry.

为了使表示更加灵活，Electric 使用实例和原型之间的区别来聚合有关对象类别的公共信息。例如，图 11.1 中的晶体管节点是一个节点实例 对象，电路中每个不同的节点都有一个节点实例对象。还有一个晶体管节点原型，它只存在一次，以描述其所有实例。节点原型上具有端口原型，它们是电路中可能的端口实例的模板。这些端口原型定义了节点上可用于连接的物理位置，以及可能连接的允许弧。为了完成实例原型表示，有弧原型描述每种不同类型弧的默认值。图 11.2 说明了实例和原型之间的关系。请注意，端口原型在同一个节点（本例中为接触节点实例）上可能有多个实例。

To make the representation more flexible, Electric uses the distinction between instance and prototype to aggregate common information about classes of objects. For example, the transistor node in Fig. 11.1 is a node instance object, one of which exists for every different node placed in a circuit. There is also a transistor node prototype, which exists only once to describe all its instances. Node prototypes have port prototypes on them, which are templates for possible port instances in a circuit. These port prototypes define the physical locations on the node that can be used for connection, and also the allowable arcs that may be connected. To complete the instance-prototype representation, there are arc prototypes that describe defaults for every different kind of arc. Figure 11.2 illustrates how instances and prototypes relate. Notice that port prototypes may have multiple instances on the same node (the contact node instance in this example).

图 11.2 实例和原型表示：（a）表示（b）布局。

Electric 中的技术是一种对象，它聚合了节点、端口和弧原型来描述特定的设计环境。例如，nMOS 技术对象有三个弧原型，分别用于金属、多晶硅和扩散线。它除了有一系列用于线间连接（对接、埋入和切割触点）和线内连接或引脚的节点原型外，还有用于增强和耗尽晶体管的节点原型。这些原型的实例可以组装成 nMOS 电路（与图2.18和2.19非常相似）。由于技术是对象，因此它们还可以包含其他属性。最初，添加的信息包括设计规则表和形状描述，但可以处理更多内容；例如，可以添加一个名为“毒性水平”的属性，其中包含一段文字，描述此半导体制造工艺对环境的影响。

A technology in Electric is an object that aggregates node, port, and arc prototypes to describe a particular design environment. For example, the nMOS technology object has three arc prototypes for metal, polysilicon, and diffusion wires. It has node prototypes for enhancement and depletion transistors in addition to a series of node prototypes for interwire connections (butting, buried, and cut contacts) and intrawire connections, or pins. Instances of these prototypes can be assembled into an nMOS circuit (much like in Figs. 2.18 and 2.19). Since technologies are objects, they can also hold additional attributes. Initially, the added information includes design-rule tables and shape descriptions, but more could be handled; for example, one could add an attribute called "toxicity-level," which contains a paragraph of text describing the environmental ramifications of this semiconductor fabrication process.

层次结构的表示是通过实例原型方案的扭曲来实现的。节点实例对象可以指向原始或复杂原型，而不是使用单独的对象类来表示电路单元。尽管原始节点原型是在描述的环境中定义的，但复杂节点原型实际上是包含其他节点、弧和端口实例的单元（参见图 11.3）。复杂节点原型上的端口原型（即单元上的端口）实际上是对单元内节点上端口的引用（参见图中的粗线）。这种“导出”端口的概念与复杂节点原型方案相结合，为层次电路中的组件提供了统一的表示。尽管原型对象的信息内容略有不同，但节点和端口实例对象都是相同的，无论它们描述的是原始原型还是复杂原型。

The representation of hierarchy is done through a twist of the instance-prototype scheme. Rather than have a separate class of objects to represent cells of circuitry, the node-instance object can point to either primitive or complex prototypes. Whereas primitive node prototypes are defined in the environments as described, complex node prototypes are actually cells that contains other node, arc, and port instances (see Fig. 11.3). Port prototypes on complex node prototypes (that is, ports on cells) are actually references to ports on nodes inside of the cell (see the heavy line in the figure). This notion of "exporting" ports combines with the complex node-prototype scheme to provide a uniform representation of components in a hierarchical circuit. Although the prototype objects vary slightly in their information content, the node- and port-instance objects are the same regardless of whether they describe primitive or complex prototypes.

Electric 还扩展了单元的概念，以便可以有不同的视图（原理图、布局、VHDL 等）和每个视图的多个版本。单元的特定视图和版本称为方面，从而为每个单元创建视图层次结构。这个想法类似于 Oct/VEM 的工作 [Harrison、Moore、Spickelmier 和 Newton]

Electric also extends the concept of a cell so that there can be different views (schematics, layout, VHDL, etc.) and multiple versions of each view. A particular view and version of a cell is called a facet, and thus creates a view hierarchy for each cell. This idea is similar to the Oct/VEM work [Harrison, Moore, Spickelmier and Newton]

图 11.3 层次化表示：（a）技术中的原始原型 (b) 复杂节点原型或单元 (c) 单元布局 (d) 爆炸布局。

Electric 中的一切都是具有可扩展属性值对的对象。本节已经提到了节点、弧和端口实例；节点、弧和端口原型；以及技术。还有聚合复杂节点原型的库对象，以及对电路进行操作的工具对象（见图 11.4）。工具对象包含许多属性，这些属性实际上是用于执行基本综合和分析功能的代码例程。

Everything in Electric is an object with extendible attribute-value pairs. This section has already mentioned node, arc, and port instances; node, arc, and port prototypes; and technologies. There are also library objects that aggregate complex node prototypes, and tool objects that operate on the circuitry (see Fig. 11.4). Tool objects contain many attributes that are actually code routines for performing the essential synthesis and analysis functions.

图 11.4 Electric 数据库的所有对象。

作为属性灵活性如何工作的一个例子，我们将描述典型功能模拟器的操作。功能模拟器可以模拟单元的内容，也可以使用行为描述，后者可以更有效地描述内容。所有原始节点原型都以这样的行为描述开始，因此模拟器不会尝试检查其内容。每当要对单元进行行为描述时，设计人员都会在复杂节点原型上的相同位置输入该信息。模拟器在决定如何处理节点时，仅检查原型上是否存在行为属性。因此，Electric 表示足够强大，可以包含任何信息，并且足够灵活，可以合理地组织这些信息。

As an example of how attribute flexibility works, the operation of a typical functional simulator will be described. Functional simulators can either simulate the contents of a cell or use a behavioral description, which more efficiently describes the contents. All primitive node prototypes start with such a behavioral description so that the simulator will not attempt to examine their contents. Whenever a cell is to be behaviorally described, the designer enters that information in the same place on the complex node prototype. The simulator merely checks for the existence of the behavior attribute on the prototype when deciding how to handle a node. Thus, the Electric representation is powerful enough to contain any piece of information and flexible enough to organize that information sensibly.

超大规模集成电路设计的计算机辅助
史蒂文·M·鲁宾
版权所有 © 1994

第 11 章：电动

11.3 可编程性

11.3 Programmability

Electric 最有趣的方面是其强大的编程设计功能。除了提供内置的 LISP、TCL 和 Mathematica 解释器外，Electric 还在数据库中提供了一些约束系统。其中一个约束系统基于导线长度的线性不等式，如第 8 章详细描述的那样。Electric 独有的主要约束系统既可以在单元内工作，也可以逐步工作，在层次结构中向上传播更改。这种层次布局约束系统使设计人员能够在图形编辑器中自上而下地工作。

The most interesting aspect of Electric is its powerful facility for programming designs. Besides providing built-in interpreters for LISP, TCL, and Mathematica, Electric has a few constraint systems available in the database. One constraint system is based on linear inequalities of wire lengths, as Chapter 8 described in detail. The primary constraint system, unique to Electric, works both within the cell and incrementally, propagating changes upward in the hierarchy. This hierarchical-layout constraint system enables designers to work top-down in a graphical editor.

尽管层次布局约束系统最初是数据库的一个组成部分，但对多个约束求解器的需求促使人们采用更模块化的方案。每个约束求解器都为可能的数据库更改提供接口例程：创建、删除和修改节点、端口、弧和单元。必须存在额外的接口例程用于初始化和特殊控制指令，并通知约束系统一批更改已描述并可以解决。有了这样的方案，任何约束系统都可以纳入数据库。

Although the hierarchical-layout constraint system was initially an integral part of the database, the need for multiple constraint solvers fostered a more modular scheme. Each constraint solver provides interface routines for the possible database changes: creation, deletion, and modification of nodes, ports, arcs, and cells. Additional interface routines must exist for initialization and special control directives, and to inform the constraint system that a batch of changes has been described and can be solved. With such a scheme, any constraint system can be incorporated in the database.

11.3.1 分层布局约束

11.3.1 Hierarchical-Layout Constraints

在 Electric 中，分层布局约束始终置于导线上。它们设置属性，使得导线任一端的组件更改都会影响另一端的组件。在没有约束的情况下，导线会根据需要旋转和拉伸，以在任一移动时连接两个组件。因此，Electric 的基本前提是，在对数据库进行所有更改时，导线始终保持正确连接。

Hierarchical-layout constraints are always placed on wires in Electric. They set properties so that a change to a component on either end of the wire affects the component on the other end. In the absence of constraints, wires rotate and stretch as necessary to connect their two components whenever either moves. Thus the essential premise of Electric is that wires always remain properly connected through all changes to the database.

第一个层次布局约束是刚性，当它应用于导线时，会导致长度保持不变，并固定相对于两个组件的方向。如果连接到刚性导线的任一组件移动，则导线和另一个组件都会以类似的方式移动。如果一个组件旋转，则导线也会旋转，而另一端的组件会绕导线末端旋转。可以看出，刚性导线本质上是由它连接的两个组件组成的单个对象（见图 11.5）。为了允许出现不寻常的约束情况，可以临时设置或取消设置刚性，这意味着该属性仅在下一次更改时覆盖当前约束。
图 11.5 刚性导线的效果：（a）原始（b）接触元件旋转，不受约束的导线（c）接触元件旋转，刚性导线（d）接触元件向右移动，刚性导线。

当导线不是刚性时，可能适用另外两个约束：固定角度和可滑动。固定角度约束强制导线保持其当前角度。如果水平固定角度导线上的一个组件向上移动，则另一个组件也会向上移动。但是，如果该组件向左移动，导线将仅拉伸而不会影响另一个组件。组件的旋转或镜像不会影响固定角度导线，除非导线偏离中心连接，在这种情况下会发生轻微的平移（见图 11.6）。
图 11.6 固定角度导线的效果：（a）原始效果（b）接触元件旋转，固定角度导线（c）接触元件向右移动，固定角度导线。

另一个可应用于非刚性导线的约束是可滑动因素，它会影响具有非点连接点的元件。当连接具有正面积时，连接到它的导线可以在该面积内滑动。这意味着对元件的微小更改可能根本不会影响导线，因为连接区域仍然正确包含导线的末端。可滑动约束允许导线进行这些独立移动，而如果没有此约束，元件和导线都必须一起移动。在图 11.7 中，6×4 接触元件的端口区域从其边缘开始 1 个单位。因此，导线连接在 2 宽端口的中间，并且可以向任一方向滑动 1。该图还说明了与门，其端口是整个左侧（0×5 端口）。导线保持连接在同一位置，因为它们不可滑动。
图 11.7 可滑动导线的效果：（a）原始图（触点具有从顶部和底部插入 1 的连接区域）（b）触点组件向上移动 1，可滑动导线。（c）原始图（d）和向上移动的固定角度不可滑动导线。

大多数设计环境都允许滑动，以便线路能够适应连接配置的详细变化。需要关闭此约束的一个例子是原理图门，例如 AND 和 OR，其中输入全部连接到侧面的一个大连接。如果允许滑动，那么门组件的微小运动将使输入聚集在一起。

Most design environments allow slidability so that the wires can adjust to detailed changes of connection configuration. An example of the need to turn off this constraint is in schematic gates such as AND and OR, in which the inputs are all attached to one large connection on the side. If slidability is allowed, then small motions of the gate component will bunch the inputs together.

层次布局约束中最强大的是将布局的层次关联起来的约束。单元定义中的所有导出连接点都与层次结构中较高层次的单元实例上的实际连接绑定。这意味着，如果单元中的组件具有导出连接并且该组件移动，则该连接会移动，并且单元实例上连接的任何线路也会移动（参见图 11.8）。这是 Electric 理念的自然延伸，即在更改后一切都必须保持连接。
图 11.8 分层布局约束的传播：（a）原始（b）栅极单元中的接触元件旋转后，所有三条线均固定角度。

约束执行的顺序对于确保正确的解决方案和正确的布局至关重要。Electric 先解决单元内的所有约束，然后再向上移动到其他单元。当层次结构比简单的树形组织更复杂时，必须注意确保正确遍历，以便在解决较高级别的单元之前解决较低级别的单元。例如，如果图 11.9 中的单元 C 发生更改，则必须在单元 A 之前重新评估单元 B，即使两者都包含单元 C 的实例。
图 11.9 必须小心遍历非树型层次结构。

在一个单元内，约束通过两次传递来解决：首先是刚性线，然后是非刚性线。这样刚性线就具有了正常工作所需的优先级。时间戳机制通过检测约束的重新应用并强制执行静止操作来防止约束循环失控。如果重新应用的约束与布局一致，则无需进行任何更改，循环终止。否则，就会出现过度约束的情况，Electric 会慢速移动导线，将其替换为三根正确连接的导线。这种约束传播方案在 VLSI 设计领域中可以快速有效地进行。

Within a cell, the constraints are solved in two passes: first the rigid wires and then the nonrigid wires. This gives rigidity the priority it needs to work correctly. A time-stamp mechanism prevents constraint loops from running amok, by detecting reapplication of constraints and forcing a quiescing action. If a reapplied constraint is consistent with the layout, then no change is necessary and the loop terminates. Otherwise, there is an overconstrained situation and Electric jogs the wire, replacing it with three that properly connect. This scheme for propagation of constraints proceeds quickly and effectively in the domain of VLSI design.

 

 

11.3.2 解释性语言

11.3.2 Interpretive Languages

当需要更强大的可编程性时，用户可以编写一段LISP、TCL或Mathematica 来生成任何布局。许多年前甚至还有Prolog解释器，但后来已不再使用。这些语言系统不是以增量方式运行，对发生的变化做出反应，而是像标准命令式语言一样，在执行时操作数据库。解释性代码可以通过调用 Electric 数据库来定义新单元并将对象放置在单元中，从而创建电路。解释性代码还可以通过设置线路属性和更改组件位置来调用约束系统。这些功能与与 Electric 链接的 C 程序中可用的功能相同，只是这些语言以解释方式运行，从而提供了更好的开发环境。

When more powerful programmability is needed, the user can write a piece of LISP, TCL, or Mathematica to generate any layout. There was even a Prolog interpreter many years ago, but it fell into disuse. These language systems do not function incrementally, reacting to changes as they occur, but rather act like a standard imperative language that manipulates the database when executed. Interpretive code can create circuitry by invoking the Electric database to define new cells and place objects in cells. It is also possible for interpretive code to invoke the constraint system by setting wire properties and changing component locations. These capabilities are identical to those available in C programs linked with Electric, except that these languages run interpretively and thus provides a better development environment.

超大规模集成电路设计的计算机辅助
史蒂文·M·鲁宾
版权所有 © 1994

第 11 章：电动

11.4 环境

11.4 Environments

Electric 包含许多不同的设计环境。如前所述，这些环境作为技术 对象存在于数据库中。对象包含描述其内容的过程和表格信息。例如，原始组件由节点原型对象的链接列表表示。但是，这些原始的图形描述是通过一个返回多边形计数的例程和另一个重复调用以描述每个多边形的例程以程序方式完成的。这允许对原始进行任意参数化以实现最大的灵活性。

Electric contains a number of different design environments. As described earlier, these environments exist as technology objects in the database. The objects contain both procedural and tabular information that describes their contents. For example, the primitive components are represented by a linked list of node-prototype objects. However, the graphical description of these primitives is done procedurally with one routine that returns a count of polygons, and another routine that is repeatedly called to describe each polygon. This allows primitives to be arbitrarily parameterized for maximum flexibility.

添加环境只需要将必要的表和例程编码成一个模块，然后创建一个带有指向该模块的指针的技术对象。这些例程用于初始化、特殊控制、节点描述、弧描述和端口描述。节点描述例程实际上有两种形式，具体取决于描述是用于显示还是用于电路分析。表格信息包括设计规则、模拟特性、默认大小、连接信息、行为、重新格式化数据、层模式和颜色。例程处理的大部分信息也以表格形式编码。

Adding environments simply requires that the necessary tables and routines be coded into a module, and a technology object be created with pointers to this module. The routines are for initialization, special control, node description, arc description, and port description. The node-description routines actually take two forms, depending on whether the description is for display or for circuit analysis. Tabular information includes design rules, simulation characteristics, default sizes, connectivity information, behavior, reformatting data, layer patterns, and colors. Much of the information handled by routines is also coded tabularly.

Electric 中的大多数环境用于集成电路布局，其中存在许多不同的工艺，并且工艺中存在许多变化。例如，有四种不同的 CMOS 环境：具有一层金属的理想化版本 [Griswold]、用于 MOSIS 设计规则的双金属版本 [Mukherjee]、用于加拿大代工厂设计规则的双多晶硅版本以及具有圆形几何形状的特殊 MOSIS 版本。除了用于 CMOS 的环境外，还有用于 nMOS 和双极布局的环境。

Most of the environments in Electric are for layout of integrated circuits, there being many different processes and many variations within a process. For example, there are four different CMOS environments: an idealized version with one layer of metal [Griswold], a double-metal version for MOSIS design rules [Mukherjee], a double-polysilicon version for Canadian foundry design rules, and a special MOSIS version with round geometry. In addition to those for CMOS, there are environments for nMOS and Bipolar layout.

在非 IC 设计中，有用于原理图捕获和印刷电路板布局的环境，以及一些高级架构环境，例如用于数字滤波器的环境 [Kroeker]。甚至可以使用两种环境进行非电子设计：用于任意图形的 artwork 和用于并发事件规范的GEM [Lansky and Owicki]。然而，最有趣的环境被称为“通用”环境，因为它包含许多有用的原语，可以提高设计的灵活性。

In non-IC design, there are environments for schematic capture and printed-circuit-board layout, and some high-level architectural environments such as one for digital filters [Kroeker]. It is even possible to do nonelectronic design with two environments: artwork for arbitrary graphics, and GEM for concurrent event specification [Lansky and Owicki]. The most interesting environment, however, is called "generic" because it contains many useful primitives for flexibility of design.

11.4.1 通用

11.4.1 Generic

通用环境通过提供具有不受限制的连接性的通用组件和线路，允许混合所有其他环境。使用通用线路，原理图环境中的栅极可以连接到 nMOS 环境的晶体管。使用这种线路是必要的，因为尽管这两个组件可以位于同一个单元中，但原理图的基本线路以及 nMOS 的多晶硅或扩散线路都不能合法地建立连接。同样的道理也适用于使用通用引脚连接来自不同环境的线路。混合环境可用于多种目的，包括工艺实验（混合多个 IC 布局环境）、IC 设计速记（混合布局和原理图）和系统级仿真（混合 IC 和 PC 布局）。

The generic environment allows the intermixing of all other environments by providing universal components and wires that have unrestricted connectivity. With the universal wire, a gate from the schematics environment can be connected to a transistor of the nMOS environment. The use of this wire is necessary because, although the two components can reside in the same cell, neither the basic wire of schematics nor the polysilicon or diffusion wires of nMOS can legally make the connection. The same reasoning applies to the use of the universal pin in connecting wires from different environments. The mixing of environments is useful for a number of purposes including process experimentation (mixing multiple IC-layout environments), IC-design shorthand (mixing layout and schematics), and system-level simulation (mixing IC and PC layout).

通用环境的另一个特性是不可见的线，它可以连接任何组件但不进行电气连接。这对于对两个对象施加约束非常有用，无论它们的网络关系如何。不可见的线可以像任何其他线一样受到约束，但它不携带信号，也不会出现在制造输出中。

Another feature of the generic environment is the invisible wire, which can connect any components but does not make an electrical connection. This is useful for placing constraints on two objects regardless of their network relationship. An invisible wire can be constrained just like any other wire, but it carries no signals and does not appear in the fabrication output.

通用环境中还包含一些在设计中很有用的特殊基元。例如，Cell-Center 组件是一个基准标记，当放置在单元中时，它定义了基于光标的单元实例操作的原点。未布线的线路会建立连接，并向布线器发出指示，表示应将其替换为正确布线的线路。

Also in the generic environment are special primitives that are useful in design. The Cell-Center component, for example, is a fiducial mark that, when placed in a cell, defines the origin for cursor-based manipulation of cell instances. The unrouted wire makes a connection and also indicates to routers that it should be replaced with correctly routed wires.

 

 

11.4.2 MOS

11.4.2 MOS

MOS 环境包含第 2 章中描述的高级布局基元（见图2.18和 2.21）。晶体管元件用于表示多晶硅和扩散的交集，以便于维护网络。每个 MOS 环境中都有两个晶体管基元：nMOS 中的增强和耗尽； CMOS 中的n型和p型。还有大量用于连接不同层上的导线的触点，以及一组用于连接同一层上的导线的引脚。

The MOS environments contain the high-level layout primitives that have been described in Chapter 2 (see Figs. 2.18 and 2.21). A transistor component is used to represent the intersection of polysilicon and diffusion so that the network can be easily maintained. There are two transistor primitives in each MOS environment: enhancement and depletion in nMOS; n-type and p-type in CMOS. There are also a host of contacts for connecting wires on the different layers, and a set of pins for connecting wires on the same layer.

IC 设计的一个重要逃生出口是纯层组件的可用性，当高级基元不够灵活时，它允许生成任意几何图形。当然，为了避免这种情况，人们在规划基元时投入了大量精力，使其可用且功能强大。例如，接触切割基元会随着其尺寸变大而自动添加额外的切割多边形，这样就不必使用多个组件。此外，晶体管基元允许为蛇形描述指定任意路径。因此，只有最不寻常的布局（通常是模拟）才需要纯层组件。

An important escape hatch for IC design is the availability of pure layer components that allow arbitrary geometry to be produced when the higher-level primitives are not flexible enough. Of course, in an attempt to avoid such use, much attention has gone into planning the primitives to make them usable and powerful. For example, the contact-cut primitives automatically add extra cut polygons as their size grows large so that multiple components do not have to be used. Also, the transistor primitives allow an arbitrary path to be specified for serpentine description. It is therefore only the most unusual layout, typically analog, that needs the pure-layer components.

MOS 环境的另一个高级方面是植入物的自动放置。在 nMOS 中，这仅仅意味着耗尽晶体管包括耗尽植入层作为其描述的一部分。然而，在 CMOS 中，所有扩散活动都发生在衬底或阱植入物中，因此所有晶体管、扩散线、扩散接触和扩散引脚都必须包含植入物信息。因此，这些组件有两组，每个植入物一组，并且必须始终使用正确的版本。鉴于这一特性，设计人员无需考虑植入物放置，因为总是有足够的植入物自动放置以正确封装电路。

Another high-level aspect of MOS environments is the automatic placement of implants. In nMOS, this simply means that the depletion transistor includes the depletion-implant layer as part of its description. In CMOS however, all diffusion activity takes place in substrate or well implants, so all the transistors, diffusion wires, diffusion contacts, and diffusion pins must include implant information. Thus there are two sets of these components, one for each implant, and the correct version must always be used. Given this feature, the designer is able to work without consideration for implant placement because there is always enough of it automatically placed to encapsulate the circuitry properly.

 

 

11.4.3 双极

11.4.3 Bipolar

双极环境与 MOS 环境有显著不同，尽管它们都是用于 IC 布局。与简单的场效应晶体管只有几种几何形状不同，结型晶体管的布局必须完全灵活，允许任意形状的基极、发射极和集电极。因此，有三个基元组合在一起形成晶体管。这些基元很复杂，因为它们描述了基极、发射极和集电极构造所需的许多双极层。还有触点和通孔，用于在导电层之间建立连接。

The bipolar environments are significantly different from MOS environments, even though they are all for IC layout. Rather than having a few geometries for the simple field-effect transistor, it is necessary to provide total flexibility in the layout of junction transistors by allowing arbitrarily shaped bases, emitters, and collectors. Thus there are three primitives that combine to form a transistor. These primitives are complex since they describe the many bipolar layers necessary for base, emitter, and collector construction. There are also contacts and vias that make connections between conducting layers.

 

 

11.4.4 原理图

11.4.4 Schematics

原理图捕获环境包含电路数字和模拟图所需的组件。在数字方面，有逻辑门 AND、OR、XOR、触发器和缓冲器，所有这些都可以定制以处理任意数量的输入并否定任何信号。否定是通过将​​反相气泡放在连接线上而不是放在组件上来实现的。对于设计人员来说，这为否定规范提供了足够的灵活性，并显著减少了基元的数量。在数据库中，线路上只有一个否定位设置，这使得提取逻辑的代码稍微复杂一些，但并非无法管理。触发器可以在其触发（主从、正或负）和其功能（RS 类型、JK 类型、D 类型等）方面进行参数化。缓冲器基元在被否定时变为反相器，并且还可以在其上具有启用线。

The schematic-capture environment contains the necessary components for digital and analog diagrams of circuits. On the digital side there are the logic gates AND, OR, XOR, Flip-Flop, and Buffer, all of which can be customized to handle any number of inputs and negate any signal. Negation is accomplished by placing an inverting bubble on the connecting wire rather than on the component. To the designer, this provides sufficient flexibility for the specification of negation and significantly reduces the number of primitives. In the database, there is simply a negating bit set on the wire, which makes the code for extracting logic somewhat more complex although not unmanageable. The Flip-Flop can be parameterized in its triggering (master-slave, positive, or negative) and in its function (RS type, JK type, D type, and so on). The Buffer primitive, when negated, becomes an inverter and can also have an enable line on it.

原理图环境中提供了模拟组件，可以自由地与数字基元连接。此套件包括晶体管（n型、d型、p型、 pnp、npn、JFET、MESFET 或双发射极）、电阻器、电容器、电感器和二极管。所有组件都可以用比率和其他相关值进行参数化。

Analog components are provided in the schematics environment and can connect freely with the digital primitives. Included in this set is the Transistor (n-type, d-type, p-type, pnp, npn, JFET, MESFET, or dual-emitter), Resistor, Capacitor, Inductor, and Diode. All components can be parameterized with ratios and other relevant values.

在所有原理图设计中，都有一些其他有用的基元。黑盒可以包含任何功能并任意连接。电源、接地、源和仪表基元同样通用，可用于模拟以图形方式指示输入和输出。最后，提供了一个页外连接器，用于电路单元之间的网络连续性。对于真正不寻常的符号，用户可以使用下面描述的图稿环境绘制自己的主体。

There are some miscellaneous primitives useful in all schematic design. The Black-Box can contain any function and connect arbitrarily. The Power, Ground, Source, and Meter primitives are similarly general and can be used in simulation to indicate input and output graphically. Finally, an Off-Page connector is provided for network continuity between cells of the circuit. For truly unusual symbols, users can sketch their own bodies using the artwork environment described next.

原理图捕获环境还提供用于聚合信号的总线和总线分接头。虽然逻辑门可以接受总线，但这取决于各种分析和综合工具是否正确处理并确保信号计数合理。稍后描述的网络维护工具可提供单独的网络命名。

The schematic-capture environment also provides buses and bus taps for aggregating signals. Although the logic gates can accept buses, it is up to the various analysis and synthesis tools to handle this correctly and ensure that the signal counts are sensible. Individual network naming is available from the network-maintainer tool described later.

 

 

11.4.5 非电气

11.4.5 Nonelectrical

为了扩展电气功能，创建了一些非电气环境。最有趣的是艺术作品环境，它包含用于任意图像创建的图形基元。这不仅对草图生成有用，还可以通过向布局添加艺术作品或定义新的图形符号来增强 VLSI 设计。这个环境非常强大，它被用来生成本书中的所有图形。通用绘图工具的可用性还允许模拟器在数据库中表示波形图。

As an exercise in expanding the power of Electric, some nonelectrical environments were created. The most interesting is the artwork environment, which contains graphic primitives for arbitrary image creation. Not only is this useful for the generation of sketches, but also it can augment VLSI design by adding artwork to layout or by defining new graphic symbols. This environment is so powerful that it was used to generate all the figures in this book. The availability of a general-purpose drawing facility also allows the simulators to represent waveform plots in the database.

艺术品环境中的大部分图形都是用多边形、文本、圆形、箭头等基本组件完成的。还有一些可以绘制直线和曲线的线，但一般来说，连通性的概念对草图系统来说不那么重要。

The bulk of the graphics in the artwork environment is done with primitive components that appear as polygons, text, circles, arrowheads, and so on. There are also wires that can draw lines and curves but, in general, the notion of connectivity is less important to a sketching system.

当使用艺术设计环境时，许多用户界面设置必须更改，因为 VLSI 设计的命令集与草图所需的命令集不同。对于布局和原理图之间的区别，这一论点也适用：没有两个设计环境可以方便地共享完全相同的命令集以供使用。因此，对于每个非标准 VLSI 布局的环境，都有一个命令文件可以重新设计用户界面以实现最佳使用。此文件更改默认值、重新排列菜单并创建适合不同设计风格的新命令。

When the artwork environment is used, many of the user interface settings must be changed because the command set for VLSI design is not the same as that is needed for sketching. This argument is also true for the distinction between layout and schematics: No two design environments can conveniently share exactly the same set of commands for their use. Thus, for each environment that is not standard VLSI layout, there is a command file that retailors the user interface for the best use. This file changes defaults, rearranges menus, and creates new commands appropriate to the different style of design.

超大规模集成电路设计的计算机辅助
史蒂文·M·鲁宾
版权所有 © 1994

第 11 章：电动

11.5 工具

11.5 Tools

CAD 系统仅提供全套设计环境是不够的，还必须有一套在这些环境中工作以操纵电路的工具。这些综合和分析工具必须以易于使用的方式提供，并为人和机器提供通用接口。为了实现这种集成，Electric 提供了每个工具提供和调用的子程序调用的标准结构。

It is not enough for a CAD system to provide a full spectrum of design environments; there must also be a set of tools for working in these environments to manipulate the circuitry. These synthesis and analysis tools must be available in an easy-to-use way, with common interfaces for both humans and machines. To achieve this integration, Electric has provided a standard structure of subroutine calls that each tool provides and invokes.

11.5.1 集成

11.5.1 Integration

Electric 中的工具界面类似于具有循环控制的微型操作系统。Electric 不断循环每个工具，调用其轮换 例程，这使其有机会进行一些处理。某些工具可能会被关闭，在这种情况下，它们不会逐步运行，也不会轮换。在工具轮换期间，它可能会检查数据库并对其进行更改；前者通过子程序调用或直接数据结构访问完成，后者仅通过子程序调用完成。Electric 会累积工具轮换期间所做的更改，并在 轮换结束时将其广播给所有工具。广播由一组子程序调用组成，用于报告新的、已删除的和已修改的节点、弧、端口和单元。由于数据库中的约束系统，实际更改可能比请求的更改更广泛，因此完整的集合会广播给每个工具，包括发布原始更改的工具。在广播期间，工具可能会采取本地操作，但可能不会发布其他更改；这些更改必须延迟到轮到它时。

The tool interface in Electric resembles a miniature operating system with round-robin control. Electric continuously cycles through each tool, calling its turn routine, which gives it a chance to do some processing. Some tools may be switched off, in which case they do not function incrementally and do not receive a turn. During a tool's turn, it may examine the database and change it; the former being done by subroutine calls or direct data structure access and the latter being done exclusively by subroutine calls. Electric accumulates changes made during a tool's turn and broadcasts them to all tools when the turn is over. A broadcast consists of a set of subroutine calls to report new, deleted, and modified nodes, arcs, ports, and cells. Because of the constraint systems in the database, the actual changes may be more extensive than the requested changes, so the complete set is broadcast to every tool, including the one that issued the original changes. During the broadcast, a tool may take local action but it may not issue additional changes; these must be delayed until its turn.

工具调用的轮播循环允许在高度模块化的环境中对设计活动进行强大的控制。模块化的一个标志是整个用户界面充当一个工具并在这个框架内工作，而不是成为数据库的一部分。因此，它与任何其他工具没有什么不同，并且可以与所有工具进行统一交互。

The turn-broadcast cycle of tool invocation allows powerful control of design activity in a highly modular environment. An indication of the modularity is the fact that the entire user interface acts as a tool and works within this framework rather than being part of the database. Thus it is no different from any other tool and can interact uniformly with all of them.

数据库不仅管理更改的广播，还处理更改的撤消。工具在其轮流期间所做的所有更改都收集在一个保留的批次中 ，以便在请求撤消时可以撤消。保留的批次数量通常大于工具数量，因此可以撤消完整的操作和所有反应。撤消机制只是撤消每个更改的含义并将其广播给每个工具。

Not only does the database manage the broadcast of changes, but it also handles the changes' undoing. All changes made by a tool during its turn are collected in a batch that is retained so that it can be reversed if undo is requested. The number of retained batches is usually more than the number of tools, so that a complete action and all reactions can be undone. The undo mechanism simply reverses the sense of every change and broadcasts it to each tool.

 

 

11.5.2 示例

11.5.2 Example

工具交互的示例将说明该方案的灵活性。假设有四个工具：用户界面、路由器、设计规则检查器和模拟器（见图 11.10）。除了最后一个之外，其他所有工具都处于打开状态，目前轮到用户界面了（图中的操作 1）。在轮到用户界面时，用户界面等待单个命令并执行该命令；在这种情况下，会创建一个组件。用户界面仅将此更改发送到数据库（操作 2），然后将控制权返回给 Electric - 它的轮次结束。然后，这个新组件被广播到三个“打开”的工具（操作 3），以便它们可以显示它（用户界面），并将其排队以进行进一步分析（路由器和设计规则检查器）。
图 11.10 电气控制序列示例。

当路由器轮到它时（操作 4），它会检查其新创建或操纵的对象队列，并检查是否需要建立任何连接。路由操作并不总是增量的，但在 Electric 中可以是增量的，在本例中就是增量的。所做的任何更改（操作 5）都会再次广播（操作 6），并由每个工具进行适当处理。例如，用户界面显示新的线路。路由器知道在广播更改时不要检查自己的更改。

When the router gets a turn (action 4) it examines its queue of newly created or manipulated objects and checks to see whether it needs to make any connections. Routing action is not always incremental, but can be in Electric and is in this example. Any changes made (action 5) are again broadcast (action 6) and handled appropriately by each tool. For example, the user interface shows the new wires. The router knows not to examine its own changes when they are broadcast.

本例中要运行的最后一个工具是设计规则检查器（操作 7），它会查找已更改对象中的布局错误。之前工具所做的所有更改都会在此检查，并打印所有错误消息。请注意，在此系统中完全可以实现更正设计规则检查器，但当前工具不会进行任何更改。模拟器工具处于关闭状态，因此将被跳过，控制权将返回到用户界面。

The final tool to run in this example is the design-rule checker (action 7), which looks for layout errors in the objects that have changed. All changes made by previous tools are checked here and any error messages are printed. Note that a correcting design-rule checker would be perfectly feasible to implement in this system but the current tool makes no changes. The simulator tool, being off, is skipped and control returns to the user interface.

只需打开模拟器工具即可运行。一旦打开，它将立即获得一个轮次（因为启动模拟的命令完成了用户界面的轮次，并且没有变化导致控制权迅速转移到模拟器）。在轮次期间，模拟器将生成网络表和/或运行，具体取决于正在进行的特定模拟。模拟器的最终活动是关闭自身，因为它已执行了一次性活动。因此，即使是批处理工具也可以在电气控制方案中运行。

The simulator tool can be made to run simply by turning it on. Once on, it will receive a turn immediately (since the command to start simulation completes the user interface's turn, and the absence of change causes control to roll to the simulator quickly). During its turn, the simulator will produce a netlist and/or run, depending on the particular simulation being done. The final activity of the simulator is to turn itself off since it has performed a one-shot activity. Thus even batch tools can function within the Electric control scheme.

虽然这个例子描述了 Electric 中一些工具的总体特性，但关于它们还有很多话要说。本节的其余部分讨论了 Electric VLSI 设计系统中各个工具的显著特点。

Although this example describes the overall nature of some tools in Electric, there is much more to say about them. The rest of this section discusses the salient features of the individual tools of the Electric VLSI design system.

 

 

11.5.3 用户界面

11.5.3 User Interface

用户界面是 Electric 工具中最智能的；它既能进行综合，又能进行分析。在轮到它时，它会等待来自键盘或指点设备的单个命令并执行该活动。命令可以作为单个按键、指点设备上的按钮按下、菜单选择（固定、下拉或弹出）或带有参数的完整命令输入。前三种形式是最后一种形式的简写，动态绑定可以将任何完整命令附加到单个键、按钮或菜单。结合参数化的宏功能、变量和条件，用户界面可以定制为类似于用户熟悉或舒适的任何系统。

The user interface is the most intelligent of Electric's tools; it is able to do both synthesis and analysis. During its turn, it waits for a single command from the keyboard or the pointing device and performs that activity. Commands can be issued as single keystrokes, button pushes on the pointing device, menu selections (fixed, pulldown, or pop-up), or full commands typed in with their parameters. The first three forms are shorthand for the last form, and dynamic binding can attach any full command to a single key, button, or menu. Combined with a parameterized macro facility, variables, and conditionals, the user interface can be tailored to resemble any system that is familiar to or comfortable for the user.

可以向用户界面发出多种不同类型的命令。诸如“移动”、“创建”和“撤消”之类的更改命令会导致将更改发送到数据库进行约束分析，然后在广播回来时显示。非更改命令（例如选择当前对象或请求显示网格）会影响用户界面和屏幕，而不会更改数据库。即使发出非更改命令，用户界面也会放弃控制并结束其回合。

There are a number of different kinds of commands that can be issued to the user interface. Change commands such as "move," "create," and "undo" result in the change being sent to the database for constraint analysis and subsequent display when broadcast back. Nonchange commands, such as the selection of a current object or a request to display a grid, affect the user interface and the screen without altering the database. The user interface relinquishes control and ends its turn even when nonchange commands are issued.

另一类命令是影响其他工具的命令。用户界面可以打开或关闭任何工具（除了它自己），从而控制整个系统。当增量工具（如设计规则检查器）关闭时，该工具将不再检查每个更改。但是，数据库会跟踪工具关闭时哪些单元已更改，并且工具在重新打开时将能够跟上，从而以批处理模式运行。

Another class of commands is one that affects other tools. The user interface can turn on or off any tool (except itself), thus controlling the entire system. When an incremental tool such as the design-rule checker is turned off, that tool will no longer examine each change. However, the database tracks which cells have been changed while a tool is off, and the tool will be able to catch up when turned back on, thus acting in a batch mode.

许多看似设计系统标准功能的命令实际上是通过调用其他工具来实现的。例如，读写库是通过指挥 I/O 工具来完成的，而网络突出显示则是通过向网络维护工具发出请求来完成的。

Many commands that appear to be standard functions of a design system are actually implemented as invocations to other tools. For example, reading and writing libraries is done by directing the I/O tool, and network highlighting is done through a request to the network-maintenance tool.

除了非常灵活和强大之外，用户界面还采用高度模块化的风格进行编码，可以轻松移植到任何图形显示器。所有图形输入和输出都是通过与设备无关的子程序包完成的，该程序包目前支持 UNIX、Windows 和 Macintosh 工作站。

In addition to being very flexible and powerful, the user interface is coded in a highly modular style that permits ease of porting to any graphic display. All graphics input and output is done through a device-independent subroutine package that currently supports UNIX, Windows, and Macintosh workstations.

 

 

11.5.4 输入和输出

11.5.4 Input and Output

以各种格式读取和写入数据库是输入/输出工具的工作。目前，该系统可以处理两种 Electric 特定格式，一种是二进制格式，一种是文本格式。二进制文件格式更紧凑，但对于具有不同位组织的机器来说，可移植性较差。此外，I/O 系统可以读取和写入CIF [Hon and Sequin]、 GDS II [Calma]、 EDIF [EDIF 委员会] 和许多其他格式。不幸的是，CIF 和 GDS II 输入显示为完全不相连的纯层组件集合。I/O 系统处理的最终格式是PostScript、 HPGL或QuickDraw中的绘图输出。

The reading and writing of the database in various formats is the job of the input/output tool. Currently this system can handle two Electric-specific formats, one binary and one text. The binary file format is more compact but less portable to machines with different bit organization. In addition, the I/O system can read and write CIF [Hon and Sequin], GDS II [Calma], EDIF [EDIF committee], and many other formats. Unfortunately, CIF and GDS II input appears as a collection of pure-layer components that are totally unconnected. A final format that the I/O system handles is plot output in PostScript, HPGL, or QuickDraw.

 

 

11.5.5 设计规则检查

11.5.5 Design-Rule Checking

Electric 设计规则检查器以增量方式运行，检查电路中发生的每项更改。它通过比较新元件和更改元件上所有多边形的边界来运行。虽然这种多边形比较在检查整个电路时效率不如光栅方法，但在检查少量更改时效率更高。为了使该工具更加智能，每个多边形都与特定的网络路径相关联，以便在实际连接元件时使用适当的规则。使用连通性使设计规则检查器更准确，更不容易发现虚假错误。当前设计规则检查器的唯一缺点是它不是分层的，因为增量检查所有子单元会花费太多时间。

The Electric design-rule checker runs incrementally, checking each change as it is made to the circuit. It operates by comparing the boundaries of all polygons on new and changed components. Although this polygonal comparison is less efficient than are raster methods when examining entire circuits, it is more efficient when checking small numbers of changes. To make the tool even smarter, each polygon is tied to a particular network path so that appropriate rules can be used when components are actually connected. The use of connectivity makes the design-rule checker more accurate and less prone to finding spurious errors. The only drawback of the current design-rule checker is that it is not hierarchical because incremental checking of all subcells would take too much time.

设计规则工具的另一个功能是全局短路检测器，它可以查找网络中未指定的几何连接。这是通过展平层次结构并将每个多边形与网络节点号关联来实现的。然后对列表进行排序以查找不同网络上的多边形重叠。除了查找短路之外，这还有助于通过查找应该连接甚至看起来连接但实际上没有连接的组件来验证 Electric 的网络信息。

Another facility of the design-rule tool is a global short-circuit detector, which finds geometric connections that are not specified in the network. This is done by flattening the hierarchy and associating each polygon with a network node number. The list is then sorted to find polygon overlaps on different nets. In addition to finding short-circuits, this also helps to verify Electric's network information by finding components that should be, and even appear to be, connected, but simply are not.

 

 

11.5.6 模拟

11.5.6 Simulation

Electric 目前有许多模拟器接口，可以为各种模拟器生成网表。ESIM 、RSIM和RNL [Baker 和 Terman] 在交换机级别模拟 MOS，MOSSIM [Bryant] 也是如此。CADAT [HHB] 是一个功能模拟器，MARS [ Singh ]是一个实验性的分层模拟器，可以处理任意行为规范。

Electric currently has many simulator interfaces that generate netlists for various simulators. ESIM, RSIM, and RNL [Baker and Terman] simulate MOS at a switch level as does MOSSIM [Bryant]. CADAT [HHB] is a functional simulator and MARS [Singh] is an experimental hierarchical simulator that can handle arbitrary behavioral specification.

除了模拟器接口外，Electric 还内置了一个门级模拟器。这个 12 状态模拟器（基于 Queen's University [Serbin] 的工作）可以接受输入值并在单独的波形窗口或实际电路中显示模拟结果。

Besides simulator interfaces, Electric has a gate-level simulator built-in. This 12-state simulator (based on work at Queen's University [Serbin]) can accept input values and display simulation results in a separate waveform window or on the actual circuit.

检查Electric 中的SPICE [Nagel] 仿真环境很有趣，它可以以图形方式指定所有参数。将仪表和源组件连接到电路并对其进行适当参数化，可以确定完整的输入和输出（见图 11.11）。当模拟运行时，输出值用于生成带有图稿基元的波形图。由于此图与其他图一样是一个单元，因此可以将其保存为文档，放大以进行仔细检查，甚至可以使用常规编辑命令进行更改以伪造数据！
图 11.11 SPICE 仿真的图形规范。源组件表示输入，仪表组件产生输出图。瞬态分析组件表示仿真的性质。

 

 

11.5.7 路由

11.5.7 Routing

Electric 中的路由器可以处理许多功能。迷宫路由器可用于建立点对点连接，河流路由器可连接矩形区域相对两侧的多组点。

The routers in Electric can handle many functions. A maze router is available to make point-to-point connections and a river router connects multiple sets of points on opposite sides of a rectangular area.

在进行基于阵列的布局时，两个单元相邻处存在隐式连接。这些连接必须是显式的，以便 Electric 保持其对电路的拓扑视图。为了帮助实现这一点，存在两个用于显式连接隐式连接电路的拼接功能。自动拼接器会查找几何相邻或重叠的连接点并显式连接它们。模拟拼接器会在放置电线时观察用户活动，并在整个布局中创建类似情况下的其他电线。这两个拼接器会逐步工作，根据需要添加电线。

When array-based layout is being done, implicit connections exist where two cells abut. These connections must be explicit for Electric to maintain its topological view of the circuit. To help do this, two stitching functions exist for the explicit connection of implicitly joined circuitry. The auto-stitcher looks for connection sites that adjoin or overlap geometrically and connects them explicitly. The mimic-stitcher watches user activity as wires are placed, and creates other wires in similar situations throughout the layout. These two stitchers work incrementally, adding wires as they are needed.

 

 

11.5.8 压缩

11.5.8 Compaction

Electric 有一个一维压缩器，可以批量工作，也可以增量工作。打开后，它会将布局调整为最小设计规则间距。如果压缩器保持打开状态，它会在删除对象时关闭电路，并展开布局以腾出空间容纳新元件。

Electric has a one-dimensional compacter that can work in a batch style or can function incrementally. When turned on, it adjusts the layout to its minimal design-rule separation. If the compacter remains on, it will close up the circuit when objects are deleted and will spread open the layout to make room for new components.

 

 

11.5.9 PLA 生成

11.5.9 PLA Generation

Electric 中有两个可编程逻辑阵列生成器：一个专门针对 nMOS 布局，另一个是通用平铺引擎。两者都使用描述元素阵列的个性表进行工作。nMOS PLA 生成器生成所有周围电路，包括驱动器和电源连接，以便提供完整的功能模块。通用 PLA 生成器仅生成没有任何互连的逻辑阵列。但是，它使用用户指定的阵列元素和方向示例库进行工作，因此该库可以包含任何外围电路。

There are two Programmable-Logic-Array generators in Electric: one specifically tailored for nMOS layout and another that is a general-purpose tiling engine. Both work from personality tables that describe an array of elements. The nMOS PLA generator produces all the surrounding circuitry, including drivers and power connections, so that a complete functioning module is available. The general-purpose PLA generator produces only those arrays of logic without any interconnect. However, it works from a user-specified library of array elements and orientation examples, so this library can include any peripheral circuitry.

 

 

11.5.10 硅编译器

11.5.10 Silicon Compiler

QUISC 硅片编译器接受电路的结构化 VHDL 描述和标准单元库。它将 VHDL 编译为网表，放置标准单元，并对其进行布线以创建 VHDL 布局 [Kostiuk]。

The QUISC silicon compiler accepts a structural VHDL description of a circuit and a standard cell library. It compiles the VHDL to a netlist, places the standard cells, and routes them to create layout for the VHDL [Kostiuk].

VHDL 编译器尤其有趣，因为它能够生成多种不同的网表格式，因此它可以驱动模拟器和硅片编译器。此外，VHDL 编译器还可以反向运行，从原理图生成 VHDL。因此，希望从原理图进行仿真或构建布局的用户可以轻松实现这一点。

The VHDL compiler is particularly interesting because it is able to produce a number of different netlist formats, and it can therefore drive the simulator as well as the silicon compiler. Also, the VHDL compiler can function in reverse, generating VHDL from a schematic. Therefore, users who wish to simulate or build layout from a schematic can do so easily.

 

 

11.5.11 补偿

11.5.11 Compensation

补偿系统会调整几何形状，以适应特定工艺的制造效果。它可以理解实际工艺特征（例如激光刻印参数）并适当调整几何形状，而不管补偿方向如何。该系统甚至可以理解内部和外部几何形状，并且知道如果它们定义孔，则以不同的方式移动边缘。

The compensation system adjusts geometry to account for process-specific manufacturing effects. It can understand actual process features (such as laser writer parameters) and adjusts geometry properly, regardless of the direction of compensation. The system even understands interior versus exterior geometry and knows to move edges differently if they are defining a hole.

 

 

11.5.12 更多工具

11.5.12 More Tools

有一种网络维护工具，只要发生更改，它就会在整个电路中传播节点信息。它保存网络名称列表，并可以突出显示任何连接路径。

There is a network-maintainer tool that merely propagates node information throughout the circuit whenever a change is made. It keeps lists of net names and can highlight any connected path.

许多其他工具都可以轻松地融入 Electric 中：诸如功率估计、时序验证和测试向量生成等分析工具都很有用。将来还会添加更多综合工具，例如布局规划器和更好的路由器。不仅不同工具的列表是无限的，而且给定类中的工具数量可以增长以容纳任何 CAD 算法的实验版本。Electric 的集成方案旨在能够模块化地整合任何 VLSI CAD 工具。

Many other tools could fit easily in Electric: Analysis tools such as power estimation, timing verification, and test-vector generation would all be useful. More synthesis tools such as floor-planners and better routers will someday be added. Not only is the list of different tools unbounded, but the number of tools in a given class can grow to accommodate experimental versions of any CAD algorithm. Electric's integration scheme is designed to be able to incorporate modularly any VLSI CAD tool.

超大规模集成电路设计的计算机辅助
史蒂文·M·鲁宾
版权所有 © 1994

第 11 章：电动

11.6 设计芯片

11.6 Designing a Chip

为了说明 Electric 的使用，本节将描述静态存储器芯片的构造 [Lyon and Schediwy]。该芯片使用了一种新型的四晶体管静态存储器位。基本存储器单元是使用原理图环境进行逻辑设计的（见图 11.12）。然后生成等效的 CMOS 布局，而无需考虑紧凑间距（见图 11.13）。为了获得正确的布局效率，存储器的交替位是不同的，因此两位定义了设计的叶单元。这些位可以通过一维压缩器进行压缩（见图 11.14），然后通过重新排列组件并重新压缩进一步压缩（见图 11.15）。

To illustrate the use of Electric, this section will describe the construction of a static-memory chip [Lyon and Schediwy]. This chip makes use of a novel four-transistor bit of static memory. The fundamental memory cell is logically designed using the schematics environment (see Fig. 11.12). An equivalent CMOS layout is then produced without concern for compact spacing (see Fig. 11.13). For proper layout efficiency, alternate bits of memory are different, so two bits define the leaf cell of the design. These bits can be compacted by the one-dimensional compacter (see Fig. 11.14) and then compacted further by rearranging components and recompacting (see Fig. 11.15).

图 11.12 四晶体管静态存储单元示意图。
图 11.13 四晶体管静态存储单元的 CMOS 布局。

图 11.14 两个四晶体管静态存储器单元的 CMOS 布局。
图 11.15 两个四晶体管静态存储单元的紧凑 CMOS 布局。

要创建 128 × 32 位内存阵列，需要使用六级层次结构来构建 4 × 2 阵列、4 × 4 阵列、16 × 8 阵列、64 × 8 阵列、64 × 32 阵列和 128 × 32 阵列（见图 11.16）。请注意，每个层次结构实际上都用小针脚连接其子单元，以便保持整体连通性。这些针脚由布线器自动创建。此外，每个层次结构都必须将所有未缝合的端口导出到下一级。这是由基于阵列的布局命令自动完成的。
图 11.16 128×32 静态存储器单元阵列的层次组织。

一旦创建了基本存储器阵列，就必须在边缘放置驱动电路。单个字的字（32 位）驱动器设计为与存储器的间距匹配（见图 11.17），并使用层次结构排列驱动器。128 个驱动器块连接到存储器阵列的底部。类似的驱动器和解码器构建在侧面。包括焊盘在内的整体平面图如图 11.18 所示。该布局包含 32,650 个晶体管，描述为 110 个单元。
图 11.17 静态存储器阵列的字线驱动器。

作为 Electric 复杂性的一个指标，该电路占用了 1.4 兆字节的磁盘空间。虽然这个空间不小，但它包含的信息比典型的设计数据库要多。它可以在 50 秒内读取，在 30 秒内写入（在 SUN/3 工作站上）。生成网络表仅需 15 秒（这些数据是在 1986 年编制的，当时的计算机速度要慢得多）。
图 11.18 静态存储器芯片的平面图。

超大规模集成电路设计的计算机辅助
史蒂文·M·鲁宾
版权所有 © 1994

第 11 章：电动

11.7 总结

11.7 Summary

Electric 是探索 CAD 算法的工作台。由于其表示功能，它可以保存各种信息——很多信息已经可用。所有必要的 CAD 系统功能都存在并且易于使用。因此，由于数据已经存在，因此不需要实现节点提取和光栅化。还提供输入和输出功能，以及强大的图形显示和编辑功能。CAD 工具程序员只需编写新代码的内部循环，并且可以轻松将其插入 Electric 框架。该系统强大的集成功能允许添加工具、环境、约束系统、图形界面等。

Electric is a workbench for the exploration of CAD algorithms. Because of its representational facilities, it can keep all kinds of information--much is already available. All the essential CAD system functions exist and are easily used. Thus node extraction and rasterization do not need to be implemented since the data are there. Input and output facilities are also available, as are powerful graphic display and editing. The CAD tool programmer needs to write only the inner loop of new code, and it can be easily plugged into the Electric framework. The system's powerful integration allows the addition of tools, environments, constraint systems, graphic interfaces, and much more.

问题

Questions

  1. 为什么 Electric 的用户界面没有与数据库更紧密地结合起来？
  2. Why is Electric's user interface not more tightly coupled with the database?
  3. 复杂节点实例和原始节点实例有什么区别？
  4. What is the difference between a complex node instance and a primitive node instance?
  5. 您会把有关电线功率耗散的信息放在哪里？
  6. Where would you place information about the power dissipation of wires?
  7. 层次布局约束体系中如何会出现过度约束的情况？
  8. How can overconstrained situations arise in the hierarchical-layout constraint system?
  9. 在对 Electric 中的工具进行变更广播期间，为什么无法进行进一步的更改？
  10. During change broadcasts to tools in Electric, why can further changes not be made?
  11. 如何以图形方式指定路由需求？
  12. How can routing needs be specified graphically?
